name: Hotel Los Girasoles
address: Calle Pina no. 20 SM 25 Centro, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Los Giarsoles is located in the heart of the tropical city of Cancun and features free Wi-Fi and an on-site tour desk. It is just a 5-minute drive from the city’s beautiful Caribbean beaches. The fully furnished studios at the property boast gleaming tile floors and come equipped with air conditioning and a cable TV. They also have a small kitchenette with a sink and fridge. Guests will find a wide range of restaurants within 1 km of the property, and there is a major supermarket just a 5-minute walk away. The city’s hotel zone is a 10-minute drive from the property, while guests at Hotel Los Girasoles can reach Plaza Las Americas shopping centre in a 5-minute drive. Cancun’s International Airport is 15 km away.

name: Haven Riviera Cancun
address: Carretera Federal 307 Chetumal-Puerto Juarez Km 335, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The 5-star Haven Riviera Cancun offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Cancun. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Haven Riviera Cancun. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Haven Riviera Cancun is an excellent choice from which to explore Cancun or to simply relax and rejuvenate.FarePortal

name: Punta Blanca Beach House
address: Fraccionamiento Santa Fatima Manzana 3, Lote 1, Municipio Isla Mujeres, Zona Continental, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Costa Mujeres, 19 km from Cancun Bus Station, Punta Blanca Beach House features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a private beach area. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a microwave, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Punta Blanca Beach House provides some rooms with sea views, and the rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at Punta Blanca Beach House. Cancun Government Palace is 20 km from the hotel, while Beto Avila Stadium is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 36 km from Punta Blanca Beach House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan KM 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Visit paradise at The Westin Resort & Spa, Cancun. Nestled on the beach between the Caribbean Sea and a tranquil lagoon, our Cancun beach resort offers the perfect destination for business trips and vacations in Mexico. Just six miles from CUN Airport, our Cancun Quintana Roo resort is a short ride to the aquarium, museums, waterparks, Isla Mujeres and water activities. Unwind at one of our sparkling pools or on the white-sand beaches then schedule a relaxing beauty treatment at The Heavenly Spa. Find adventure with a snorkeling trip to the coral reef or other activities. Savor delicious cuisine and libations at our on-site restaurants and bars. If you're in Mexico for a conference or family gathering, take advantage of our indoor venues, custom catering, planning services and event spaces. Kick back in a comfortable guest room or suite with views of the water. All rooms include Westin Heavenly® Beds and free Wi-Fi. Best of all, our Cancun property does not charge resort or per-person fees.Marriott

name: Flamingo Ocean View
address: Carretera a Punta Sam, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo region, with Playa Blanca and Puerto Juarez Beach nearby, Flamingo Ocean View features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a solarium. All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette in some of the units equipped with a microwave. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and Italian options. The bed and breakfast has both a sun terrace and garden where you can relax, along with a private beach area. Cancun Bus Station is 5 km from Flamingo Ocean View, while Cancun Government Palace is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 23 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Riu Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 9, Manzana 50, Lote 5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel Riu Cancun allows guests to enjoy their holidays freely without limits, without worries, and taking time to relax. This luxury hotel is located in 10 min walking distance to the beach in Cancún's hotel district. There is a plethora of bars and restaurants as well as a shopping centre in the vicinity. The centre of Cancún, which lies 1 km away, may easily be reached by making use of public transportation for which a stop is located directly in front of the hotel. The international airport lies about 20 km away.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Imperial Laguna Faranda Cancún
address: Calle Quetzal No.11, Km 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Placed near the Nichupté lagoon in the Hotel Zone of Cancun, Hotel Imperial Laguna Faranda Cancún is only a short distance from Plaza Caracol. Area attractions, including the Cancun Convention Center are located close to Hotel Imperial Laguna Faranda Cancún. Plaza Caracol, a large shopping center as well as a number of nightclubs and restaurants are nearby. Rooms are furnished with kitchenettes, stoves and private balconies. Guests can also take advantage of the hotel's outdoor swimming pool. Rate does not include an eco-tax of 72,62 MXN per room per night, which must be paid upon arrival.

name: Casa Cielo Cancun
address: 75 Avenida Bonampak Calle Cielo L 12, 77524 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Casa Cielo Cancun, you'll be centrally located in Cancun, a 1-minute drive from Plaza Las Americas and 6 minutes from Puerto Cancun Marina Town Center. Featured amenities include multilingual staff and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Aquamarina Beach Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This charming establishment enjoys a prime location in the main tourist area in Cancún, where guests will be able to easily access the marinas, several local business centres or the beautiful Playa Linda sandy beach. Moreover, travellers can get to Cancun's International Airport in around 30 minutes and take a bus to the city centre in less than 5 minutes or go to Pok-Ta-Pok golf course to try their swing. This hotel counts with different types of accommodation, but all of them are decorated in a cosy and warm style to guarantee a totally pleasant stay in paradise. They are equipped with a private balcony or terrace with stunning views of the Caribbean Sea as well as air-conditioning to overcome the heat. Guests can enjoy a wide arrange of included services and well-kept facilities, such as live entertainment shows for the evenings and a swimming pool with a swim-up bar. NEW YEAR EVE EVENT $50.00USD PER ADULT & $25.00USD PER CHILDREN 7/12 YEARS OLD. (0/6 YEARS OLD FREE) CHARGES DIRECTLY AT THE HOTEL. THIS IS NOT MANDATORYFarePortal

name: Marriott Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulcan, Retorno Chac L-41, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by the Caribbean Sea and situated directly on the beach, this elegant hotel offers luxurious accommodation and amenities including a spa and outdoor pool. Marriot Cancun Resort offers guests spacious rooms, private balconies and flat-screen TVs. Guests can also enjoy cuisine dishes in one of the hotel's 8 gourmet restaurants including Mikado Japanese Teppan Yaki and Sasi Thai. A variety of children's programs and a playground are offered. Marriot Cancun Resort features numerous water recreational activities and an on-site tour desk.

name: Rancho Sakol
address: Super Manzana 7 Lote 3, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set on a beautiful beach in the Riviera Maya, Rancho Sakol is 25 minutes' walk or 10 minutes' by bike from the center of Puerto Morelos. This charming Inn offers free use of bikes and snorkelling equipment. Rooms at Rancho Sakol have authentic Mexican-style décor and a balcony or terrace with views of the sea or gardens. Each room features a ceiling fan and a private bathroom with a shower. You can enjoy a free self-service breakfast each morning, including coffee, fresh fruit, cereal, breads and yoghurt. You can also cook eggs to your liking and squeeze your own orange juice. Rancho's central palapa area features terraces overlooking the ocean and an indoor sand area with an adult-size swing as well as free Wi-Fi. The popular resorts of Playa del Carmen and Cancun are both a 30-minute drive away, while Cancun International Airport is just a 25-minute drive away. Free private parking is available at the Rancho.

name: Secrets Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Cancun-Puerto Morelos Km 27. 5 Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Secrets Riviera Cancun, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is an all Preferred-Club-Suite resort for adults seeking an exquisite getaway with pampered, destination-concierge style service. Guests will enjoy exclusive, Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions such as a boundless gourmet feast at Rosewater and inspirational dining options on the beach with top shelf spirits, along with 24-hour in room dining. With exclusive, free-flow access to Breathless, guests can enjoy a rejuvenating spa treatment at the relax Spa by Pevonia®, join a water aerobics class, cool down with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool, or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJ's. No matter a guest's desires, Secrets Riviera Cancun provides an array of endless opportunities to create romantic, timeless memories.FarePortal

address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 10.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Hotel Zone, Grand Park Royal Cancun is a perfect starting point from which to explore Cancun. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Grand Park Royal Cancun. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature flat screen television, private pool, fan, whirlpool bathtub, air conditioning. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Grand Park Royal Cancun combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Cancun unforgettable. The use of purified water dispensers is implemented in the hotel areas. Each room will be placed 1 container of water per person (over 12 years old), the use of plastic water bottles will be replaced.Ticket Package

Inside the hotel, you will find a wealth of activities for every member of the family, whether for fun or relaxation. name: Beachscape Kin Ha Villas & Suites
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Cancun resort is a 3-minute drive from Pok-ta-Pok Golf course, in northern Cancún. This hotel offers an outdoor pool, children’s pool, convenience store and salon with massage services. The Beachscape Kin Ha Villas and Suites provide guests free Wi-Fi in public areas, a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can work out in the gym or use the laundry facilities. Suites come with cable TV and a private balcony. A full private bathroom, cable TV, balcony and full kitchen are also some of the features offered by these accommodations. Kin Ha Villas and Suites offers 2 on-site restaurants that include breakfast and lunch, while à la carte options are available for dinner. Guests can also dine at La Palapa, a beach bar and grill. There is a wide range of restaurants and bars within a short walk. The hotel offers direct access to the beach, which is popular for snorkelling and swimming. The property also boasts convenience stores and spa services on site. Beachscape Kin Ha Villas is 12 miles from the Cancun Airport.

name: Kempinski Hotel Cancún
address: Retorno del Rey #36, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski features 2 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and a private beach. It offers modern rooms equipped with an iPod docking station, CD player and cable TV. The centre of Cancun is 18 km away. Kempinski spa and Salon offers a wide range of massage therapies, body treatments and facials. There is also a gym and tennis court. Cabanas are available on the hotel’s private beach. The Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski elegant rooms feature a mini bar and work desk. All rooms have a balcony with ocean views. The private bathroom includes a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Dining options range from traditional Asian specialties at The Sushi Bar to Mediterranean cuisine at Fantino. Indoor or outdoor dining is available and cocktails are served at the Lobby Lounge. Just 20-minutes from Cancun International Airport, the Grand Hotel Cancun - Managed by Kempinski can arrange airport and area attraction transportation. Aquaworld, offering boat trips, is 2 km away.

name: Planet Hollywood Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort
address: Crta a Punta Sam, SM006 Mza 002 Lote 07-08 Costera Zona Continental, Municipio de Isla Mujeres, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: We’ve created the ultimate beachfront vacation locale featuring Hollywood memorabilia, themed experiences, a star-worthy spa, and a variety of all-inclusive dining venues and bars, transforming the everyday all-inclusive vacation into a PHabulous getaway. From the imaginative and immersive programs offered at the Stars Kids Club to a new world of flavors offered at themed restaurants and pumped-up PHit fitness program, Planet Hollywood Cancun, An Autograph Collection All-Inclusive Resort brings big-screen excitement to the beautiful beachfront of Costa Mujeres, Cancun.Marriott

name: Mex Hoteles
address: 28 Av Carlos Nader 2, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: A 10-minute walk from Cancun Bus Station, Mex Hoteles has an accessible setting, making it an ideal base when in Cancun. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel offers comfortable 4-star rooms and a bar. This modern hotel features a number of facilities, including free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. After a day of exploring the local region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. There is a range of breakfast options on offer each morning. Mex Hoteles is situated within a 10-minute walk of Avenida Tulum. Its central position offers easy access to local culture, shopping and entertainment.Revato

name: Ambiance Suites
address: Av. Tulum No. 227 S.M. 20, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in central Cancún, Ambiance Suites offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned suites with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and free Wi-Fi. The nearest beaches are a 5-minute drive away. The rooms at Ambiance Suites feature tiled floors and modern décor, with light wood furniture. Each one comes with an iPod docking station and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Cancún. The Ambiance Suites is near to Cancún’s major hospitals and clinics. The Mega Shopping Centre is 4 minutes’ drive away, and you can drive to Cancún Airport in just 20 minutes.

name: Mansion Giahn Bed & Breakfast
address: Carlos Salinas De Gortari No 30, 77560 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The Mansion Giahn Bed & Breakfast is well located in the suburbs of Cancun in a quiet and peaceful area away from the noise and the traffic; a place where you can leave your hectic lifestyle behind. The neighborhood structures are also luxurious and magnificent in a Mediterranean style. The uniqueness of the architecture of our Bed & Breakfast makes everybody feel part of one big family. There is some of the original furnishings of the Giahn family throughout the house. It provides many conveniences and comfort at affordable prices. Each room at this property features modern decoration and a private bathroom with a shower and toilet. air conditioning, while others boast views of the swimming pool. You will be able to enjoy a lush tropical garden with fruit trees.Breakfast is served every day for a fee, and a small convenience store just steps away. Guests will also find restaurants and bars within a 5-minute drive. Cancun’s main tourist area is 10 km from Mansion Giahn, while the ancient Mayan ruins of Tulum are a 1.5-hour drive away. Mansion Giahn is conveniently located: 10 minutes from the airport 10 minutes from Hotel Zone 10 minutes from downtown Cancun We speak your language! Mansion Giahn Bed & Breakfast has been welcoming All Booking guests since 5 Aug 2010Expedia

name: One Cancun Centro
address: Av. Tulum Esq. Banco Chinchorro, 1-01, 77504 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: If youre visiting Cancn for business or leisure, choose to stay at the one Cancn Centro (Downtown). This affordable hotel is strategically located close to all the resort town's main attractions and offers the security and comfort you need to rest, recharge and stay productive. The hotel is located in Downtown Cancn, just 15 minutes from the Cancn International Airport, 5 minutes from the Beach Hotel Zone and 2 minutes from Malecn Amricas, the largest and most important business and shopping center in the city. one Cancn proves that traveling to this great city for business or pleasure doesn't have to be expensive. Guests at the one enjoy secure surroundings, comfortable facilities and modern style, plus efficient and helpful service to help make your visit even easier.Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 79.88 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Benito Jurez, Quintana Roo (Cancn).iHotelier/iStay

name: Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort Adults Only
address: Lote Rth-7-PM-II, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Located in beautiful Playa Mujeres, complete with famous white sandy beaches and stunning ocean views in a privileged gated community. This brand new, AAA Four Diamond award winning, adults-only, all-suite resort is only 35 minutes from the Cancun International Airport and 10 minutes from downtown Cancun, in an 18-hole signature Greg Norman golf course. Featuring 424 suites, 9 restaurants and 7 bars; open air spaces make it ideal to enjoy the warm ocean breeze and get a tropical feeling. It features two protected flora and fauna areas where some of the region's flowers and birds can be seen and photographed. Each of the luxurious, comfortable suites are finely appointed with wood elements and spacious terraces.  All Secrets Playa Mujeres guests have the opportunity to enjoy Exchange Privileges (Free flow access) to Dreams Playa Mujeres, located next door, adding 10 restaurants and 13 bars options. Ticket Package

name: Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel
address: 4 Cenzontle Zona Hotelera, 77500 Puerto Juárez, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel is within a 30-minute drive of Cancun International Airport and offers an infinity pool. Those staying at the property can also make use of free wireless internet. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the hotel, such as a lake, a tour desk and luggage storage. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel features 28 rooms that are equipped with everything required for a comfortable stay. Casa Tortugas Boutique Hotel is a convenient place to explore nearby Gran Puerto and Spa at The Royal Sands. An airport shuttle service is also available on request.Revato

name: Abbey Del Sol
address: 806 Av. Niños Heroes, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: One of the quietest and most private apartments at Abbey del Sol. Glass sliding doors open onto your private garden patio. The perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee and meals. Large table with an umbrella and 4 chairs. Two loungers to relax and read. This is one of our larger ground-floor apartments; spacious, comfortable, and well-maintained. New king bed with foam top covered with 500 thread count sheets. Well-equipped kitchen with granite countertops. Free Wi-Fi, bikes, and a flat-screen TV. Linens supplied. The Abbey del Sol property has 7 comfortable apartments. Rent individually for couples and small families or in combination for groups and large families. Beautiful gardens, a refreshing pool. 2 blocks to the beach, and 8 blocks to the town square. Central office is onsite with friendly English-speaking staff to help you with anything you need. "Abbey del Sol. Where Travelers find a home!"Expedia

description: BELOVED PLAYA MUJERES BY EXCELLENCE GROUP - ALL IN is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cancun. Convenience and comfort make BELOVED PLAYA MUJERES BY EXCELLENCE GROUP - ALL IN the perfect choice for your stay in Cancun.priceline.com

name: Hotel Batab
address: Av. Chichen Itza No. 52 Sm 23, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is a 30-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and 3 blocks from the bus station. The hotel offers an on-site restaurant and free Wi-Fi throughout. Hotel Batab features air-conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. All rooms are also equipped with cable TV and telephones. Restaurant Lol-Ha serves Mexican and Arabic cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Room service is also available. A Caribbean Sea beach is a short cab ride from El Batab. Guests can also explore the nearby Mercado 28 shopping area.

name: Hyatt Ziva Riviera Cancun
address: Bahia de Petempich, SM 12, MZ 31, Lote 14-02, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located in Puerto Morelos, 12.4 km away from the town center, 19.8 away from Cancun International Cancun Underwater Museum (33.6 km), State Government Palace Zona Norte (33.5 km), and Estadio de Beisbol Beto Ávila (31 km). Facilities and services include a children's pool, spa facilities, a pool, a restaurant, a bar, a lounge area, concierge facilities, business services, meeting facilities, gym/fitness facilities, and Wi-Fi. Rooms feature Air conditioning, a balcony/terrace, shower, a minibar/fridge, Wi-Fi, a telephone, a TV, a bathroom, a hair dryer, and towels. Address: Bahia de Petempich, SM 12, MZ 31, Lote 14-02, Puerto Morelos, 77580, Mexico.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Del Sol
address: Av. Lopez Portillo Mz 2Lt 1A SM85, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel in Cancun, Mexico offers free wireless internet access. The Hotel del Sol offers an ideal location for exploring everything that the famous Cancun has to offer. Guests can enjoy scuba-diving, snorkeling and sailing all just minutes from the hotel. There are also many unique shops for guests to explore nearby. Guests at the Hotel del Sol will enjoy the air-conditioning and satellite television available in each guestroom. The hotel's restaurant and bar also provides an easy dining option for guests.

name: Club Regina Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 20.5, Hotels Area, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located on the beachfront on Kukulkan Boulevard, Rantree’s Club Regina has an outdoor pool, private beach area, and a specialized staff that works to entertain the guests. Parking is possible on site. Rooms feature modern minimalist décor and include a flat-screen TV, telephone, alarm clock and ironing facilities. Some rooms also have a sofa bed. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer, free toiletries and towels. The property has its own restaurant and bar on site. You can also find a good variety of options along Kulkulkan Boulevard. La Isla Shopping Village is 15 minutes’ drive away, while Plaza Caracol Shopping Centre, the Plaza Forum by the Sea and Coco Bongo Club are within a 20-minute drive. Cancun International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Renaissance Cancun Resort & Marina
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 1.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in an exclusive area in the city's hotel zone, the all-new Renaissance Cancun Resort & Marina is a scenic haven in a lively travel destination. Find respite in our Cancun, Mexico luxury resort featuring contemporary essentials, premium amenities and inspiring views of the city and bay. Stay within steps of the beach in the Cancun entertainment zone near Marina Town Center Mall, Isla Mujeres and popular shops, restaurants and pubs in downtown. Thrill your palate with delectable international fare and creative cocktails at our two stylish restaurants, cafe and bar. Plan meetings, weddings and social engagements in our sophisticated event space, enhanced by expert planners, custom catering options and personalized travel packages. Cap a memorable day with a refreshing swim in the sparkling pool and work out in the modern fitness center of our Puerto Cancun hotel. A trendy destination amid a vibrant hotspot, Renaissance Cancun Resort & Marina is the perfect place to call home during a visit to Mexico.Marriott

name: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres
address: Carr Punta Sam - Isla Blanca,Mz 2, Lt 10, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Secrets Playa Blanca Costa Mujeres offers the perfect backdrop for romantic relaxation and exploration, situated along a secluded strip of idyllic oceanfront coast, only 12 miles north of Cancun and a short drive to championship golf and a variety of historical local attractions. This all-adult, luxury property resides on an expansive and pristine white-sand beach with crystal-clear waters and features 507 modern suites each embellished with handmade art and furnishings crafted from organic, locally sourced materials, providing a truly authentic experience. The elevated Preferred Club accommodations provide an extra level of luxury with upgraded amenities and exclusive access to the Preferred Club Lounge, an oceanfront Beach Bar and a unique pool surrounded by lush vegetation. Indulge with Unlimited-Luxury®, where everything is included. Astonish your palate with limitless gourmet dining, sip top-shelf spirits served at our elegant bars and lounges and enjoy a wide variety of entertainment offered both day and night. From calming beachfront infinity pools overlooking the ocean to an engaging activities pool offering excitement throughout the day, there is something for everyone. Wind down with a specialty treatment at the Secrets Spa by Pevonia®, delight in evening shows at the theater or try one of our culinary experiences from wine and tequila tastings to cooking classes.Sembo

name: Riu Caribe
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 5.5, Lote 6-c, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. This property does not permit name changes on reservations. The name on the booking must match the name of the guest who is checking in and staying at the property; photo ID is required. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for golf tee times, massage services, and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the aparthotel prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. The property is cleaned and disinfected using an electrostatic sprayer. Personal protective equipment, including masks, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer; masks are required in public areas. Enhanced food service safety measures are in place. Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Covid-19 Health Protocol (RIU). Mandatory Fees and Taxes You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: MXN 79.88 per accommodation, per night We have included all charges provided to us by the property.Ticket Package

name: Bsea Cancun Plaza Hotel
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km. 19.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering accommodations with views of the Caribbean Sea, BSEA Cancun Plaza Hotel is set on Cancún’s beachfront, just a 5-minute drive from the Wet n' Wild aquatic park. It features 2 outdoor swimming pools: one for adults-only. Each brightly decorated suite and room at BSEA Cancun Plaza Hotel has air conditioning and an electronic key, plus a safe. They have cable TV and private bathrooms available. Set in a Palapa thatched hut, the BSEA Cancun Plaza Hotel's restaurant serves a range of Mexican-inspired cuisine and home-style pizzas. The hotel also features a mini-supermarket and parking. The centre of Cancún is less than 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Staff at the front desk can arrange trips to Xcaret, Chichen Itza and Túlum, as well as excursions to the jungle and Isla Mujeres. It operates from 08:00 to 22:00.

name: Hotel Blue Star Cancun
address: 102 Palenque 26, 77509 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Blue Star Cancun features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room comes with a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Blue Star Cancun. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Beto Avila Stadium, Cancun Bus Station and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 18 km from Hotel Blue Star Cancun, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: All Ritmo Cancun Resort & Water Park
address: Km. 1.5 Carretera a Puerto Juarez, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Boasting a privileged location in a beautiful corner of the Caribbean, this charming complex is the perfect choice for families travelling with children. Guests will find themselves just 22 kilometres from Cancun International Airport and just a few steps from a white sandy beach ideal for those looking for peace and tranquillity. The comfortable and spacious accommodation options offer all the necessary services and amenities to enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience. Standard suites have been decorated in a contemporary style and offer views over the garden or to the pool. The suites include vibrant colours and come with a balcony or terrace and a cosy living room ideal to share moments with the family. Visitors will be delighted by the wide selection of dining options including national and international specialities and the youngest guests may appreciate the complete entertainment programme.FarePortal

name: Hilton Garden Inn Cancun Airport
address: Carr. Cancun-Chetumal KM. 22, 77569 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located at Cancun International Airport, we are just outside Terminal 2. We’re five minutes from Highway 307, with easy access to Cancun, Playa del Carmen, and Tulum. Our hotel is 30 minutes from downtown, the hotel zone, and Isla Mujeres ferry. We have an on-site restaurant and bar, plus a panoramic terrace and outdoor pool.Hilton

name: Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun
address: Carr Chetuma Km 27 5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This sophisticated hotel, which can be found in North Riviera Maya, is a great option for families. The total number of rooms is 148. Wi-Fi internet connection is available for further comfort and convenience. All guests staying at this property can enjoy the convenience of 24-hour reception. Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun does not offer cots on demand. Common areas are suitable for wheelchair-disabled people. The car park may be useful to those arriving by car. Margaritaville Island Reserve Riviera Cancun follows environmentally sustainable practices. Those who stay at this establishment may take advantage of its catering options. Visitors may appreciate the health and wellness services offered at the hotel. Some services may be subject to additional charges.FarePortal

name: GR Caribe by Solaris
address: Blvd Kukulcan Lote 64 Bis 2da etapa seca, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is conveniently situated in the southern part of Cancun's hotel zone, directly on the fine white sandy beach and close to the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea. It has a modern Mediterranean-style architecture and boasts an elegant interior design. The international airport can be reached within a 10-minute drive and the main shopping malls are about 15 minutes away. This family-friendly establishment offers a choice of different room types ranging from Deluxe rooms to Luxury Oceanfront Rooms featuring a wide range of top quality amenities, such as an IPod docking station and satellite TV. As for dining choices, the hotel offers two restaurants including international specialities and vegetarian menus. It also provides beachfront hot tubs, ideal to enjoy a moment of relaxation every time of day.Ticket Package

name: Paradisus Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 16.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated on the soft white sand beaches of Cancun, this exclusive beach resort provides the perfect accommodations for your vacation getaway. Paradisus Cancun is a chance to experience the stunning beauty that has made Cancun an international destination in the comfort of a luxury resort on par with the highest standards of excellence. This commitment to quality is why Paradisus Cancun has been awarded Four Diamond honors since 2006 by AAA. Luxurious, spacious and elegantly decorated rooms on a pristine beach that is short 15 minutes from the airport. Whether you are on the beach, at one of the four lagoon-inspired pools, or dining in any of our nine on-site restaurants, our goal is your total satisfaction. Indulge yourself with upgraded The Reserve service, an exclusive experience for adults, families and groups with skilled concierge service, private areas and a complete list of upgraded amenities. YHI SPA with authentic wellness activities and treatments. Romance by Paradisus offers six packages meticulously designed to meet every dream.FarePortal

name: JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 14.5, Lote 40-A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Indulge in a revitalizing retreat at one of the best Cancun luxury resorts JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa, where you'll discover numerous upscale amenities including spacious, sand-toned accommodations, on-site dining and premier access to alluring destinations. Dedicate a day to exploring the historical Mayan ruins and experience the area's lively clubs and bars, dancing your nights away. Watch the sunrise over the blue Mexican Caribbean Sea, unwind with a dip in the infinity pool, retreat to a beachfront Bali daybed or pursue a little wellness at the world-class Mayan-inspired spa Sens-yah. JW Marriott Cancun Resort & Spa offers five international restaurants Sasi Thai, Gustino Italian Grill, Bella Candela, Bravio Spanish Cuisine & La 16 Mexican cuisine. The only thing left to do is toast to it all with creative craft cocktails offerings from the JW Lobby Bar’s 150 Margaritas Menu and delight exquisite shareable plates at Bella Candela. Check out our Cancun resort deals today.Marriott

name: Royal Solaris Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 20.5, Lote 64, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: Approx. 50 m from sandy beach is located the hotel Royal Solaris Cancun. At the beach, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers free of charge available. The nearest shopping facilities are located approx. 7 m from the hotel, a supermarket can be reached after around 6 km. For evening dancing you will find a nightclub in a distance of approx. 10 km. For medical treatment in emergencies there is a hospital around 22 km away. The airport (CUN) is approx. 32 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The 7-storey beach hotel has 305 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 11:00), a lobby with bar, 3 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), theater and a free parking area. For the meals, there are three restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi is available for free. Room cleaning and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool with a children´s pool integrated into the main pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. A golf course is located approx. 16 km from the hotel. Spa area and massages available for a fee. Solarium, steam bath and hamam available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: activity programme. In the outside area of the hotel there is a play area for children. Child supervision: activity programme for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: American Express and Visa. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort
address: Kukulcan Boulevard Km 4.5 Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 201 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and ovens. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at The Royal Cancun All Suites Resort in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Tortuga Beach and La Isla Shopping Mall. This 4-star aparthotel is 0.8 mi (1.2 km) from Playa Tortugas and 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Puerto Cancun Marina Town Center. Dining Satisfy your appetite with American cuisine at La Palapa Restaurant, one of the aparthotel's 4 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 4 bars/lounges. name: City Express by Marriott Cancun
address: Av. Nichupté S.M. 8 Mza 1 Lote 4, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: City Express by Marriott Cancun is the ideal place to stay on your next vacation to this Mexican paradise. Our hotel is located in the city center, next to the boardwalk and Las Americas mall, near the most beautiful beaches of the city. Cancun is a renowned tourist destination, known for its magical beaches with crystalline waters and soft white sand. Two popular beaches nearby City Express by Marriott are playa Tortugas and Punta Cancun, both perfect for relaxing and enjoying yourself with friends or family.But there is a lot more to see while you're here. Make the most of your trip and visit the Mayan ruins in Tulum, Coba, Uxmal and Chichen Itz. There are several different tours you can take to see these archeological sites.If you've got the time, we recommend you take a trip to Xcaret, an eco-archeological theme park where you and your family can see all kinds of wildlife and enjoy performances, showcasing the Mayan culture. We have parking subject to availability.Marriott

name: Krystal Grand Punta Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan km 8.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), Krystal Grand Cancún is within a 10-minute walk of Cancun Convention Center and Chac Mool Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. This resort has 6 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Riu Palace Las Americas
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: A slice of Spain on the Caribbean is on display at Riu Palace Las Americas, in the heart of the hotel zone and near shops and night clubs. This beachside resort is 8.5 km (less than 6 mi) from downtown Cancun. The resort features 6 restaurants, 5 bars, 2 outdoor pools, an outdoor spa tub, and a swimming pool. Room rates include 24-hour room service, spa, gym, water-sports equipment, daily activities, and RIU evening programs. Most Riu Palace guestrooms feature balconies with ocean or lagoon views. All suites feature minibars, satellite TVs, turndown service, WIFI, in-room safes, and bathroom amenities.WebBeds

name: Hive Cancun
address: Av Huayacán, Smza 336 Mza 9 Lote 1, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hive Cancun by G Hotels has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Cancún. The property is around 5.3 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, 9 km from Beto Avila Stadium and 10 km from Cancun Government Palace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel the rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Hive Cancun by G Hotels offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Cancun Bus Station is 11 km from the accommodation, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 13 km from Hive Cancun by G Hotels.

name: Sandos Cancun Luxury Resort
address: Km 14 Mz 53 Lote 37-1 ZH, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Avani Cancún Airport Hotel
address: Carr Fed Cancun-Puerto Morelos SM47 M01, 77506 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The 4* Avani Cancún Airport is located just seven minutes from Cancún International Airport, close to local tourist attractions. Surrounded by lush jungle greenery and a short distance from Cancún’s beautiful sandy beaches, the hotel offers business and leisure guests 140 comfortable rooms and suites to choose from. All the rooms feature a contemporary design, Lavazza coffee machines, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. An international buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant daily, with an early-bird option for early risers. Gluten-free and children’s options menu are available on request. The hotel’s dining options include local, national and international cuisine, with snacks, meals and drinks available in the hotel restaurant, the lobby bar or the poolside terrace bar. Meetings and special events can be held in the hotel’s well-equipped events spaces, with capacity of up to 265 guests. Those staying at the hotel enjoy complimentary access to the gym and the outdoor pool, where they can relax in lush, green surroundings.NH Hoteles

name: The Fives Oceanfront
address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

name: Selina Cancun Laguna Hotel Zone
address: Blvd. Kukulcan 9, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 400 metres from Playa Forum, Selina Cancun Laguna Hotel Zone offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near Selina Cancun Laguna Hotel Zone include Playa Gaviota Azul, Playa Chac Mool and Playa Punta Cancun. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort, Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal 307, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Reignite meaningful connections at an adults-only aged 18+ resort where elevated experiences create memories to last a lifetime. Located only 15 minutes from Cancun International Airport, your every desire is tailor-made. From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

name: Adhara Express
address: 41 Avenida Yaxchilán, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in downtown Cancun, Mexico, this hotel features a restaurant and free shuttle service to the public beach. Cancun beach is a short distance from the hotel. Guest rooms at the Adhara Express include a coffee maker and satellite LCD TV. The rooms also provide an in-room safe, a private balcony and air conditioning. Available services include laundry, baby sitting and a tour desk. Tulum, Xel-Ha and Chichen-Itza are within driving distance of the Ramada Cancun, Mexico. The Dolphin Discovery Isla Mujeres is 7 miles from the hotel.

name: Nomads Party Hostel
address: 12 Claveles SM 22, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Ideally located in Cancún, Nomads Party Hostel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. 400 metres from Cancun Government Palace and 600 metres from Cancun Bus Station, the property provides a shared lounge and a bar. The hotel has a sauna, year-round outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can dine in the restaurant. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. You can play billiards and table tennis at this 4-star hotel, and bike hire and car hire are available. Staff speak English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Nomads Party Hostel include Cristo Rey Church, Parque las Palapas and Cancun Culture Center. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 17 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ocean Coral & Turquesa
address: Super Manzana 12, Lote 1-05, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Special check-in instructions Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Know Before You Go Reservations are required for massage services and spa treatments. Reservations can be made by contacting the property prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. A fee for a mandatory Christmas Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 24. A fee for a mandatory New Year's Eve gala dinner is included in the total price displayed for stays on December 31. Children 2 years old and younger stay free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. Only registered guests are allowed in the guestrooms. No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Fees Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.Ticket Package

name: Intercontinental Presidente Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM 7.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from one of our 300 equipped rooms and suites in the best 5 star hotel in Cancun. Located in the hotel zone and the best beach in Cancun, a wide beach with a calm sea and no waves. 15 minutes from the city and nightlife and 30 minutes from the airport. Relax in our spa in a peaceful environment while your children have fun in our kids club with professional staff.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hostel Cancun Natura
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 9, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Hostel Natura in Cancun (Zona Hotelera), you'll be steps from Chac Mool Beach and 8 minutes by foot from Cancun Convention Center. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.Hotels.com

name: Ibis Cancun Centro
address: Av Tulum y Nichupte Supermanzana 11 M2 L3, 77504 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: ibis Cancun Centro, in the city's largest business district, is just steps from Las Americas shopping center, 15 minutes from the airport, and 10 minutes from Cancun's crystal-clear waters. Offering 190 modern, comfortable rooms, ibis Kitchen Lounge restaurant, daily breakfast buffet, bar with 24/7 snack service. Free WiFi, parking and facilities for those with special needs. 100% smoke-freeaccorhotels.com

name: Hotel Amar Inn
address: Lazaro Cardenas, Lote 4, SM2, Mz1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Only 30 metres from Puerto Morelos’ Playa Mar Beach and 400 metres from Plaza Central, Hotel Amar Inn features some rooms with sea view. Free Wi-Fi access is available. Amar Inn’s rooms provide you with TV with cable channels and air-conditioning. There is also a refrigerator, extras include a fan. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and towels. At Hotel Amar Inn you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. A typical Mexican breakfast is included in the room rates. Guests can find restaurants within 250 metres, and a supermarket is within 5-minutes walk. Cancún International Airport is 21 km away, while Playa del Carmen is a 30 minutes' drive.

name: Oasis Palm
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property is a beachfront, 11 km away from Cancun town center, and 11 km away from Cancun International Airport. Facilities and services include 24 hr reception, air conditioning, babysitting services, bar, car parking, banquet facilities, garden, fitness facilities, non smoking property, outdoor pool, restaurant, safe box, spa and TV. Rooms feature airconditioning, safe box, alarm clock, TV, cable channels, free toiletries, shower, toilet paper. Address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4.5, Hotel Zone, Cancun, Mexico, 77500.WebBeds

name: Hotel Nyx Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 11.5 Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located on a 14-mile stretch of pristine beachfront in Cancun’s hotel zone, NYX Hotel Cancun. has an infinity pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Some of its rooms have views of the sea or Nichupté Lagoon. All air-conditioned rooms at the NYX Hotel Cancun feature a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A coffee maker and free WiFi access are also included. Bellavista Restaurant offers international options. The Chianti Restaurant offers Italian cuisine, open for dinner with prior reservation required. There is also a poolside bar, as well as a lobby bar. The surrounding beaches are popular for water sports. You can go scuba diving at the 2 coral reefs or visit ancient Mayan sites nearby. Cancun Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Flamingo Cancun Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 11, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. This hotel is next to the beach, only 20 minutes from downtown Cancun. The hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. Flamingo Cancun Resort also features air conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. The rooms offer a view of the lagoon or a view of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy music, activities and a swim-up bar at the main pool. The Flamingo also offers an oceanfront pool with a relaxing atmosphere. A gym is available. La Fuente Restaurant serves international cuisine with views of the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront Albatros Restaurant and Bar is open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails and music are available at the Palenque Lobby Bar. This is our guests' favorite part of Cancún, according to independent reviews. Couples in particular like the location - they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip. We speak your language! Flamingo Cancun Resort has been welcoming  guests since Sept 13, 2010 Most popular facilities 1 swimming pool Spa Fitness center Room service Restaurant Facilities for disabled guests Non-smoking rooms Bar Good Breakfast Beachfront ATM & Currency Exchange: Need cash? There's an ATM and a currency exchange service at this property.VRBO

name: Krystal Cancun
address: Paseo Kukulcan Km 9 Lotes 9 y 9 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is on the ocean and across from the Cancun Convention Center. It features a sauna, hot tub, an oceanfront pool, while rooms include a minibar and cable TV. Each room at Krystal Cancun provides air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available in every room. The Krystal offers on-site car rental services. Other services include event organization, laundry facilities and a tour desk. Hacienda El Mortero restaurant is on-site at Cancun Krystal. It provides traditional Mexican cuisine and live mariachi music. The resort also offers a buffet breakfast and on-site bars. Only a short walk from the Krystal Cancun are numerous shops and restaurants. Guests at the resort will also find easy access to a variety of recreational activities including snorkeling, sailing and fishing.

name: Sunset Royal Beach Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km. 10 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The charming beach hotel is strategically located in the heart of the hotel zone in Cancun. It is surrounded by the most famous nightclubs in the city as well as several restaurants and shops. The hotel is located just 25 km from Cancun International Airport. Renovated in 2011, the hotel has 204 well-equipped rooms as well as 4 restaurants and 3 bars offering gourmet food and imported drinks. The air-conditioned club resort welcomes its guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange facilities and lift access to the upper floors. Further facilities include a children's playground, kids' club and a cafe. Each of the well-equipped guest rooms features an en suite bathroom and a private terrace or balcony. Further room amenities include an LCD cable TV, a minibar and Internet access for a comfortable and relaxing holiday.FarePortal

name: Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown
address: Av. Tulum Sm. 4 Mza. 14 Lote 2, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown is located in the heart of downtown Cancun and very close to the world class entertainment, dining, and the beautiful white sand beaches of the Caribbean Sea. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, our central location makes us ideal for a family vacation, a weekend getaway or the business traveler needs. We're just steps from Malecon Americas, one of the biggest shopping malls in town, as well as banks, government offices, hospitals, pharmacies and restaurants. There are also plenty of fun activities nearby, including water sports, boating, water parks, fishing excursions, archaeological ruins, casinos, shopping outlets and golfing! Our guest rooms offer pillowtop mattresses, a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron and board, in-room safe, 32" LCD TV with premium channels, alarm clock radio, free high speed internet and free local calls. Our hotel offers a Traditional Breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet access in all our public areas, 24-hour business center, a fully equipped fitness center, relaxing outdoor pool, room service and a Mexican Restaurant. After a day of hard work enjoy your favorite drink while watching your favorite sports game at our lobby bar. The Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown team is focused in an excellence service. Guests are treated to warm hospitality and personal attention.Wyndham

name: Dreams Natura Riviera Cancun
address: Sm 31, Mz 03, Lote 101-21, Km 332, 77500 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located 15 minutes away from Cancun International Airport This family-friendly beachfront resort offers guests an Unlimited-Luxury® vacation, where everything is included: 24-hour access to unlimited food and beverage options, à la carte dining with no reservations, endless activities for all ages and more. Rooms and suites feature comforts including a private balcony or terrace and a fully stocked mini-bar. Opening November 2019- Inspired by the surrounding Mayan jungle, the all-new Now Natura Riviera Cancun will offer a unique Unlimited-Luxury® experience. Facing the Caribbean Sea on a white sand beach, the 556-room resort is a short 10-mile drive from the Cancun International AirportWebBeds

name: Sotavento Hotel & Yacht Club
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km 4 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Directly on Nichupte Lagoon, across from the street from the Caribbean Sea, in Cancun's hotel zone, this hotel offers a private yacht club, tropical gardens and an on-site restaurant. Sotavento Hotel & Yacht Club features relaxing facilities such as an outdoor swimming pool. Guests will also enjoy the hotel's La Palapa Restaurant, which services regional and international dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Cancun city centre is only minutes from the Sotavento Hotel. Guests can spend the day at the nearby beach snorkelling or soaking up the sun, then explore a variety of area restaurants and bars in the evening. The property is located just 200 metres from Cancun Theater and 300 metres from Isla Mujeres ferry.

name: Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote Rth-7-pm-ii, Lte1, Mz 1, Smz 3, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

description: With 2 outdoor pools, an on-site dive centre and à la carte, international restaurant, Ocean Dream BPR is located in Cancún, right on a beautiful white-sand beach. It is just 100 metres from restaurants and nightlife. Each spacious, modern room here includes a cable TV, safety-deposit box and free WiFi. They also boast a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At Ocean Dream BPR Condo Hotel you will find a private beach area. Cancun Convention Centre, plus small stores, banks and bars, is just a 5-minute walk away. Plaza Caracol shopping centre is just 850 metres from the hotel, while Cancun International Airport can be reached within 25 minutes by car. The property offers free parking.

name: Gr Solaris Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkan KM. 19.5, Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This family-friendly beach hotel is ideally situated directly on the seemingly endless white sandy beach, overlooking the azure waters of the Caribbean Sea. The El Rey archaeological zone is only a few steps away, and Cancun International Airport can be reached within 15 minutes by car. The resort features four restaurants and three bars offering both local and international specialties. Guests might make use of the fitness centre and a spa area, and families will delight in the kids' club and nightly entertainment including theme nights, magic shows, karaoke and a casino. Guests can also enjoy courses and daily activities such as cooking and Spanish classes, yoga, and beach volleyball, all during a wonderful, sunny family retreat in Cancun.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Luma by Kavia
address: Calle Claveles No. 109 LT. 1,3,3-A,5, 31, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Luma by Kavia provides free WiFi throughout the property, a restaurant and free private parking for guests who drive. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Certain rooms at the property include a balcony with a city view. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, guest rooms at Hotel Luma by Kavia have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a terrace. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at Hotel Luma by Kavia can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Beto Avila Stadium. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from Hotel Luma by Kavia.

name: Sunset Marina Resort & Yacht Club
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km. 5.8, Zona Hotelena, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This full-service resort provides everything needed for a stress-free vacation. Located on the lagoon side of the Boulevard Kukulkan, it is at a 5-minute drive from the heart of the hotel zone where the best shopping centres, nightclubs and the convention centre are to be found. Guests arriving from Cancun International Airport can arrange a shuttle service for the 20 minute journey. Once they arrive at the venue they will be immediately enchanted by the elegant, relaxing and family atmosphere. All of the guest's rooms are equipped with the best in modern comforts and they guarantee pleasant and cosy stay. When the evening comes guests can either see one of the shows at the outdoor open-air theatre or make their pick between the 3 bars, each serving both domestic and imported beverages and offering a stylish and friendly atmosphere.FarePortal

name: Seven Boutique Apartments Cancún
address: Av. Bonampak 53, SM 4, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 2.8 km from Playa Las Perlas and 1.6 km from Cancun Government Palace in the centre of Cancún, Seven Boutique Apartments Cancún features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Offering a balcony or patio with views of the pool, the units feature air conditioning, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV and kitchen. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. At the aparthotel guests are welcome to take advantage of spa facilities and wellness packages. Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool or use the business centre that offers printing, copying and fax services. Seven Boutique Apartments Cancún has a garden and sun terrace, which can be enjoyed by guests if the weather permits. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Beto Avila Stadium, Cancun Bus Station and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 16 km from Seven Boutique Apartments Cancún, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa (Adults Only)
address: Calle 12 Mza. 41 Lote 2-04, Bahia Petempich, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

The Pyramid also features tennis courts and a fitness centre as part of its facilities. Night entertainment with a show, nightclub and a shared lounge are also some of the features that guests will find here. The surroundings are good for practicing snorkelling, diving and windsurfing. La Isla Shopping Village, an elegant shopping mall featuring designer and brand shops, restaurants and bars, is 1.2 km from the resort. Cancun International Airport can be reached in a 30-minute drive.

address: KM 27.5 Carr. Cancún - Tulum Mz 40 Lt 16, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos, 21 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 5-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. There is a hot tub, nightclub and a kids' club. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive each room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. Guests can enjoy playing billiards and tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. Beto Avila Stadium is 28 km from Sensira Resort & Spa Riviera Maya All Inclusive, while Cancun Government Palace is 29 km away. name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Cancun Airport
address: Blvd Luis Donaldo Colosio SM 305 Mza 01, 77533 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Rest easy at the new Fairfield Inn & Suites Cancun Airport, a contemporary hotel in Quintana Roo, Mexico. Unpack and recharge in stylishly appointed accommodations with thoughtful essentials, including complimentary Wi-Fi and ergonomic work desks. Fuel up for a day or exploration with a free breakfast of omelets, bacon, mini waffles and fresh fruit. Soak up the warm Cancun sunshine as you explore celebrated local attractions, including Experiencias Xcaret, Ventura Park, Paya Delfines, Plaza Caracol and Lagos Del Sol. Celebrate your big moments in versatile event venues and host flawless meetings and conferences in sophisticated meeting space with custom catering and AV equipment. When it's all said and done, refresh your body in the sparkling waters of our pool and get in a workout in our fitness center. At Fairfield Inn & Suites Cancun Airport, you’re our #1 priority. Ask us about The Fairfield 100% Guarantee™, where we promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right. That's our commitment to you.Marriott

description: Situated in a new Cancun commercial district near malls and just 10 minutes drive from main white sand beaches and a blue pristine sea, Hotel Casa Mallorca offers stylish accommodation with free Wifi. Cancun’s Hotel Zone and beaches are just 4 km away. Each room and suite features contemporary décor with views of the street, the park or the hotel courtyard. All rooms are air-conditioned. Free public parking is available nearby, while the Hotel Casa Mallorca 24-hour reception can arrange car rental and airport transfers on request, reserve any tourist activities. You can also book tours to Mayan ruins and cenotes. There are two parks in the surrounding area for jogging or enjoying the afternoon. Various bars, restaurants, gyms, spa, shopping centers, Cancun main cathedral can be found in the streets around Hotel Casa Mallorca. Cancun ADO Bus Station is within a 5-minute driving, while Cancun International Airport is a 25-minute drive away. Public bus stop is a 2 minutes' walk away.

address: 8 Blvd. Kukulcan, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo

This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel features a hot tub and a concierge service. Popular points of interest near Essenzia de Cancun include Caracol, Playa Gaviota Azul and Cancun Convention Center. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

All accommodation at the Emporio Cancun has cable TV. Suites also come with a kitchen and a dining and seating area. San Miguelito Archaeological Site and the Cancún Maya Museum are located in front of the hotel.

Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Kavia Plus include Cancun Government Palace, Beto Avila Stadium and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

After a swim in the outdoor pool, guests at Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancun can relax on the sundeck. The hotel's casual restaurant, Iguanas, serves international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
