The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

name: Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun, Gourmet All Inclusive by Karisma
address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Cancun Bay Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With breathtaking views of Mujeres Bay, Cancun Bay Resort features a beachfront pool and relaxation pool, tennis courts and a hot tub with a bar. It is located near several of Cancun's restaurants, shops and entertainment venues. Cancun International Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and Cancun's commercial area can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Each room and suite at the resort has a private balcony or terrace with views of the lagoon, garden or sea.FarePortal

name: Selina Cancun Downtown
address: Av. Tulum nº 75, Sm. 22, Mz. 26, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This Cancun hotel is less than 200 yards from ADO bus station. Tour information and guest rooms provide free Wi-Fi. The local bus station offers transportation to Cancun International Airport every 30 minutes. Selina Cancun is within walking distance from local restaurants.

name: Hotel Marina El Cid Spa
address: Boulevard el Cid Unidad 15, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This Quintana Roo hotel overlooks the Puerto Morelos National Reef Park. It features a full-service spa, full-service marina, a 22,000 square foot pool and an on-site travel company. Each suite at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort Cancun Riviera Maya is furnished with a minibar, coffee maker and provides satellite TV. Guests will also find a hairdryer, ironing facilities and a work desk in each suite. Four restaurants are available at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort. Mediterranean, casual international, Mexican and seafood dishes are offered at the hotel. The Hotel Marina Beach Resort contains a convention center and a gym. The outdoor pool features water slides and rock formations. An adults-only pool is also on site. El Cid Spa Hotel Marina & Beach Resort is less than one mile from the charming, bohemian fishing village of Puerto Morelos. It is 30 minutes from Playa del Carmen.

name: Hacienda de Castilla
address: Calle 17, Sm. 64, Mza. 23, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is just 5 minutes’ drive from Playa Blanca Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. There is a 24-hour reception desk and free private parking. All rooms at Hacienda de Castilla include cable TV and a private bathroom with toiletries. The La Hija de Villa bar-restaurant serves Mexican cuisine. Here, guests can also enjoy sporting events and live entertainment. The Mandala Beach Club is a 20-minute drive away and offers loungers, tables and parasols. Hotel guests receive discounts on food and drinks. Puerto Juarez Harbour is about 10 minutes’ drive away and offers ferries to Isla Mujeres. Cancún International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost.

name: Hotel Plaza Kokai Cancún
address: Av Uxmal No 26, Sm 2a, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Centrally located in one of Cancun’s most important residential areas, the Hotel Plaza Kokai is in an ideal position to explore downtown Cancun, the beautiful Mexican beaches or the Mayan delights the region has to offer. All of the guest rooms are comfortably furnished and well presented and offer the business or leisure traveler all the facilities one may need. With downtown Cancun on your doorstep, the shopping centers and delights of the city are all easy accessible.

name: Bel Air Collection Resort & Spa Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This award-winning hotel is situated in a major world-renowned tourist destination, Cancun, in southeastern Mexico. Guests will find a host of tourist attractions close to the property, such as El Rey ruins and Chicen Itza, a large pre-Columbian city built by Maya. It also enjoys a unique situation close to some shopping and entertainment venues in the area. Cancun International Airport is some 12 kilometres away. Ideal for business and leisure travellers alike, this exclusive resort offers all the necessary services and amenities to rest and relax in this stunning region. The guest rooms provide breathtaking views over the ocean or the lake as well as an ultra-plush duvet for guests' convenience. A wide range of on-site dining options is offered for guests to enjoy a unique culinary experience. From international fusion cuisine to regional specialities, travellers will find a host of tempting dishes.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Moloch Hostel & Suites
address: 54 Margaritas MZ. 25, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 200 metres from Cancun Bus Station, Moloch Hostel & Suites offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Cancun Government Palace, and within 2.3 km of the city centre. The units in the inn are fitted with a computer. Certain rooms also offer a kitchenette with a fridge, a microwave and a minibar. All guest rooms at Moloch Hostel & Suites feature air conditioning and a desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cristo Rey Church, Parque las Palapas and Cancun Culture Center. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from Moloch Hostel & Suites.

address: Calle Claveles Lt 07 09 Mz 4 SM 22, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Ideally set in Cancún, Hotel Kavia features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool and to a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a patio. All rooms have a wardrobe. At Hotel Kavia you will find a restaurant serving American cuisine. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Beto Avila Stadium. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from Hotel Kavia.

name: Terracaribe Hotel
address: Av. Lopez Portillo # 70, 77564 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Just 2 minutes from the ferry port for Isla Mujeres, this downtown Cancún hotel features a large outdoor pool with sun deck. Each air conditioned room at the Terracaribe Hotel Boutique is decorated in a Mediterranean style. Cable TV is available in every room. Terracaribe Hotel has a cafeteria with hours from 07:00 am to 11:00 am

name: Casa de Ana - Habitación privada
address: Calle 31 N, Sm 72, M 3 lote 13, casa 203, 77510 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Apartment Ocean Front Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkán Km 18.7, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor and sun terrace, this Apartment Ocean Front Cancun is situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region. 1.3 km from Coco Bongo. There is a water park on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. La Isla Shopping Mall is 2.8 km away. Free private parking is available on site. The apartment is air conditioned and has a TV with cable channels. Some units have a dining area and/or terrace. There is also a kitchenette, equipped with an oven, microwave and toaster. A refrigerator and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. There is a private bathroom with a shower in every unit. Towels are featured. Apartment Ocean Front Cancun also includes a spa centre and offers massage treatments. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. You can play tennis and table tennis at the property, and the area is popular for snorkeling. Cancun Government Palace is 7 km from Apartment Ocean Front Cancun, while Cancun Bus Station is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 16 km from Apartment Ocean Front Cancun.

name: Hotel Xbalamque and Spa
address: Av. Yaxchilan No. 31, Centro, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in central Cancun, the Hotel Xbalamqué Resort & Spa features Mayan-style décor, an outdoor pool, and spa. Every air-conditioned room at the Hotel Xbalamqué Resort & Spa provides cable TV. Hotel Xbalamqué includes an on-site bar "4 Elementos" which offers drinks and snacks with available room service. Tour information and car rentals are also available at the hotel, while safes and WiFi are available at reception. Cancun’s ADO Bus Station is just 500 metres from the Xbalamqué Resort & Spa. The Hotel Zone is a 5-minute drive away, while Cancún International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Suites Gaby
address: Av. Sunyaxchen Lote 46 Y 47 Mza 2, 77509 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in central Cancun, Hotel Suites Gaby offers free parking and air-conditioned rooms with plasma-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Each room at the Gaby Hotel Suites features a private bathrooms and a laptop safe. Work desks and closets are also included. Hotel Suites Gaby has an on-site restaurant, La Tortuga. The bilingual staff at reception can provide information about Cancun. Local and international restaurants, bars and lively nightclubs can be found in the surrounding streets. The famous Mercado 28 craft market is also nearby. Cancun's Hotel Zone is a 15-minute drive or taxi ride from the Gaby Hotel. El Meco Mayan ruins are within a short drive of the hotel, while Cancun International Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Temptation Cancun Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulcan K.M. 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Catering to free-spirited travelers (21+), Temptation Cancun Resort is the ideal hotspot for fun in the sun by day, and sexy signature themed parties by night, all surrounded by a fun, empowering atmosphere, allowing you to feel sexy, free, and uninhibited.jetBlue

name: Nirvana Hotel & Hostel - Cancun Hotel Zone
address: Av. Pok Ta Pok, Lote 4, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This property offers a restaurant where you can get breakfast, lunch and dinner. - Cancun Hotel Zone is situated in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall. Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone 5 minutes driving to the Mandala beach club. Some rooms have views of the lake or garden. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom and hygine products. Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone features free WiFi throughout the property. A convenience store, and laundry services can be find on site. The hostel also offers a tour and activities desk. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Coco Bongo is 2 km from Nirvana Hotel - Cancun Hotel Zone, while Cancun Downtown is 7 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 15 km away.

name: Ocean View Cancun Arenas
address: Blvd Kukulkan Km 2.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Steps from the beach, in Cancun's Hotel Zone, surrounded by gardens, nightclubs and restaurants, this hotel offers many meal options with 3 on-site restaurants and has free wireless internet access. Ocean View Cancun Arenas features an outdoor pool with daily activities and nightly entertainment. Guests can relax with a drink from the poolside snack bar or workout in the fitness center. After a day spent at the beach, visitors can relax on their private balcony or terrace. Guests at the Cancun Arenas Holiday Inn will appreciate a variety of restaurant options ranging from casual to fine dining. Arenas buffet-style restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Visitors can choose from beachfront dinning in Ocean Grill Tequila or fine Italian cuisine in Diletto.

name: Hotel Calypso Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 4, Lote D-8, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Calypso Cancun is located between the Nichupte Lagoon and the Caribbean Sea, and features an on-site restaurant as well as a tobacco shop. This Cancun hotel features 2 fresh water pools, and an on-site cocktail lounge. Each guest room at the Hotel Calypso Cancun offers a work desk, bathroom amenities, and cable TV. The Calypso Hotel Cancun, also features a guest laundry facility and on premise car rental. The hotel is located 100 meters off the beaches of Cancun and 25 minutes from the airport. Rate does not include eco tax of $72.62 MXN (approximately $3.90 USD) per room per night, must be paid upon arrival.

name: Desire Resort & Spa Riviera Maya - Couples Only
address: Carretera Puerto Morelos Km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This attractive hotel lies directly beside the beach and is just 15 minutes' walk from the centre of Puerto Morelos. Guests will discover many shopping and entertainment venues. Transfer to Cancún International Airport takes about 20 minutes. This luxury hotel offers a fabulous pool and garden complex. Additionally there is a hairdresser's salon, cosy bar and an air-conditioned restaurant. Room and laundry services are additionally available for use and there are parking facilities to be found outside the hotel. Each of the tastefully decorated apartments comes with a bathroom, a telephone, Internet access and a hire safe. In the outdoor complex is a freshwater swimming pool as well as a furnished sun terrace for guests to take advantage of. Furthermore, there is an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and a gym available for use.FarePortal

name: Hotel Carrillos Cancun
address: Claveles No. 33 Y 35, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Ideally located in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Carrillos Cancun offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. All rooms include a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. The units feature a desk. Popular points of interest near Hotel Carrillos Cancun include Cancun Bus Station, Cancun Government Palace and Beto Avila Stadium. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Dreams Jade Resort & Spa
address: Unidad 26, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set right on a stunning sandy beach and surrounded by a beautiful landscape of crystal blue waters, this spectacular holiday resort offers a unique experience of complete luxury on the Mexican coast. The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

name: Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro
address: 8 C. Laurel, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently located in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a restaurant, and Puerto Juarez Beach is 3 km away. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Cancun Bus Station, Cancun Government Palace and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from Hotel Laurel Cancún Centro.

address: Calle 15 #39, Smz 64, Mz 22, Lote 5, 77524 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in the heart of Cancun, the hotel boasts an accessible setting and is within walking distance of Cancun Bus Station. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a concierge and a swimming pool. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Capital O Cancun Ocean View, including a tour desk, a terrace and luggage storage. There is free private parking nearby for those with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a hair dryer, cable/satellite channels and a refrigerator. They each have an in-room closet, a private bathroom and a ceiling fan. Guests staying at Capital O Cancun Ocean View can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. The hotel is less than a 35-minute drive from Cancun International Airport. Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and Playa Mujeres Golf Club are an easy drive away.Revato

address: 4 Calle Sierra Smz 3 Mza 10 Lt 12, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively set in Cancún, MIO Cancún Hotel Boutique features air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk. The property is close to popular attractions like Cristo Rey Church, Cancun Bullfight ring and Parque las Palapas. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At MIO Cancún Hotel Boutique rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near MIO Cancún Hotel Boutique include Cancun Government Palace, Cancun Bus Station and Beto Avila Stadium. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 17 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Villa del Palmar Cancun Luxury Beach Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Punta Sam Km. 5.2, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The beachfront Villa del Palmar Cancun Beach Resort & Spa is located just 15 minutes’ drive outside central Cancún. It offers 5 outdoor pools, 4 outdoor hot tubs and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and a balcony. The rooms at the Villa del Palmar Cancun feature tiled floors and stylish décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom and a kitchenette with a microwave. The hotel organises trips in a glass-bottomed boat, as well as other activities. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do on the Yucatán Peninsula. A buffet breakfast is served on the terrace or in the dining room. The hotel features a Deli and 6 restaurants serving international food. The Mayan ruins at Tulum are around 1.5 hours’ drive from the Villa Palmar. You can drive to Cancún Airport in 25 minutes.

address: Fraccionamiento Tankah III Mza 3 Lote 21, 77760 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Tulum, a few steps from Tankah Bay Beach, Nerea Tulum features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has a terrace and a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nerea Tulum the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A Full English/Irish, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Steakhouse cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Activities such as snorkelling, canoeing, cycling can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Soliman Bay Beach is 2.2 km from Nerea Tulum, while Tulum Archeological Site is 9.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 70 km from the hotel.

Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Some units have a seating area and/or a balcony. An American breakfast is available each morning at the aparthotel. Copal Tulum Hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while pub crawls can be enjoyed nearby. Tulum Bus station is 1.9 km from Copal Tulum Hotel, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 79 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at NUNUM-Luxury Tenting, while hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Tulum Bus station is 1.7 km from the bed and breakfast, while Bus station Tulum Ruins is 4.8 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 80 km from NUNUM-Luxury Tenting, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila Km 10, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Dos Ceibas Tulum Feel Good Hotel has a model of sustainable tourism, we are ecological. Set on a private area of Tulum Beach, this eco-resort offers a typical Temazcal sauna, yoga classes and a range of massages. It is located next to the beautiful Sian-Ka'an Biosphere Reserve. The thatched bungalows have fans, bathroom and views of the gardens. The bungalows are powered by solar panels and wind energy. They have traditional décor and come with mosquito nets. Dos Ceibas Posada Ecológica is surrounded by tropical gardens, including 2 Ceiba trees, known as the sacred trees of the ancient Mayas. As an activity, the hotel organizes lessons of sacred dance, meditation and full moon Mayan ceremony. The lobby offers a free WiFi zone and a 24-hour reception. Staff can arrange hiking or diving trips and organize transfers to Cancún Airport, a 90-minute drive away. The Dos Ceibas’s open-air restaurant serves home-cooked food. Continental breakfast is included.

description: La Posada del Sol is located on the soft white sand beach of Tulum and caribbean sea. By car, the hotel is just 10 minutes south of the Tulum ruins and 15 minutes north of the Sian Ka’an Bioreserve. La Posada del Sol Boutique Hotel Tulum is an eco-friendly property. All rooms have a private bathroom, without a door to separate them from the rest of the room. The La Posada del Sol sits on a small stretch of the beach road with many wonderful shops and restaurants just steps away from your front door. A short 15 minute bike ride and you can visit Tulum. This active little town is full of shops, restaurants and bars and offers many fun nightlife options. Turquoise blue Caribbean waters welcome you with the sound of waves of bliss. Relish your ability to relax in the sun as pelicans fly overhead and iguanas play on the rocks. Diving and snorkelling can be practiced at the world’s second largest coral reef, which offers a wide variety of coloured fish.

name: Lula Tulum
address: Km 8.2 Carretera Boca Paila, 77790 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Designed to accommodate, Sanar was created with options for intimate relaxation or social interactions with like minded individuals. In 2017 Sanara Tulum was selected #3 in the 150 Greatest Hotels in the world by Harpers Bazaar. The hotel also won the 2015 National Competition in the category of Architecture and Interiors for Hotels from the Asociacion de Arquitectos e Interioristas, Mexico. A space that harmonizes with the beauty of its surroundings. The sleek and simple architecture is nestled in-between wildly sprouting Coconut Palms and Mayan Cheet trees while the ocean provides ample breeze and the serenading sounds of crashing waves.Lula 19 AC rooms, suites and villas, Wellness Center, and Studio are built on the coveted white sand beaches of Tulum, Mexic. Overlooking the crystal clear turquoise sea, the curative boutique hotel offers both Beachside & Sanara Jungle Poolside rooms. Each Lula beach room offers a private balcony, luxurious bathroom, and wardrobe. Dressed with imported bamboo cotton from Italy, both the super king size and additional day bed make for the ultimate luxury in sleeping, and accommodate up to two or three people.The stunningly appointed Sanara Villa, situated in our beachside garden, has one opulent master suite downstairs with a large living room, and upstairs an additional 2 bedroom suite. The Villa can sleep up to 8 adults. +Our Jungle provides 4 gorgeous jungle rooms nestled around a private pool and waterfall, each with a King bed, air conditioning and private bathroom. In addition we offer a Jungle Villa with 2 Suites, each comprising of 1 spacious bedroom and 1 living room. Our Jungle villa also has a stunning Jungle roof terrace which delivers stunning sunsets over the canopy of trees. Sanara Jungle is very popular with groups and more economic travelers who wish to come and enjoy Sanara's stunning yoga facility, the acclaimed cuisine inside The Real Coconut, and of course the priceless Tulum beach. Our restaurant has become a global hit with people traveling just to eat with us. Created by Daniella Hunter, The Real Coconut's philosophy of eating is a regimen for sustainable living, both personally and for the planet. Built on the foundational belief that plants form the key to our vitality and that gut health and digestion are paramount to optimum well being, The Real Coconut is dedicated to all that is conscious living. Daniella integrates key elements of paleo, gluten & grain-free, and vegan diet practices, ultimately creating a menu that is universal without compromising taste. The Real coconut products are now sold in Whole Foods Markets, Costco and thousands of stores stores across the United States, Canada and EnglandThe menus are gluten free; grain free, dairy free; refined sugar free; soy free; and cashew freeIn a coconut shell.our philosophy is plant based food with options to include sustainably sourced animal proteins.The hotel also features one of the most stunning yoga studios on the planet, where Tulum's finest teachers provide three classes a day. And finally you can encounter "care" and "service" in the Sanara Wellness Center, which has also been consistently listed in top wellness lists in thew world, offering a comprehensive menu to help you take away any stress and support your total rejuvenation.iHotelier/iStay

address: Carretera Cancun Tulum 307, 77774 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Experience the magic of Tulum with views of the ocean from every room and suite, approximately a 2-hour drive from Cancun International Airport. Uncover your sense of wonder in our resort with five pools, 11 restaurants, and magnificent views. Our personalized concierge can help you unwind or fill your day with beach activities, spa treatments, and excursions to nearby attractions. Tulum is a Magical Town with an eco-chic atmosphere that provides a spiritual and relaxing sensation. Tulum city center, underwater caves, amusement parks, and more are all within 30 minutes. The ultimate place for an unplugged beach vacation, explore historic ruins and the Sian Ka’an Biosphere Reserve, as well as shops and restaurants. description: Among acres of tropical gardens and jungle, Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa is located just minutes' from the ancient Mayan ruins and the trendy and bohemian town of Tulum. Dreams Tulum is a AAA Four Diamond award-winning resort, with all the benefits of Unlimited-Luxury® - where everything is included. Dreams Tulum’s magnificent Mexican colonial architecture blends tastefully with an up scale contemporary design where every room offers a private and furnished terrace or balcony, marble bathroom, daily refreshed mini-bar and 24-hour room service. Dreams Tulum also offers a secluded adults-only section and swim out suites for direct access to a pool. Additionally, there is a splash park for kids located near the Explorer’s Club. The pools are heated from December and March depending on climate conditions. Dreams Tulum sits on 2 miles of powdery white sand with activities to make the whole family happy including on-site watersports and dive shop, discounted greens fees at the nearby Riviera Maya Golf Club, an Explorer’s Club for Kids and a Core Zone Teens Club. The Dreams Spa by Pevonia® offers serene jungle and beach cabins, a spa pantry for guests to create their own spa products and a Temazcal for a traditional Mayan spa ceremony experience. With authentic and gourmet dining options, unlimited top-shelf spirits and nightly entertainment, guests can enjoy a Dream vacation at Dreams Tulum Resort & Spa.

name: Kanan Tulum - Adults Only
address: Carretera Tulum-Boca Paila, Km 8, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Kanan Tulum is a unique eco-friendly spa hotel in Mexico's Caribbean coast. Located on the beach amid the Mayan jungle, it is placed in the middle of the bustling music and art scene, offering a wide range of events in and around the hotel. This adults-only hotel is an experience in its own right, marrying rustic elements with the finest woods and rich textiles.The labyrinth of treetop corridors, wooden staircases, nature portals and branch-woven walkways and nests, all create a sensation of a hidden jungle temple. Get pampered at Kumaru Spa, featuring a full menu of organic services, find adventure on the Caribbean Sea, with an array of beach activities available on-site or enjoy a delightful yoga class at our wooden yoga shala. Indulge in authentic gastronomy, locally sourced dining and drinks, including cocktails at our swim-up pool bar and drinks on our rooftop lounge. Stay tuned for our music events on weekends at our beach club featuring the finest DJs lineups. When you’re ready to explore and experience the magic of Tulum, you’ll find everything from the ancient Mayan ruins and scenic cenotes to unforgettable nature reserves and adventure parks within minutes of our hotel. Take the vacation you deserve at Tulum’s best environmentally conscious, adults-only Caribbean escape at Kanan Tulum

name: Azulik

description: Azulik is a private, adults-only beach resort and Mayan Wellness Centre. It features a secluded, clothing-optional beach which is perfect for sunbathing or swimming. Each spacious tree house is made from Mexican-royal-ebony Khatalosh and features floor-to-ceiling windows providing natural daylight, mosquito nets. The tree house's also have a private deck with outdoor day beds, seating areas and views of the lush jungle and the Caribbean Sea. The rooms are free of TV's, phone or electricity so you can relax and reconnect with nature. Azulik offers a magical experience, serving breakfast and lunch. Also a beach bar, a wonderful spa & beauty center. We also provide traditional Mayan massage and healing therapies, medicinal herbal baths and the traditional Mayan-sweat-lodge temazcal treatment. The units have a unique Mayan mosaic bath tub where you can have a special invigorating bath in rich mineralized cenote’s water, which is considered as sacred water within Mayan culture. Azulik is 3 km south of Tulum Archaeological Site and 4 km from Tulum town centre. Our Cancun International Airport is about a 90 minutes drive to Azulik's location.

Please be advised that our pool will be out of service from April 17th to 21st. We appreciate your understanding.We remind you that the check in schedule starts at 15:00 hours, and is subjet to availability of space at the hotel. The Check-out schedule is at 12:00 hours, we suggest you to use our check-out express service.iHotelier/iStay

name: Suites Rio Elba

description: Located in Mexico City in the Mexico DF region with The Angel of Independence and Chapultepec Castle nearby, Suites Rio Elba provides accommodation with access to a fitness room. Complimentary WiFi is providedthroughout the property. Common areas of Villa Condesa include a charming terrace with tables and chairs, as well as a dining room. Guests can enjoy international cuisine and traditional Mexican coffee. A laundry service is available for an extra cost. Staff at the 24-hour reception will be happy to provide tourist information about Mexico City. Sevilla metro station is 700 metres away, and Chapultepec Park is only 1 stop away.

name: City Express by Marriott EBC Reforma

Walk along the famous Paseo de la Reforma. The wide avenue, known for its beauty and monuments, runs diagonally through the heart of Mexico City. The capital of Mexico City is full of museums and close to the area we have the Ripley Museum, wax museum, chocolate museum, soumaya museum and museum of anthropology. Close to the property we have venues for great events such as the National Auditorium, Autodromo hermanos Rodriguez, Foro Sol, Palacio de los Deportes and Auditorio BB, where you can enjoy the best exhibitions, concerts and festivals in Mexico City.Marriott

They feature traditional décor with precious wood furnishings and charming English details. They feature free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a seating area with Smart TV The bathrooms include a hydromassage column. Hotel Green Park is home to a terrace with a beautiful view of Chapultepec Forest. THE VIEW restaurant serves a variety of haute cuisine dishes. All rooms have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Colmena Centro provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Zocalo Square, Tenochtitlan Ceremonial Center and National Palace Mexico. The popular Zona Rosa is also located nearby and easily accessible with nearby public transportation. Guests at the Diplomatico can enjoy on-site dining at the El Canciller restaurant. The hotel also offers on-site fitness facilities.

Hotel Harare offers room service 24 hours a day and the restaurant serves international-style dishes. The restaurant is open from 08:00 to 23:00. There is also a bar on site. Guests will have assistance from the front desk 24 hours a day, and the property also offers the services of a tour desk and luggage storage. Free parking is available. Paseo de la Reforma Avenue is 8.7 km from Hotel Harare, while Condesa District and Polanco District are 7.4 km and 11.7 km away respectively.

The nearby Zona Rosa features vibrant shopping and nightlife as well as some of the city's best jewelers and antique stores. The Mexican Stock Exchange is also nearby.

A number of art galleries, restaurants, nightclubs, boutiques, museums and theaters and right outside the hotel's front doors. Guests at the Principado can also enjoy a variety of modern conveniences, including a state-of-the-art business center, a gourmet restaurant and an on-site currency exchange services.

After an eventful day, find sanctuary in our upscale rooms featuring plush mattresses, free Wi-Fi and flat-panel TVs. Savor delectable dishes at our Mexican restaurant or chic steakhouse. When it comes to events, our planning services, catering options and 14 venues are sure to elevate your successful meeting and elegant reception. Whether you want to go on a shopping spree in Condesa, retrace the city's rich history in the historic center of Mexico City or gaze upon some of Mexico's tallest buildings at Paseo de la Reforma, you'll find exactly what your heart desires just moments from our Roma Norte hotel. Transportation options are readily available, major highways are easily accessible and the Benito Juarez International Airport is less than 5 miles from our hotel. Value minded guests of the Hampton Inn & Suites Mexico City - Centro hotel appreciate the complimentary On the House hot breakfast served daily, complimentary local calls and complimentary high-speed internet access, and as a proud member of the Hilton Family of Hotels, you earn Hilton HHonors Points and Miles for the same stay. Guadalajara’s historic centre is 15 minutes' drive away. The spacious rooms at Quinta Magna Hotel & Suites are decorated in light colours and have tiled floors. Each room includes a safe and a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can order drinks and snacks from room service. The hotel is within a 5-minute drive of Metropolitano Park and the Plaza Mexico and Gran Plaza Shopping Centres. Expo Guadalajara Trade Fair is 4 km away.

name: Camino Real Guadalajara
address: Av Vallarta No. 5005 Col. Chapalita, 48300 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This modern hotel is located next to the Camara de Comercio and it is 1 km from Guadalajara’s La Gran Plaza Shopping Centre. Set around an attractive garden with a pool, all rooms have a terrace. The air-conditioned rooms at the Camino Real Guadalajara feature elegant décor. Each one comes with satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s La Huerta Restaurant serves traditional Mexican food and offers great views of the garden. An international brunch is served on Sundays. Expo-Guadalajara Convention Centre is an 8-minute drive from the Camino Real, and there is easy access as it is located between 2 of Guadalajara’s main roads. The airport is a 25-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Dali Plaza Ejecutivo
address: Av. Pedro Moreno N. 570 Col. Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: This 4-star hotel is just a 3 minute walk from the Guadalajara Cathedral. Hotel Dali Plaza Ejecutivo features an on-site lounge, free Wi-Fi and air conditioned rooms. Guest rooms include cable TV and a work desk. Free local telephone calls can be made from every room. Each room provides a private bathroom, and room service can be ordered from several nearby restaurants. The Dali Plaza Ejecutivo Hotel is downtown Guadalajara near many of the city’s attractions. Guests are a 10-minute walk from shopping at Mercado de San Juan de Dios and 5 minutes from Teatro Degollado. The Guadalajara Zoo is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Casino Plaza
address: Pedro Moreno No.726, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Nestled in the heart of Guadalajara, Mexico near the Metropolitan Cathedral, this hotel offers free wireless internet access, free on-site parking and an international restaurant. Hotel Casino Plaza offers easy access to many local attractions. Guests can view modern ceramic art at the Museo Regional de Ceramica or browse the unique shops at the Mercado Libertad. Concerts and amateur musicians can also be enjoyed at the nearby Plaza de Armas. Guests of the Casino Plaza Hotel will enjoy the DVD players and Safety Deposit Boxes in each room. Dinner can also be enjoyed in the privacy of the room with the hotel's room service.

name: Hvh By Yaxché
address: 596 Avenida Juárez, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Guadalajara, HVH by Yaxché offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set 700 metres from Guadalajara Cathedral. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Popular points of interest near HVH by Yaxché include Expiatorio Temple, Cabanas Cultural Institute and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Real Inn Guadalajara Expo
address: Av Mariano Otero 1326, Esq De Las Rosas, 44510 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Real Inn Guadalajara Expo contemporary architecture is influenced by Mexican designs, evidenced through several textures and colours thus creating an excellent venue for lodging and banquets with top-notch technology in the hospitality industry. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire property. Stock Cafe, located on the ground floor of the hotel, offers a selection of Mexican and international cuisine. This includes pastas and pizzas cooked with firewood, an outstanding seafood bar, meats, poultry, grilled fish, carpaccios and traditional Italian appetizers. An excellent location in the commercial heart of the city, across the street from Expo Guadalajara, 10 minutes away from downtown. The hotel is located 25 minutes drive away from the Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla International Airport.

name: Guadalajara Plaza Expo Business Class
address: Ave Mariano Otero 3261, 44550 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Guadalajara Plaza Expo located in the business area of Guadalajara, 50 meters from Expo Guadalajara, 40 minutes from the airport, 20 minutes from the historic center and 3 blocks from plaza del sol, offers 172 Executive rooms and 32 luxury rooms, restaurant, lobby bar, fitness center, covered Parking-Valet parking travel agency and business center.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Plaza Diana
address: Av Circunv Agustin Yanez 2760, 45130 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located in Guadalajara’s financial centre, this hotel is less than 10 minutes’ drive from Expo Guadalajara Convention Centre. It offers free parking, free Wi-Fi and an indoor pool with hot tub. Hotel Plaza Diana is 4.5 km from the city centre and the cathedral. The Minerva monument is only 2 blocks away, while Andares shopping mall is 5 minutes’ drive away. Each room at Plaza Diana features stylish décor in warm tones, and includes a safe, a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. The private bathrooms have a hairdryer, luxury toiletries and bathrobes. Room service is available. Offering services like dry cleaning and laundry, this hotel also has several meeting rooms and computers free to use. The on-site restaurant, La Milonga, serves a buffet breakfast and á la carte menu. Guadalajara International Aiport is 21.5 km away, and there is a shuttle service available at an extra cost.

name: Hg Hotel
address: Av. Vallarta No. 5281, 45030 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located 16 minutes’ drive from the Historic Centre and Degollado Theatre, HG Hotel offers massages and a fitness centre, plus free WiFi is available. It also has concierge services and a restaurant. The rooms here will provide you with cable TV, air conditioning and a balcony. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guadalajara’s Historic centre offers a variety of restaurants and eateries from which guests can choose to explore. At HG Hotel you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a tour desk and luggage storage. The property offers free parking. The hotel is 9 minutes’ drive from Guadalajara Expo, 16 minutes’ drive from Morelos Park and 30 minutes’ drive from Guadalajara International Airport.

name: Hotel Clarum 101
address: Juan Diego 101, 45050 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located a 15-minute drive from central Guadalajara, Mexico, this modern boutique hotel offers free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with iPod docks. Guadalajara Expo Exhibition Centre is just 5 minutes walking. At the Clarum 101, each room provides satellite TV. For guests’ convenience, a hairdryer, slippers and work desk are also available in the rooms. La Gran Plaza Shopping Centre is situated less than 3 km from the hotel. Guadalajara Airport is 12 km away.

name: The Westin Guadalajara
address: Avenida de las Rosas 2911, 44530 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: The second largest city in Mexico and the capital of the state of Jalisco, Guadalajara is a vibrant, vital city encompassing modern urban development, colonial architecture and a rich cultural heritage. The Westin Guadalajara is perfectly integrated into this graceful metropolis full of tree-lined avenues and fountains offering pet-friendly hotel rooms for traveling groups and families. Located in the prestigious Residencial del Bosque district directly across from Expo Guadalajara convention center, a major venue for events, exhibitions, congresses and conventions, The Westin Guadalajara helps you hit your stride with a convenient location near La Perla, Plaza del Sol and Grand Plaza, World Trade Center and Jewelry Center, parks, corporate offices and more.Marriott

name: Quinta Real Guadalajara
address: Av. Mexico 2727 Col. Vallarta Norte, 44690 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in a residential area, this luxurious hotel offers spacious suite-style accommodations just 20 minutes from downtown Guadalajara and its exciting attractions, shopping and dining. Quinta Real features antique-style furniture, original works of art, and ivy-covered, pink stone walls. Relax in the outdoor swimming pool in the hot afternoon sun, then enjoy a delicious meal in the gourmet restaurant. The accommodations offer marble bathrooms and tubs, his and hers bathrobes and slippers, pillow menu and Salvatore Ferragamo bath accessories to complete the Quinta Real experience.

name: Hotel Boutique Abad
address: Mixcoatl 524, Ciudad Del Sol, 45050 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hotel Boutique Abad offers Adults-Only accommodation in Guadalajara. Free private parking is available on site. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guadalajara Cathedral is 7 km from Hotel Boutique Abad, while Plaza del Sol is 600 metres away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the property.

name: Hotel Puerta Del Sol Guadalajara
address: Avenida Lopez Mateos Sur 4205, 45087 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located a short walk from Plaza del Sol in downtown Guadalajara, Mexico, this hotel features an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant and bar. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi. Hotel Puerta Del Sol Guadalajara provides accommodations equipped with air conditioning, cable TV, and a DVD player. The bathroom features marble countertops and a hairdryer. A safety deposit box is provided and room service is available. A gym and business center make up part of the facilities at this Guadalajara Hotel Puerta del Sol. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Laundry and dry cleaning facilities are available. Don Miguel Hidalgo International Airport is 30 minutes' drive from Hotel Puerta Del Sol Guadalajara. Guadalajara Zoo is 25 minutes from the hotel.

name: Hotel Real de Castilla
address: 184 Calle Colón Zona Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Well set in Guadalajara, Hotel Real de Castilla provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Hotel Real de Castilla include Guadalajara Cathedral, Expiatorio Temple and Cabanas Cultural Institute. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: NH Collection Guadalajara Providencia
address: Sao Paulo 2334, 44630 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: The NH Collection Guadalajara Providencia hotel is situated in the city’s financial district and boasts a unique glass façade. The hotel is within walking distance of the Pablo Neruda Park, cinema, and casinos and across the street is the Golf and Country Club, Guadalajara’s top golf course. It is also close to many popular attractions including the Instituto Cultural Cabañas, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The plaza that houses the hotel has a variety of restaurants, bars, and venues. The modern rooms at NH Collection Guadalajara Providencia are large and comfortable and finished with touches such as contemporary art and sleek wooden floors. Each comes with sound proof windows, a spacious bathroom, extra comfortable mattresses, and a choice of pillows. The Junior Suite has a private terrace, while luxury corner rooms come with stunning views thanks to the floor-to-ceiling windows. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Our restaurant serves a scrumptious breakfast buffet each morning, and for lunch and dinner, we offer delectable international meals or snacks along with drinks at our bar. There is a fitness center and spa, and we also have six meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Suites Chapultepec
address: Calle Frias No. 152, 44600 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Ideally located in the centre of Guadalajara, Suites Chapultepec offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. The property is around 2.8 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 3.6 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train and 5.6 km from Jalisco Stadium. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, while certain rooms also offer a kitchenette equipped with a microwave. At Suites Chapultepec, the rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Expiatorio Temple, Guadalajara Cathedral and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Suites Chapultepec.

name: Suites Navata
address: Avenida Rinconada de Las Praderas 2170, 44530 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Set in Guadalajara, within 4.8 km of Jose Cuervo Express Train and 6.3 km of Guadalajara Cathedral, Suites Navata features free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 7.2 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 11 km from Jalisco Stadium and 15 km from Guadalajara Zoo. The property is non-smoking and is situated 4.6 km from Expiatorio Temple. The hotel features a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. The rooms have a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Suites Navata include Guadalajara World Trade Center, Guadalajara Expo and Plaza del Sol. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Guadalajara Centro Historico
address: Colon 73, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: We're at downtown's center, a few blocks' walk to Guadalajara Cathedral, Degollado Theater, museums, and bustling markets. Join us in our top-floor restaurant and bar overlooking this historic city. Our meeting spaces offer panoramic views, and several rooms and suites have an outdoor terrace. We'll meet you at arrival with a warm DoubleTree cookie.Hilton

name: Hotel Indigo Guadalajara Expo, An IHG Hotel
address: Av.Adolfo Lopez Mateos Sur 1280., 45040 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Discover a fusion of classic Mexican and contemporary styles at Hotel Indigo Guadalajara Expo. Our modern boutique hotel is only five minutes from Expo Guadalajara and the World Trade Center, and nine kilometers from central Guadalajara. We are just moments from Guadalajara’s top attractions, like Instituto Cultural Cabañas, Parque Agua Azul, and the architectural brilliance of the Guadalajara Cathedral. Encircling a picturesque courtyard, our hotel offers curated experiences with a local vibe Savor Mexican cuisine at JAL Cocina de Raíz or pop up to the rooftop bar with sweeping views. Host a meeting or event in our versatile venues and ballroom. Relax in refreshed rooms with premium bedding. From fitness to dining, enjoy an enriching stay.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Perla Central
address: Av. Corona #450 Col. Centro, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel Perla Central is located 300 metres from Guadalajara historic centre and 200 metres from Jardín de San Francisco. Free WiFi access is available in room, restaurant and lobby, american buffet breakfast is offered with a supplement. The rooms here will provide you with flat screen and cable TV, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries and shower. Free national phone calls are also available. A complete gym is also available from 7am. At Hotel Perla Central you will find free valet parking, concierge services and multilingual staff. San Juan Market is located only 1 km away from the hotel. The hotel is 6.5 km from Guadalajara Expo and 1.4 km from Morelos Park. Don Miguel Hidalgo International Airport is 17 km away.

name: Fulton Business Luxury Hotel
address: 1450 Av. De Las Américas Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Located in Guadalajara, 5.3 km from Expiatorio Temple, FULTON Business Luxury HOTEL provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. Every room is equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at the hotel have a balcony. An American breakfast is available daily at FULTON Business Luxury HOTEL. Cabanas Cultural Institute is 7 km from the accommodation, while Jalisco Stadium is 7.2 km away. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 23 km from FULTON Business Luxury HOTEL.

name: City Express Plus by Marriott Guadalajara Providencia
address: 1520 Av. de Las Américas Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel City Express Plus by Marriott Providencia is located in Guadalajara's new financial district, which is the headquarters of the most important economic segments in the state.For those who like to shop and enjoy good restaurants, we are strategically located very close to the Midtown mall, Punto Sao Paulo, Plaza Patria, Andares and Plaza Galerias which are 5 minutes away by car. Enjoy the heart of Jalisco with its emblematic Cathedral, visit some of the historical buildings such as: El Teatro Degollado, Hospicio Cabañas, as well as the famous San Juan de Dios Market, since we are less than 30 minutes away. Jalisco is the cradle of champions and for this reason sports are very important. You will find the Akron soccer stadium 20 minutes away, the new Los Charros Baseball Stadium and the Jalisco Stadium 15 minutes away respectively. But if golf is your thing, you'll find the Guadalajara Country Club just 5 minutes away.Marriott

name: Country Hotel & Suites
address: Av Circunvalacion Jorge Alvarez Del, Castillo #1482, 44260 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Featuring free Wi-Fi and an indoor swimming pool, Country Hotel & Suites has well-equipped suites with kitchens. Located in Guadalajara’s Lomas del Country district, it offers free parking. Each suite at the Country Hotel & Suites features traditional décor and tiled floors. All come with a living area, where there is satellite TV and a sofa. Kitchens come with a dining area. There is a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the centre of Guadalajara, less than 2 km from the hotel. Country Hotel & Suites has easy access to the Mex 80 Motorway and is just 500 metres from Avila Camacho Railway Station. Guadalajara Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Mesón San Felipe
address: 245 Calle Contreras Medellín, 44100 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Situated in Guadalajara, 200 metres from the centre and less than 1 km from Guadalajara Cathedral, Mesón San Felipe features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area and/or a terrace. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Expiatorio Temple, Cabanas Cultural Institute and Revolution Park. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Mesón San Felipe.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara
address: Mar Baltico 2242 Colonia Country Club, 44610 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Surround yourself with refined luxury at JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara, where a truly enriching getaway awaits. Located in the city of Guadalajara, Jalisco, our luxury hotel offers easy access to a host of business offices, as well as shopping and entertainment options. Soak up the sun as you take a dip in our pool and enjoy unobstructed views of Guadalajara. Delight your palate with our various restaurant options – including Zibu, which draws upon the cuisines of Thailand and Mexico. After an exciting day in the city, settle in to your spacious, pet-friendly room or suite, boasting luxury bedding and sophisticated décor. After an eventful day, sip a glass of champagne while relaxing on the Sunset Deck, our exclusive rooftop bar. From chef-made specialties to modern rooms, JW Marriott Hotel Guadalajara focuses on your well-being.Marriott

address: Av Solidaridad Iberoamericana 6500 Col. Las Pintitas, 45693 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Guadalajara Aeropuerto is a newly built property ideally located only 5 minutes away from international airport. This 148 room property is the perfect option for business travellers, due to its proximity and easy access to major companies and industrial areas in the city. Guests will enjoy a complimentary breakfast served daily, and can keep up with their exercise routine on the fitness center and relax in the indoor heated pool. Ramada Encore by Wyndham Guadalajara Aeropuerto offers Free WiFi and Free parking and the 148 guest rooms include safe, flat screen tv and coffee machine.Wyndham

name: Hotel Malibu
address: Av Vallarta 3993, Guadalajara, Jalisco

Decorated in bright colours, the Malibu’s air-conditioned rooms include flat-screen cable TV, a minibar, coffee maker and safe. A hairdryer and amenities are provided in the private bathrooms. Typical Mexican dishes and international cuisine are served in the hotel’s La Fuente restaurant. Guests can also relax with a drink in the lobby bar, or outside on the terrace. Free private parking can be found at Hotel Malibu. Guadalajara Cathedral and Plaza Universidad Square are around 6 km away while Guadalajara Airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

The property is located 4.4 km from Cabanas Cultural Institute, 4.8 km from Guadalajara Cathedral and 7.6 km from Jalisco Stadium. The property is 2.3 km from the city centre and 3.2 km from Jose Cuervo Express Train. At the hotel rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a patio with a garden view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a wardrobe. Guests at Casa Bosque Eduviges can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. Guadalajara Zoo is 13 km from the accommodation, while Revolution Park is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Guadalajara Airport, 19 km from Casa Bosque Eduviges.

At Hotel La Estancia you will find a 24-hour front desk, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered include a tour desk. Guadalajara City Centre is a 20-minute drive from the property, while the popular Plaza del Sol shopping centre is 150 metres away.

address: # 63 San Ignacio, 45040 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Hotel Suites Internacional has 24 rooms. All of them have an integrated full equipped kitchen. The hotel is located in one of the most beautiful residential areas of the city just 5 minute walking distance to various restaurants, supermarkets, malls, etc.

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Guadalajara/Expo
address: Avenida De Las Rosas 3030, 44500 Guadalajara, Jalisco
description: Guadalajara Jalisco is known as La PerlaTapatía including Zapopan Tlaquepaque and Tonalá are the Metropolitan Zone The Tequila Mariachi and Charrería are the symbols that identify us at a national and international level born and raised in this land. Guadalajara has become the second more important city of the country with the vocation for the Business Tourism and important Congress Conventions and Specials Events, whether national or international. Hampton Inn by Hilton Guadalajara Expo is conveniently located just 5 minutes away from Expo Guadalajara 30 minutes away from The International Airport Miguel Hidalgo. Located on López Mateos Avenue in one of the most representative neighborhoods Colonia Chapalita where you can enjoy a delicious dinner in one of the many luxury restaurants bars and coffee shops. It is 20 minutes away from downtown and other different touristic and cultural attractions. Hampton Inn Guadalajara Expo embraces their visitors at the arrival time with a peaceful atmosphere and warmth. The Fitness Room has all the necessary equipment to begin an active morning. Our 24 hours business center, and one meeting room for business. In addition the hotel has a terrace where Guests can Relax. Our Rooms offer all the necessary commodities for the business traveler: clean fresh and comfortable rooms. Also discover our famous Hampton Bed and take a delicious Breakfast on House Wifi access All this makes Hampton Inn by Hilton Guadalajara Expo the perfect place for Business Trip.Hilton

Guests can relax in the garden, and then enjoy Mexican cuisine and cocktails in the hotel's Al Eden restaurant. The area surrounding the Arborea is filled with attractions and activities including the Museum of Arts which is 4.8 km away. Shopping and dining in Plaza del Sol and Gran Plaza Shopping Centres is a short drive away.

description: At the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel, we know what it is like to be on the road or in the air. Places to fly, people to impress, deadlines to meet, which is why staying at our Hampton Inn hotel is a good idea. We are located only 7 miles from the Miguel Hidalgo International Airport. Our Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel is located in a well-established and developed industrial area. The Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel ''perfect mix lobby'', well-equipped fitness center and business center with complimentary high-speed internet access makes it the perfect place for business or leisure. Not far from the hotel, in the heart of Guadalajara, is the Historical Center, the city's cultural hub and its magnificent buildings, such as the Instituto Cultural Cabanas named as ''World Heritage Site''. Also in the same area you can find numerous museums, cathedrals and landmarks. Guadalajara, Mexico is known worldwide for its traditional hospitality, with a wide variety of cultural and recreational attractions and delicious cuisine. But most of all, it is known for its people. More than just a city, it represents Mexican culture with its folklore, the renowned Mariachi handcrafts, tequila and the national sport, charreria. Contemporary Guadalajara represents modern Mexico in the strength of its economic, industrial, commercial and service infrastructure. The modern section of the city offers an excellent selection of stores where guests of the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport Mexico hotel will find a great variety of clothing, footwear, accessories and gifts. Few cities can offer such a variety of interesting things to see and do, involving the visitors in a cultural historical and legendary atmosphere. Guadalajara is a unique place that is sure to impress even the most demanding traveler. So come check into the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Aeropuerto. We love having you here at the Hampton Inn Guadalajara Airport hotel in Mexico!Hilton

description: Holiday Inn Express® Near Expo Guadalajara Located near major companies, such as Siemens, Flex, HP Inc; Continental and HP Enterprise, which makes the Holiday Inn Express® Guadalajara Expo Hotel the smart choice for those who travel for business. Two of the most important convention and exhibition venues in the city, Expo Guadalajara and The World Trade Center Guadalajara, are less than one mile away. For those who travel for leisure, touristic places like the beautiful, quaint town of Tlaquepaque is an excellent option, or the Magic Town of Tequila, where this world-famous liquor is produced, are within an hour driving distance. A few minutes away, visit the Historic Guadalajara Downtown area, and be amazed by its architecture and flea markets. Spend a day at Plaza del Sol shopping mall and find everything you need, located right across the street of the hotel. The Business Center will help you stay ahead of work, continue working with free high-speed Internet access throughout our facilities, and host meetings in our event rooms. Keep up your energy levels by exercising in the Fitness Center or enjoy a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool. Take a rest in the comfortable guestrooms with laundry and same-day dry cleaning services, and have a good breakfast from our complimentary, daily, morning buffet bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel La Mansion del Sol

description: This traditional Mexican house is located in Guadalajara, just 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza del Sol Shopping Centre. It offers a fitness centre and a charming garden with a fountain. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel La Mansion del Sol feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a coffee maker. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Looking out onto the garden, the hotel’s Los Colibrís Restaurant serves traditional Mexican food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel offers free valet parking. Don Miguel Hidalgo y Costilla Airport is a 25-minute drive away.

The bathroom includes toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel has a restaurant, sun terrace and a business centre including several meeting rooms. The city’s major landmarks, including Teatro Degollado and the Cathedral are within 5-10 minutes’ walk of the Roma Inn. Guadalajara International Airport is about 20 km away.
