Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 3.4 km from Iberostar Quetzal, while Church of Guadalupe is 8.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 32 km from the resort.

name: Barrio Latino Hotel Riviera Maya
address: Calle 4 Entre Avenida 10 y 15, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This Playa del Carmen hotel is in the Old Town city centre. The hotel features free Wifi throughout the property and provide reception services all day and all night long since 1997. The hotel features a large tropical garden and warm, adobe-style decor. The hotel provides guests with information on original local experiences, food and tours and can help arrange also car, bike and kite surfing rentals. All rooms at the Barrio Latino al Centro by Pueblo Magico Network face the garden and are equipped with ceiling fans, fridges and hammocks. Each has a private bathroom, a hairdryer, a safety-deposit box and air conditioning. The Barrio Latino al Centro by Pueblo Magico Network is only 180 metres from the popular Fifth Avenue. Limited parking (fee will be charged) is also provided at this hotel. The hotel offer an EV charging point.

name: Banyan Tree Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Live a unique experience in an exclusive resort in the Riviera Maya, Banyan Tree Mayakoba Triple AAA 5 Diamond resort has private villas with swimming pools surrounded by vegetation offering you a stay of luxury and harmony. Diamond resort, because we believe in our mission: to offer you the most memorable vacations of your life and a simply unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya
address: Paseo Kanai 15, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Discover an exceptional address at The St. Regis Kanai Resort, Riviera Maya. We offer you a central location near Cancun and Playa Del Carmen. Find our vacation resort built on a natural mangrove reserve, with a setting inspired by the neighboring Sian Ka’an Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage Site in Quintana Roo. Take in sweeping ocean views from a 620-acre reserve set on the shores of Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula. The Pleiades constellation inspired the circular architecture of our resort's avant-garde exterior, which floats above the canopy of the mangrove trees below. Each of our 124 rooms, suites and residences boasts dramatic views, along with bespoke furniture and a private terrace or plunge pool. Reserve one of our vacation packages and revel in our resort's unique range of culinary destinations and other experiences. From our signature St. Regis Butler Service to the state-of-the-art St. Regis Spa, every touchpoint allows time to stand still in this undiscovered slice of paradise in Mexico.Marriott

name: Iberostar Selection Paraiso Maya
address: Chetumal Puerto Juárez, Km. 309, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in a prime location of Puerto Morelos, Iberostar Paraiso Maya puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the property's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Iberostar Paraiso Maya. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make Iberostar Paraiso Maya the perfect choice for your stay in Puerto Morelos.Agoda

name: The Elements Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: Avenida Flamingo & Calle 46, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Moments from the Caribbean Sea and ancient ruins in Playa del Carmen, this property is surrounded by lush vegetation and offers fully furnished condos with fully equipped kitchens and ocean views. The Elements features a private beach, beach club and spacious outdoor pool. Guests will also enjoy the fully equipped fitness center and an on-site business center, both with ocean views. The one and 2 and 3 bedroom condos at the Elements offer flat-screen TVs and high-count linens. After a busy day, guests can relax on their private terrace or enjoy the evening breeze from the living room.

name: Impression Moxché by Secrets
address: Carr Tulum Playa Del Carmen km 294, 77714 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 1.3 km from Playa del Carmen Beach, Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 11 km from ADO International Bus Station and 11 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, the property provides a private beach area, as well as a bar. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Certain rooms will provide you with a kitchenette with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving French, Italian and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for golfing. Guests can sing karaoke, plan their trips at the tour desk, or make use of the business centre. Church of Guadalupe is 7.4 km from Impression Moxché by Secrets - Adults Only, while Kantenah Bay is 41 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 43 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sandos Playacar Select Club Adults Only
address: Paseo Xaman-ha Lote 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playacar, this beachfront property is next to a golf course and within 3 mi (5 km) of Quinta Avenida, Central Square, and Nuestra Senora del Carmen Catholic Church. El Camaleon Mayakoba Golf Course and Xpu-ha Beach are also within 20 mi (32 km).Expedia

name: El Dorado Casitas Royale by Karisma - Adults only
address: Km 45, Carretera Cancun - Tulum, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: El Dorado Casitas Royale is an adults-only resort that features gourmet cuisine with the Gourmet Inclusive Experience, a full-service spa, and 13 swimming pools. The elegant and lavish suites are fully appointed and feature a DVD and CD library, personal concierge services from 08:00 until 17:00, a pillow menu and aromatherapy scents delivered in your room. The bright bedrooms offer mosquito nets over the canopy beds. The elegant bathrooms have double sinks and a shower. Some units have an outdoor shower or a hot tub. El Dorado Casitas Royal has an extensive selection of different appealing cuisines from around the world including 10 different restaurants offering world cuisine, contemporary Italian menus, a flavour from the Pacific, a Mediterranean fusion, Caribbean style, and Mexican cuisine. Pizzas and authentic Italian cooking are also offered. There are also 10 swim-up bars, 1 beach bar and 4 lounge bars available. Naay Spa is dividen into the Spa Royale and the Spa Casitas. Spa Royale is in the centre of the property, while Spa Casitas is a 20,000 sq-ft facility offering an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. The Bonanza Ranch is the property's own stables with riding horses. There is a guided horseback tour through the jungle so guests can experience the true Riviera Maya beauty.

name: Iberostar Paraiso Beach
address: Carretera Chetumal - Puerto Juarez, km.309, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, Iberostar Paraiso Beach features a private beach area. Featuring a tennis court, the 5-star resort has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The resort offers a Mexican restaurant as well as free WiFi. Guest rooms in the resort are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Iberostar Paraiso Beach provides certain units with sea views, and the rooms are fitted with a coffee machine. All rooms have a desk. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, buffet and American options. Guests can make use of the hot tub. You can play table tennis and billiards at the accommodation. Staff at the reception can help guests with any questions that they might have. Cancún is 49 km from Iberostar Paraiso Beach, while Playa del Carmen is 23 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 38 km from the property.

name: Paradisus Playa Del Carmen Riviera Maya
address: 5ª Avenida, Playa Del Carmen, 77719 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Sofía Boutique Condos by Bunik
address: Calle 24 Norte Entre 25 y 30 Avenidas, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen and with Playacar Beach reachable within less than 1 km, Sofía Boutique Condos by Bunik offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 700 metres from ADO International Bus Station. At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a wardrobe, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is less than 1 km from Sofía Boutique Condos by Bunik, while Church of Guadalupe is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 33 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ipana Apartment Deluxe
address: Calle 38 Norte, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This smoke-free aparthotel features an outdoor pool, free self parking, and free WiFi in public areas. Each apartment boasts a deep soaking tub and offers free WiFi and a kitchen. For a bit of entertainment, an LED TV comes with satellite channels, and guests can also appreciate conveniences like a refrigerator and a microwave. Housekeeping is available on request.Expedia

name: Silversands Hotel Boutique - 5th Ave
address: 5 Avenida Entre Calle 38 Y Calle 40, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen and with Playa del Carmen Beach reachable within 500 metres, SILVERSANDS Hotel Boutique - 5Th Ave provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers a private beach area and a tour desk. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and 2.1 km from Playacar Beach. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel every room has bed linen and towels. ADO International Bus Station is 1.8 km from SILVERSANDS Hotel Boutique - 5Th Ave, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 36 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thompson Beach House
address: Calle 8 y Playa, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With a stay at Thompson Beach House - a concept by Hyatt in Playa del Carmen (Downtown Playa del Carmen), you'll be steps from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and Quinta Avenida. Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Grand Velas Riviera Maya
address: Carretera Cancun Tulum Km 62, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Enjoy the jungles mystique and endless ocean views at this resort for all ages. Discover a different side of the Mexican Caribbean in the Zen Grand Ambiance surrounded by pristine jungle, or opt for ocean breezes in the Ambassador Ambiance. Explore the entire resort with its SE Spa and have family-friendly restaurants; adults are invited to enjoy the Grand Class Ambiances three additional restaurants and infinity pool as well. Visit the Kids Clubs and Teens Club, go on an Eco-tour, play mini.iHotelier/iStay

name: Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique
address: Calle 42 Norte Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique features a fitness room and a hot tub, as well as air-conditioned accommodation in the centre of Playa del Carmen, less than 1 km from Playa del Carmen Beach. Every unit has an equipped kitchen with a fridge, a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV and private bathroom. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also available, as well as a coffee machine. A terrace is available for guests to use at the aparthotel. Playacar Beach is 2.4 km from Emiliano 42 Condos Boutique, while ADO International Bus Station is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: Gran Sahara
address: AV. 15 Calle 8, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a casino, Gran SAHARA is situated in Playa del Carmen, 1.1 km from ADO International Bus Station. Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and around 1.4 km from Kool Beach Club. The property is located 1.6 km from Disabled-friendly beach and 3 km from Church of Guadalupe. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The restaurant at Gran SAHARA serves Italian cuisine. The accommodation offers a terrace. Speaking both English and Spanish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Quinta Alegria Shopping Mall is 700 metres from Gran SAHARA. Cancun International Airport is 55 km from the property, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description: General description: The hotel Barcelo Maya Riviera (adults only), especially popular with honeymooners, is located around 20 km from Playa del Carmen. The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Río Secreto. For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 90 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The beach hotel has 850 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, a lift, air conditioning, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 5 restaurants. In a total 5 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Laundry / ironing service is available for a fee. For the concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (where applicable, for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. address: Ctra. Federal Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 266.3, 77750 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo

For mobility there is a car rental company. Amenities: It is equipped with a reception, a lobby with bar, an air conditioning as well as discotheque. For the meals, there are 16 restaurants and a snack bar. In a total 15 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service, laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Here, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. address: 1 Avenida Norte Esquina 16 Norte Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, laundry facilities, and a freezer.Expedia

name: Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel
address: Av 10 Esquina Calle 44, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located a short walk from Terminal Foranea de Autobuses Station, Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Playa del Carmen. It also provides an outdoor pool, massage services and an express check-in and check-out feature. The hotel boasts a range of recreational amenities and services, including a bike trail, bicycle rental and Rooftop Pool. For families Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel offers babysitting/child services. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a coffee maker, a refrigerator and an iPod docking station. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room dining area, a kitchenette and a private bathroom. Newport House Playa Boutique Hotel is close to shops, dining and Playa del Carmen's nightlife. Xcaret Eco Theme Park and Xcaret Archaeological Site are just a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Thompson Playa Del Carmen - Adults Only
address: 5ta Avenida Norte Por 12, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Thompson Playa del Carmen is located in Playa del Carmen, 300 metres from 28 de Julio Square. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and free toiletries. You can engage in various activities, such as snorkeling and windsurfing. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Guests will have access to Tequila or Mezcal tasting, daily bottled water and a faster WiFi connection. ADO International Bus Station is 700 metres from Thompson Playa del Carmen, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 900 metres away. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport.

Bathrooms feature showers with rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and ceiling fans, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as a water park (surcharge) and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a vending machine. Business}, Other Amenities The front desk is staffed during limited hours. This hotel is 10.9 mi (17.5 km) from Quinta Avenida and 11.4 mi (18.4 km) from Mamitas Beach. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. name: Wyndham Alltra Playa del Carmen Adults Only
address: Constituyentes Number 1, 77500 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Wyndham Alltra Playa del Carmen provides 4-star accommodation in Playa del Carmen. It has a spa and wellness center, as well as free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and an outdoor pool. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24/7 and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They feature tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. Playa del Carmen's attractions, including Mexico Blue Dream and Mamitas Beach Club, are within easy walking distance of the resort. The local neighborhood is also famous for its shops and boutiques.HotelsCombined

name: Serenity Hotel Boutique
address: Avenida 10 Con Avenida 40, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: A New Vision of Luxury in Playa Del Carmen A combination of luxury and serenity in one of the most exclusive area in Playa del Carmen. Stay in one of our 30 Suites and Residences that perfectly balance minimalism and elegance. Enjoy an extraordinary culinary experience visiting our Mexican fusion cuisine restaurant or admire a colorful sunset at our Barbelo Roof Club with pool. Serenity Hotel Boutique is located in the heart of Playa del Carmen, a few steps away from la “Quinta Avenida”, a place full of life and color. Near the hotel you will find many attractions such as mayan ruins, cenotes, amusement parks, and amazing nightlife; our concierge service will gladly help you plan a magical vacation. Visit the Riviera Maya, and have a unique experience at Serenity Hotel Boutique. A Guarantee deposit of MXN 2,000 or the equivalent of USD 100 is required upon arrival. It can be paid in cash or by card and will be returned upon check-out.FarePortal

name: Aloft Playa del Carmen
address: Calle 34 Norte Manzana 100 Lote 3, 10/34 Midtown Shops, 77536 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Aloft Playa del Carmen is open in space and spirit, it is a reflection of the promise of our brand by offering purposeful environments and vibrant spaces within a destination that has become one of the most important in the Caribbean, thanks to being an ideal place to rest, go shopping, eat and live unforgettable adventures. It is a lively and bustling place, at any time of the day or night. As our destination, we are the next generation of hotel, using technology and design to enhance experiences and move at the fast pace of our guests.Marriott

name: Hotel Riviera Caribe Maya
address: Av. 10 / Calle 30, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Hotel Riviera Caribe Maya is located 6 minutes’ walk from Mamitas Beach Club in Playa del Carmen. Vibrant 5th Avenue is only 1 minutes’ walk away and free WiFi access is available in the hotel's common areas. Each bright and comfortable room here will provide you with a flat-screen cable TV and air conditioning. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Garden views can be enjoyed from the rooms. The most popular bars and restaurants in Playa del Carmen are just a few steps away along the 5th Avenue. At Hotel Riviera Caribe Maya you will find an airport shuttle, a 24-hour front desk and a garden. Other facilities offered at the property include grocery deliveries, a ticket service and a tour desk. The hotel is 1.3 km from ADO International Bus Station. Cancún and the international Airport are 50 minutes’ drive away.

name: Riu Palace Riviera Maya
address: Avenida Xaman-ha, Mza 9 And 10, L1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated directly at Playa del Carmen, this hotel is in a prime location. In the area, guests can appreciate the Mayan legacy, with spectacular pyramids and the popular ruins of Tulum, or the ruins of Cobá, or visit the reservation of the Sian Ka'an biosphere, where guests can find an untouched jungle. The club resort offers six restaurants and room service is available. There are also bars, a nightclub, a hairdressing salon, Internet access, a newsstand, boutiques, a laundry service and a concierge. The hotel also has a children's playground and a kids' club for younger guests to enjoy.FarePortal

name: El Dorado Seaside Suites by Karisma - Adults only
address: Km 95 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: El Dorado Seaside Suites is a resort located in Kantenah Bay in the Riviera Maya. The resort offers the renowned Gourmet Inclusive Experience, a full- service spa, 5 fresh-water pools, tennis court and a fitness centre. Each well appointed suite offers a hot tub for 2, satellite TV, DVD player, stocked minibar with beer, soft drinks and water, coffee maker and a furnished balcony or terrace. The floors are made of marble. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience consists of selection of 10 different restaurants and 11 bars where guests will be able to enjoy Latin fusion cuisine, authentic Mexican cuisine, contemporary Italian, Asian, a pub-style venue, world-style dishes and a beach BBQ. The bars can be located outdoors, by the pool area or in the lobby. Guests will be received with a welcome glass of sparkling wine, and can enjoy of the daily and nightly activities program prepared by the resort's staff, kayaking and snorkelling, bathrobes and beach towel services, diving lessons in one of the pools, and a sauna and steam room in the spa. Naay Spa features massages, a temazcal, facials and special body treatments. A tour desk, jewelry store and money exchange services can also be found within. El Dorado Seaside Suites is divided into two equally stunning sections - Palms and Infinity. Surround yourself with lush vegetation, coconut plantations, and authentic Mexican architecture in the intimately sized Palms, the resort's original section overlooking the ocean and gardens. Those looking for excitement will fall in love with the all-new, all-oceanfront Infinity section, featuring striking modern décor, breathtaking ocean views, and either a swim-up terrace or infinity pool balcony. With 24-hour room service, you may never actually need to leave your suite, but when you do, you'll find shaded, King-size Bali beds waiting for you on the beach, tended to by our attentive beach waiters.

name: Magic Blue Spa Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Avenida 10, Entre Calle 10 y 12 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in the heart of Playa del Carmen, only steps away from the city's famous 5th Avenue where nightlife, restaurants, shopping and attractions gather and a few blocks from the beach and different beach clubs where the hotel guests have access.Magic Blue Spa Boutique Hotel is adults only and features an outdoor pool, hot tub and pool snack-bar with sun lounge beds where guests can relax and enjoy drinks, cocktails and light meals.The brand new spa offers hydrotherapy which includes sauna, steam room, pool and an indoor hot tub to get relaxed and pampered. Also a great variety of massages and treatments are available for guests all year long; as well as a relaxing area for outdoor romantic massages.As part of the hotel services, Magic Blue Spa Boutique Hotel offers, Pool Butler,Experience team,Wi-Fi free of charge and a Brazilian Rodizio style restaurant.

name: Posada Mariposa Boutique Hotel
address: 5a Avenida Entre Calle 24 y 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: On Playa del Carmen's famous 5th Avenue, an area known as Little Italy, this small hotel offers unique, but comfortable guestrooms, just steps from the beaches of the Caribbean Sea. Hotel Posada Mariposa is surrounded by tropical gardens and offers guestrooms and suites with Mexican decor, including hand-made curtains and comforters. Guests will also enjoy in-room amenities such as free wireless internet access and cable TV. The area around the Posada Mariposa Hotel is filled with activities and attractions to explore. Guests can swim with dolphins, play a game of golf or discover the nearby Mayan ruins just minutes from the hotel.

name: Maya Villa Condo Hotel and Beachclub
address: 1 Avenida Norte Entre Calle 14 Norte y 16 Norte Bis, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This Maya Villa Condo Hotel is located on Playa del Carmen Q Roo, Mexico within walking distance to the Beach and features free Wi-Fi in all areas. The Maya Villa Condo Hotel is decorated with Mayan art and offers access to the beach club and fitness centre. All the condos have a unique combination of modern luxury and Mayan style, as well as modern kitchens. This Maya Villa Condo Hotel also offers access to the restaurants and the modern scuba shop. Laundry service is available with an extra charge. Upon check-in photo identification and credit card is required. All special requests are subject to availability upon check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges. One bedroom condos don't allow extra person. Please note that the rate does not include 16% and 5% taxes.

name: Chablé Maroma

The hotel is 1 km from 28 de Julio Square, 1.2 km from ADO International Bus Station and 1.3 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. Cancún International Airport is 50 km away.

name: Catalonia Playa Maroma
address: Carretera Federal 307 Km.306-250, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by lush mangrove forests, on Punta Maroma Beach, this all-inclusive hotel and spa offers a wide selection of activities, free Wi-Fi and a variety of dining options. Catalonia Playa Maroma - All-Inclusive features a beachfront swimming pool with a poolside bar. Guests can play a game of tennis or workout in the fitness center, then relax with a massage in the full-service spa. While adults enjoy non-motorized water sports at the beach, the kids can have fun at the children's club. Visitors can savor everything from authentic Mexican cuisine to fresh seafood at the All-Inclusive Playa Maroma Catalonia. During the day, a variety of beverages and snacks are available to enjoy by the pool or beach. After dinner, guests can dance the night away in the nightclub.

name: The Fives Downtown Hotel & Residences, Curio Collection by Hilton
address: Avenida 10 Calle 2, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The Fives Downtown is the picture-perfect retreat for your AAA Four Diamond Caribbean escapade. With 133 spacious residence-style suites, this hotel reflects the beauty of contemporary Mexican high design and the Mayan Riviera charm. Our enchanting hotel has a particular way of making you enjoy our Sensory Hospitality in every detail, from our impeccable service and avant-garde facilities to the wide variety of activities and experiences it provides for every kind of guest. Delight your senses with the majestic view of its rooftop, simply the best of the city. Swim in its incredible infinity pools while enjoying the best mixology, or relax to the fullest and revitalize the body, mind, and spirit at our world-class spa. Enjoy the city's best breakfasts at Mercatto, with balanced dishes prepared with the region's freshest ingredients. Do you want to enjoy Mexican folklore. At Cantina El Tigre, you can savor more than 100 tequila and mezcal brands and the city's best tacos. Additionally, thanks to its state-of-the-art meeting rooms, this property is an ideal destination to host events, from executive conferences and business meetings to the most exquisite parties and social occasions. Thanks to its privileged location, our hotel allows its guests to enjoy the pulsating nightlife, delightful eateries, and endless boutiques of Playa del Carmen's Quinta Avenida, ideal for even the most experienced travelers and shoppers. At The Fives Downtown, we take care of every detail to make your vacation experience in the Caribbean something worth remembering.Hilton

name: Hotel Esencia
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum Km. 265, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Xpu-Ha Beach, Hotel Esencia offers beautiful rooms and suites with terraces set amongst attractive gardens. It features a spa, 2 large outdoor swimming pools and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation has bright, attractive décor. Each suite and room has a flat-screen TV and an iPod docking station. The Garden Restaurant serves a selection of regional and international cuisine. The hotel also offers Mexican cookery classes. The Esencia’s spa features a plunge pool, sauna and hot tub. Treatments include massage and facials. The Riviera Maya coastline is ideal for diving and snorkelling. Guests can visit the Mayan ruins at Tulum, as well as the resort of Playa del Carmen, which can be reached within 15 minutes by car.

name: Anah Suites by Sunest
address: Avenida 20 entre calle 16 Norte y calle 14 norte centro, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering an outdoor pool, plus a spa and wellness centre, Anah Suites by Sunest is located in the heart of Playa del Carmen. It offers a children’s playground and free WiFi. The apartments are modern, boasting a minimalistic style. All are fully appointed and have an equipped kitchen. A safe that fits a lap top, TV and bed linen are included. Vibrant and popular 5th Avenue, where many restaurants, bars and shops are located, can be reached in a short 5-minute walk. Guest can also go to the large supermarket located 200 metres away to buy supplies for cooking en-suite. At Anah Suites by Sunest you will find a fitness centre. Other facilities like a games room, a tour desk and luggage storage are offered. The property offers free parking. Mamitas Beach Club is 1.2 km from Anah Suites by Sunest. Xcaret Eco-Theme Park is only 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Riu Yucatan
address: Avenida Xaman-ha, Manzana 3, Lote 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Charming colonial-style architecture meets one of the most beautiful beaches of the world – the Riu Yucatan close to the famous holiday resort of Playa del Carmen on the Mayan Riviera is a fantastic Caribbean oasis. It is surrounded by tropical gardens and a wonderful pool landscape and enjoys a white sandy beach, crystal-clear water and limitless excellent services.FarePortal

name: Casa Leo
address: Diagonal 65 av Sur Entre Calles 27 y 29, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Casa Leo has city views, free WiFi and free private parking, situated in Playa del Carmen, 2 km from Playa del Carmen Beach. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, pool views, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A minibar and kitchenware are also available, as well as a coffee machine. Guests at Casa Leo can enjoy an American breakfast. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation. Playacar Beach is 2.2 km from Casa Leo, while ADO International Bus Station is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 33 km from the aparthotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hacienda Tres Rios Resort Spa & Nature Park
address: Carretera Cancún-Tulum, Km. 54, 77760 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Rosewood Mayakoba
address: Carr Federal Cancun, Playa Del Carmen KM 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: More adventure heartland than hotel, the exhaustive Rosewood Mayakoba leaves its guests wanting for nothing. Accessed by boat, prepare to disappear into mangroves and lagoons at this family friendly retreat. The heart of darkness this is not – expert staff ensure pure lightness and warmth. Interiors favour a toned-down yet upscale mix of Yucatán limestone and darkwood furniture made by local artisans. Eco-tours, wellness services and eight (count them) bars and restaurants help pad out the day’s entertainment, and your own boat dock, plunge pool, and personal butler service heighten the decadence stakes.  Mr & Mrs Smith

name: Hotel Sol Playa
address: Avenida 5, Calle 88, Mza 460, Lote 4, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Just 300 meters from the beach in Playa del Carmen, Hotel Sol Playa offers air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It is a 30-minute stroll along the beach to the shops and bars of Fifth Avenue. A free breakfast is served daily. The rooms and studios feature a fridge, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a DVD player. Studios also have a well-equipped kitchenette. You can also enjoy Mexican and Italian cuisine in the La 88 restaurant located on the property. The Sol Playa offers information about the surrounding area and free street parking is available nearby. Xcaret Theme Park is just a 15-minute drive away, while the Mayan ruins of Tulum are around 45 minutes away.

name: Heaven at Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Km. 72 Carretera Cancun-Tulum, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: This stylish holiday resort is located in one of the most impressive and inspiring places of the world, right next to the beach and facing the warm waters of the Caribbean Sea. The resort offers an authentic rock star lifestyle experience for adults only and has its own private beach as well as various swimming pools. The guest rooms are tastefully decorated and feature high-quality amenities, such as a relaxing hydro spa tub for couples, which will ensure an unforgettable stay on the Riviera Maya. Travellers who stay in this hotel may enjoy exquisite national and international cuisine choosing between different on-site restaurants and bars. The establishment boasts a wide range of activities and leisure options during the day, and when the sun goes down guests may enjoy fantastic parties with professional DJ's. The spa, with its huge variety of treatments, is the best place to relax and recharge batteries after being dancing all night.FarePortal

name: Terrasse Hotel Playa del Carmen
address: Avenida 10 entre calle 56 y 58, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring a terrace, restaurant and views of city, Terrasse Hotel Playa del Carmen is located in Playa del Carmen, 1.2 km from Playa del Carmen Beach. Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. All rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at Terrasse Hotel Playa del Carmen have a balcony. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Playacar Beach is 2.7 km from Terrasse Hotel Playa del Carmen, while ADO International Bus Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 37 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Royal Haciendas All Suites Resort & Spa
address: Km 289 Carretera Federal Chetumal - Puerto Juarez Lote 2 Mz 70, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located next to the beach on the Mayan Riviera, the Royal Haciendas Resort & Spa offers luxury suites set in tropical gardens. The complex offers swimming pools, tennis courts and a free shuttle to Playa del Carmen. All accommodations have free Wi-Fi, and many suites have a seating area with a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Some also have wonderful ocean views. All reservations include two complimentary tickets for the Cancun Mayan Museum. Transportation not included. The Royal Haciendas complex has a spa and wellness centre with Turkish baths. There is also a fitness centre. The beach next to the complex offers loungers and parasols. The Hacienda complex offers activities including diving. Nearby Playa del Carmen offers a good range of shops, bars and restaurants, as well as beautiful natural surroundings. Cancun International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Barcelo Maya Caribe
address: Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Villas Sacbe Condo Hotel and Beach Club
address: 1st Norte Between 12 And 14 Streets, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in lush gardens, Villas Sacbe Condo Hotel and Beach Club offers an outdoor pool, access to a gym, beach club and spa. It is located just steps from the popular 12th street, which boasts nightlife and restaurants. Villas Sacbe apartments are elegantly decorated and feature fully equipped kitchenettes, seating and dining areas, a cable TV. The penthouse has its own private plunge pool. This property is just 150 meters from the popular 5th Avenue, where most of the shops, bars, restaurants and nightlife of Playa del Carmen are found. Free private parking is possible on site, and Wi-Fi connection is available for free. Villas Sacbe also offers additional services with extra cost, including laundry, airport shuttle and babysitting.

name: The Green Village Hotel
address: Calle 20 Entre Av 10 Y 15, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering a garden, swimming pool, roof-top terrace and modern décor, The Green Village Boutique Hotel is located 2 minutes’ walk from the famous 5th Avenue and 5 minutes’ walk from Mamitas Beach. The rooms feature wooden furniture, air conditioning and either private or shared bathroom. Some of the rooms have a balcony. Guests can find a variety of restaurants, bars and nightclubs at 5th Avenue. There is also an on-site common kitchen. A supermarket is 10 minutes’ walk from The Green Village Boutique Hotel. This property also features a lounge TV with movie theatre, high speed internet, bike rental and massages treatments. Tours to cenotes and Xpu-Ha can be arranged onsite. The Green Village Boutique Hotel is 45 minutes' drive from Cancun International Airport.

name: Casa Gem B&B
address: Av Diagonal 80 Sur Lte 17, 77712 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 3 guestrooms featuring espresso makers and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. This bed & breakfast also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). The complimentary shuttle will take you to the nearby beach or shopping center. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A cruise ship terminal shuttle is provided at no charge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Playa del Carmen, Casa Gem B&B is by the ocean, within a 10-minute drive of Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and Xplor Theme Park. This beach bed & breakfast is 2.5 mi (4.1 km) from Playa del Carmen Main Beach and 2.6 mi (4.1 km) from Playacar Golf Club. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the bed & breakfast's coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to noon. name: Aruma Hotel
address: Av 10 No. 2 Entre 10 y 10 Bis, 77100 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen within 600 metres of ADO International Bus Station and a 9-minute walk of Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, Aruma Hotel offers rooms with free WiFi. The property is situated 700 metres from Disabled-friendly beach, 900 metres from Kool Beach Club and 2.3 km from Church of Guadalupe. The property is set 200 metres from Plaza Quinta Alegria. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help guests with any queries that they may have. Rio Secreto is 9 km from Aruma Hotel, while 28 de Julio Square is 100 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Luxury Condo Boutique
address: Calle 38 Norte And 5 Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 12 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. 40-cm LED televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided once per stay. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities, which include a fitness center. Additional amenities at this Beaux Arts hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include multilingual staff, luggage storage, and ATM/banking services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Luxury Condo Boutique places you in the heart of Playa del Carmen, within a 10-minute walk of Quinta Avenida and Playa del Carmen Main Beach. This 4-star hotel is 6.7 mi (10.8 km) from Xcaret Eco Theme Park and 0.4 mi (0.6 km) from Mamitas Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's many dining establishments, which include 4 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafe. name: Mahekal Beach Front Resort & Spa
address: 38 St And The Beach, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Welcome to the enchanting and magical Mayan paradise in Playa del Carmen - Mexico. Nestled between lush tropical gardens rich in flora and fauna - the vast white sandy beach and the indescribable turquoise water of the Caribbean Sea await you. Among the most pictures accommodations in Playa del Carmen - the Mahekal Beach Resort is a beach front hotel with exquisite hotel accommodation with unique spa services and exciting Mayan excursions to the nearby ancient ruins. The resort has well established roots in the area and provides the perfect getaways for guests since 1982. Our resort welcomes guests to our unique 4 star resort retreat with thatched roof palapas and spacious - oceanfront rooms featuring private terraces or balconies. The resort is located on the Caribbean Sea with a gorgeous beach in Playa del Carmen along the Riviera Maya. Convenient to the shops and restaurants of 5th Avenue - or "La Quinta" as it is known locally.iHotelier/iStay

name: Bluebay Grand Esmeralda
address: Carr. Chetumal - Puerto Juárez Km 300, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The hotel is located on the Riviera Mayan about 15 minutes north of Playa del Carmen, with its restaurants, bars, exciting nightlife and shopping opportunities, and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport. Links to public transport can be found 15 min from the hotel. Property located on 180-acres of beachfront overlooking the azure waters of Mexico's beautiful Mayan RivieraWebBeds

name: Nina Hotel Playa del Carmen
address: Calle 6 Norte Entre Av. 10 Y Av. 15, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located just 1 block from the famous 5th Avenue and 10 minutes’ walk from the beach club, Nina Hotel Playa del Carmen offers a swimming pool and a spacious garden. The rooms come with safety box, ceiling fan, air conditioning and flat-screen cable TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Restaurant options are available at just 6 blocks away from the property. This property is close to a variety of restaurants, cafés, shops and lounges. Cancún International Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Petit Lafitte Hotel
address: Carretera Cancun, Chetumal Km 296 2.1 Xcalacoco, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Facilities The hotel offers a restaurant, a bar and a TV room. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (no extra charge). Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, a fan and a bathroom. Most rooms come with a balcony or terrace. Most accommodation units offer a side sea view. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. The rooms offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. An ironing set is also available to guests. Convenient features include a telephone and a TV. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The hot tub offers revitalisation. Variety is offered by the range of sports and leisure options available at the hotel, including a spa, a steam bath and massage treatments. Guests are entertained with live music in a friendly atmosphere. Meals Half board is bookable as a board option.WebBeds

name: Acanto Playa del Carmen, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: 16th Street, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: A Peaceful Oasis in Playa del Carmen Steps from 5th Avenue, beautiful beaches, and exciting nightlife Welcome to Acanto Playa del Carmen, Trademark Collection by Wyndham offering easy access to 5th Avenue restaurants, bars, and stores. Just steps from the glistening shores of Riviera Maya, this hotel puts you close to lively beach clubs and Xcaret Eco Park, plus shopping at Quinta Alegria and the interactive 3D Museum of Wonders. You can plan a day trip to see Tulums Mayan ruins or visit the island of Cozumel for scuba diving. Plus, Cancun International Airport is 55 kilometers away. During your stay, enjoy free breakfast and unwind at the outdoor pool or on the rooftop boasting ocean views.Wyndham

name: Viva Wyndham Azteca
address: Paseo Avenida Xaman Ha Manzana 8, Lote 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Indretning Viva Azteca is situated within the breathtaking tropical scenery of the Mayan Riviera that remains lodged in your memory like a dream. This is the essence of Mexico, a passionate place full of the natural smiles of the local people, incredible food and a cultura mixed from the relaxed style of the Caribbean and aeons of ancient history. Some of the advantages of this exclusive resort are the 18 hole championship golf course and Viva Maya, just a walk sway, to complete an unrivalled vacation.WebBeds

name: Ocean Zen Suites on 5th Avenue - Adults Only
address: Quinta Avenida (5a) Calle 68 y 70, 77728 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Ocean Zen Suites - Eco Luxury Hotel Suites with amazing roof top infinity pool with views of the Turquoise blue waters of the Mexican Caribbean over lush green trees. Punta Esmeralda, Clean powdery sandy quiet beaches and turquoise waters are less than 400 meters away or less than 5 minutes stroll. Yes, we are located on peaceful and quiet famous NEW Quinta (5th Avenue), away from the Noisy bars. Neighborhood local restaurants, Fruit/Vegetable market and 24-Hour store are less than 5 minutes’ walk. Relax on the roof top terrace infinity pool area, watching the amazing sunrise or lay in the sunbeds at night gazing at the moon and stars and feeling the cool breeze. We are an Eco-Friendly Boutique hotel, AC units at Ocean Zen suites are Solar powered. Hot water tanks are European design with hot water on demand. FREE- Harvested and Purified RAIN WATER supplied to OCEAN ZEN SUITES by RAIN-HA, tested by Mexican Government Authority Labs. Please bring your own bottle (BYOB) for FREE Refills of Pure Rain water. No acid rain, No chemicals. Modern bathroom with, water saving showers and toilets. Shampoo, Body wash, Conditioner and hand soap are all naturally made from pure honey by Mayans from Mayans Village. Each of Suite has FREE Premium Internet, with direct connect and your own FREE WIFI allocated to that Suite. FREE WIFI by the Infinity pool and all common area. Our Eco- Luxury Suites are ergonomically designed for your comfort. Combination decor and atmosphere with modern Eco technology. All beds, patio and pool furniture are hand made by Mayans with local solid hard wood. Come stay with us experience Ocean Zen Suits -where Eco Luxury meets Serenity.

name: Caballito CM-103 By Nas
address: 1 Ave Norte, Between Calle 10 & 12, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Aspira Hotel Playa del Carmen
address: Calle 16 Norte Entre 10 y 15 Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi in all areas, an outdoor pool and a terrace, Aspira Hotel Playa del Carmen offers accommodation in Playa del Carmen, with walking distance to the main shopping malls, restaurants, bars & night clubs. Every room has a flat-screen TV. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room comes with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and an on-site restaurant. La Ceiba Bar & Buffet offers breakfast, lunch and dinner, features a variety of beverages and a terrace and the hotel is located 3 minutes walking distance to the beach. ADO International Bus Station is 900 metres from Aspira Hotel Playa del Carmen, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 20 km from the property.

name: The Royal Haciendas Resort and Spa
address: Chetumal / Pto. Juarez Highway, Km 289 10 Lote 2, Mz 70, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: The Riviera Maya EDITION (SM) at Kanai
address: Paseo Kanai 14, 77730 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located on a pristine beachfront site, in the blissful stretch of Caribbean coastline, The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai features 182 guestrooms and suites situated within the luxurious Kanai development, and home to five food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, pool bar and beach club, destination spa and an expansive 4000 sqm Penthouse Suite. In addition to multiple meeting spaces, the hotel also houses an extensive outdoor deck for large-scale events and parties. The Riviera Maya EDITION at Kanai is the first property in Mexico, proud representative of the collection of individualized, customized, one-of-a-kind hotels conceived by Ian Schrager in collaboration with Marriott International.Marriott

name: Serenity Authentic Glamping Tulum
address: Carretera Federal Xpu-Ha Km 265 Lote 6, 77790 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: Offering a garden and year-round outdoor pool, the property is located 18 km south of Playa del Carmen, 27 km from the famous Tulum archaeological site and at just 200 metres away from Xpu-Ha beach. The luxurious tented camp is surrounded by the native jungle and offer king and queen size beds, a colonial type desk, chair and large mirror. En suite bathrooms, toilet and separate shower plate are also included. Other facilities offered at the property include a destination expert desk, luggage storage and an array of activities that can be enjoyed in the surroundings, including snorkeling and diving. The property offers free parking. Playa del Carmen is only 20 minutes away and can be also reached via the shuttle service (extra fee).

name: Hotel El Campanario
address: Avenida 15 Norte No. 218, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is within 5 minutes’ walk of Playa del Carmen Beach and offers guests free entrance to Coco Maya Beach Club. It features a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi. Rooms and suites have air conditioning and a fan. There is a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom. Most have a kitchenette with a fridge and stove. Some have a balcony, and suites have a large terrace. Hotel El Campanario Playa del Carmen is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the shops, bars, restaurants and night life of Fifth Avenue.

name: Nasim Condo Hotel Playa Del Carmen
address: Calle 34 Norte Esquina Avenida 10, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: We are on North 34th Street and 10th Avenue, meters from Fifth Avenue and the beach. They are around, restaurants, bars and nightlife nearby. The building has a beautiful pool. Each of our condos has high speed internet, smart TV, coffee maker, beach towels, and everything you need for a comfortable stay. MANDARINO BEACH CLUB FREE ACCESS; Guests can enjoy the facilities of the Mandarino Beach Club beach club just 10 minutes walk from the Condominium. CHEDRAUI SELECT with restaurants around, it is located in front of our condominium, it is the only supermarket in the area. EXCURSIONS to the parks leave in front of the condo. MARIO VILLANUEVA SPORTS CLUB, is located in front of the condominium, where you can do free sports activities. PARKING 15 meters from the accommodation, payment. CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST at our Negroamaro restaurant 3 minutes from the Condominium (optional) The price of the reservation per room does not include the cleaning service (ask at reception). In case the person needs a daily cleaning service, they must pay a daily additional cleaning day, depending on the season (ask at reception).

name: Hotel Maya Turquesa - Playa del Carmen

Cocos Cabañas Playa del Carmen Adults Only offers both Mexican and international cuisine, including pizzas made in Cocos’ wood-fired oven, and a range of Mexican appetizers such as guacamole, ceviche, or quesadillas. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, cable flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. ADO International Bus Station is less than 1 km from Encanto Riviera, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is a 14-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: Grand Riviera Princess All Suites & Spa Resort
address: Prolongacion 5ta Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens and an extensive pool landscape, the Grand Riviera Princess has Mayan inspired architecture with thatched roofs and enjoys a wonderful setting directly on the white sandy beach and the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean Sea. Various thematic restaurants leave no culinary wish unfulfilled, 10 bars and a wide range of services and amenities are at guests disposition.FarePortal

name: Antera Hotel & Residences
address: Avenida 10 Norte Esquina Calle 6, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Playa del Carmen, 300 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, Antera Hotel & Residences features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a terrace and a bar. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Some rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. All rooms have a safety deposit box. Antera Hotel & Residences offers an American or vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 34 km from Antera Hotel & Residences, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Playa Del Carmen
address: Av. Constituyentes Entre Av. 10 y Av. 15, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Playa del Carmen Hotel Welcome to the brand new Holiday Inn Express® and Suites Playa del Carmen Hotel, the ideal choice for your family vacation Honey Moon or business trip. The hotel is located steps away from Quinta Alegria Mall, It is located at one of Playa del Carmen principal streets and offers easy access to the most important archaeological zones. Our hotel’s privileged location provides easy access to the downtown, famous nightclubs and also to the beach. Enjoy a comfortable standard room or stay at one of our 57 suites, all of them equipped with mini fridge and microwave, besides of a warm service, and amenities such as a fitness center, a rooftop pool, and a complimentary Express Start breakfast. We also offer free high-speed wireless internet access, a business center, and a meeting room with space for 100 people.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mararena Condos by Nah Hotels
address: Av 10 Norte Entre 20 y 22, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Playa del Carmen, 600 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach and 200 metres from the centre, Mararena Condos by Nah Hotels features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a rooftop pool. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and free toiletries. The aparthotel offers a picnic area. Barbecue facilities are at guests' disposal and guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Popular points of interest near Mararena Condos by Nah Hotels include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 35 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: City Express by Marriott Playa Del Carmen
address: Av Balamkanche Lt 4 Mza 30 Playacar Fase II, 11000 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: City Express by Marriott Playa del Carmen is close to all of the hot spots in the Riviera Maya beautiful beaches, the famous Xcaret Park and impressive archeological sites.Playa del Carmen is the region's top destination for shopping, dining and nightlife. It's right in the heart of the Riviera Maya, a magical coastal district that combines rich history with natural beauty.Take an excursion to Tulum, a Mayan city unlike any other. The picturesque archaeological site was built overlooking the Caribbean Coast, and offers a stunning collection of beaches. For an unforgettable hands-on experience, visit Xcaret, an eco-archeological theme park near Cancun. It offers a rare opportunity for you and your family to get up close to native wildlife and endangered species, including spider monkeys, sea turtles and manatees. And you can go swimming in the cenotes, subterranean rivers and beaches. A day in Xcaret is an once-in-a-lifetime adventure.Marriott

address: 5ta. Av. Norte No. 324 entre 26 y 28 sur, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Senses Quinta Avenida By Artisan Adults Only is located right on Playa del Carmen’s 5th Avenue, and offers an infinity pool and stylish rooms with private hot tubs. Each elegant air-conditioned room offers free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV, a coffee machine and a minibar. The modern bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some of the rooms have a hot tub. You can also find a wide range of international restaurants and lively bars on 5th Avenue. Kool Beach Club is just a 15-minute walk from Senses Quinta Avenida By Artisan Adults Only. The beautiful Mayan ruins of Tulum and Cancun International Airport are both within a 45-minute drive.

name: El Dorado Royale a Spa Resort by Karisma - Adults only
address: Km 45 Carretera Cancun, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: El Dorado Royale is an adults-only, beachfront resort on The Riviera Maya. It features 14 restaurants with the exclusive Gourmet Inclusive Experience, more than a mile of a secluded beach area, a lavish spa, and concierge services. A wonderful cenote site can be found within 25 minutes' drive away. The elegant suites and rooms at El Dorado Royal offer an indoor hot tub, bathrobes, cable TV, a furnished terrace with a small table, 2 chairs and a hammock upon request, plus a private bathroom including a hairdryer. The minibar is daily stocked with beer, soft drinks and water, plus there is a coffee maker available. The Gourmet Inclusive Experience includes flavours from the international cuisine, contemporary Italian dishes, Pacific flavours, Caribbean selection, authentic Mexican delights, traditional Italian and gourmet pizzas, among others. Naay Spa is divided into Spa Royale and Spa Casitas. Both offer an extensive menu of traditional and alternative spa treatments. Other activities that guests can enjoy at this resort include diving lessons and the rental of the equipment, a gift shop on site, WiFi access, tennis lessons and wave runners to cruise the sea.

name: Platinum Yucatan Princess All Suites -Adults Only
address: Prolongación 5ta Avenida Manzana 20 Lote 006, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo

Free WiFi access is available throughout. The suites will provide you with a TV and air conditioning. Featuring a spa bath, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Extras include a minibar, an iPod dock and a seating area. At Platinum Yucatan Princess Adults Only - All InclusiveAll Suites & Spa Resort you will find 1 international buffet and 4 a la carte restaurants (without previous reservation), a tennis court and a fitness centre. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and water sports facilities. This property is 10 minutes’ drive from Plaza Las Américas Shopping Centre and 18 km from Xcaret Park. Cancún International Airport is 50 km away.

Paradisus La Perla Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property. The resort has an outdoor pool and hot tub, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant Free private parking is available on site. Room Service – Included. Service charge of $5 usd per delivery applies. Royal Service categories will have the service included with no extra fee. A supplement applies to book Bali Beds located at La Perla or La Esmeralda swimming pool area.FarePortal

address: Carr.Fed.307 Chetumal, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxurious resort is located 25 minutes from International Cancun Airport, 30 minutes from Cancun and only 20 minutes from Playa del Carmen. With more than half a mile white sand beach, located in Playa del Secreto (The Secret Beach) in the Riviera Maya.WebBeds

name: City Express Suites by Marriott Playa Del Carmen
address: Av. Balamkamche Mza. 30 Lt 4, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: City Express Suites by Marriott Playa del Carmen is located at Playa car, an exclusive residential area just five minutes away from the beach and right by the Cancun-Tulum highway. This location is ideal, since downtown Playa is only half a mile away and, at the same time, you get easy access to the highway that leads to fun sites like Xcaret, Xel-Ha and Tulum. Whether you're in town for business or on vacation, this is truly the best place to stay at. The suite rooms are perfect for family vacations. Enjoy unique experiences with them, such as a show at Cirque du Soleil Riviera Maya or a fun night at Xoximilco. Plus, Centro Maya is right across the street and has all of the services you would expect from a big mall. Discover the experience of staying at City Express Suites Playa del Carmen in your next visit to this Caribbean paradise.Marriott

description: The hotel is situated on the coast of the Yucatan Peninsula, on one of the world's best beach. It lies a mere 50 km south of Cancun, 32 km south of Cancun International Airport and is surrounded by vibrant coral reefs, soft sand White adventurous attractions.WebBeds

address: Calle 14 norte esquina con 1ra av. norte bis, mz 35 lt 9, colonia centro, playa del carmen, solidaridad Qroo, CP 77710, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Singular Joy Vacation Rentals has an outdoor swimming pool, bar, jauzzi, a shared lounge and garden in Playa del Carmen. Located around 150 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also less than 1 km away from Playacar Beach. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Certain rooms come with a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. At Singular Joy Vacation Rentals rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Located in the heart of the nightclub district so it is very convenient for guests looking for nightlife options. Night Club District, Indigo Beach Club,Zenzi Beach Club and Lido Beach Club. Popular points of interest near Singular Joy Vacation Rentals include ADO International Bus Station, Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and Kool Beach Club. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 21 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fairmont Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen Km 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: With the Caribbean Sea on one side and 240 acres of tropical forest and sparkling lagoons on all others, Fairmont Mayakoba is a hidden paradise on the coast of Mexico. Our private gated resort invites you to reconnect with nature, while enjoying all the services and facilities of an AAA Five Diamond hotel. Delve into your lush surroundings, play in the waves at nearby Playa del Carmen or relax poolside at our 5-star Riviera Maya hotel. Then dine on a decadent variety of cuisines in our restaurants.accorhotels.com

name: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel by Karisma - Adults only
address: KM.95 Carretera Cancun-Tulum Kantenah, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Playa Del Carmen. The property offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. To be found at the property are 24-hour front desk, valet parking, room service, airport transfer, car hire. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room, or take advantage of the hot tub, private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool. Convenience and comfort make Hidden Beach Resort Au Naturel Club Gourmet All In the perfect choice for your stay in Playa Del Carmen.Agoda

name: Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba
address: Carretera Federal Cun Playa, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba consists of ultra luxurious, fully furnished 3 and 4 bedroom residences provided with the unmatched service and amenities of Fairmont Mayakoba, containing a host of leisure and retail facilities to which Owners will have access. The Fairmont Heritage Place Mayakoba community is set aside from the hotel, granting additional privacy and exclusivity to its owners.accorhotels.com

name: Grand Fifty Suites
address: Calle 50, Av 5ta & 1ra Nte Mz 279, Lt 6, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 600 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach, Grand Fifty Suites offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and free WiFi. The property is 2.5 km from Playacar Beach, and within 1.2 km of the city centre. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms have a coffee machine, while selected rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental breakfast is available every morning at Grand Fifty Suites. ADO International Bus Station is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 37 km from Grand Fifty Suites.

name: La Divina by Aldea Thai
address: Av. Cozumel Mz.81 Lt. 1, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This elegant and sophisticated property set in Playa del Carmen offers an outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi access, and is located only 160 metres from vibrant 5th Avenue and 10 metres from the white-sand beaches of the Caribbean. The spacious and comfortable apartments have a modern décor and feature balconies offering partial ocean view, flat-screen TVs, cable channels and a fully equipped kitchen, plus seating and dining areas. Toiletries are provided within the bathrooms with showers. The penthouse apartments feature roof top terraces with private plunge pools. Popular 5th Avenue offers a wide variety of restaurants, bars and nightlife entertainment. Also, Mamitas Beach Club, Kool Beach Club & Coralina are located in front of the property. The friendly staff at La Divina by Aldea Thai can help the guests with information about interesting touristic spots, like Tulum Archaeological Site, or Xcaret Nature Park, both reachable in 45 minutes and 15 minutes’ drive respectively. Activities like scuba diving, golf and snorkelling can be arranged, extra fees might be applicable.

name: Hotel Bosque Caribe , 5th Av Zone
address: Calle 20 MZ 52 L4 entre 5a y 10 Ave, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Bosque Caribe, 5th Av. Zone is next to the famous Fifth Avenue shopping street. The property is set in tropical gardens with hammocks and features an outdoor pool. All air-conditioned rooms have fan, and a minibar. Single rooms have got shared bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy À la carte breakfast in the hotel's restaurant, from 07:30 until 11:00. Parking available for a fee.

name: Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt
address: Carretera Federal Cancun-Playa Del Carmen Km. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering two outdoor pools and a private beach area, Upscale Andaz Mayakoba is in the gated Mayakoba complex in Playa del Carmen. The resort has a spa centre and sauna, and guests can enjoy a meal at one of the 4 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and free private parking is available on this pet friendly property. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain units include views of the sea or lake. Rooms include a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. The restaurant offer cover fine dinning with Casa Amate, fresh and local ingredients with relaxed environment with Cocina Milagro, and beachfront street and sea food at Sotavento and Tinta del Pulpo. Room service is also available 24 hours. This elegant resort offers a Mayan Oasis Spa with 6 massage rooms and a hydrotherapy circuit centre and sauna and access to El Camaleón Golf Club and the Mayakoba Tennis Centre. This resort has water sports facilities and free use of bicycles is available. You can engage in various activities, such as golfing and snorkelling. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 9 km from Andaz Mayakoba, while Church of Guadalupe is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancun International Airport, 40 km from Andaz Mayakoba - a concept by Hyatt. This hotel only accepts credit cards, debit cards and, where applicable, other contactless forms of payment. It is a cash-free environment

name: El Taj Oceanfront & Beachside Condo Hotel
address: 1 Norte Esquina Calle 14 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in tropical gardens next to Playa del Carmen Beach, these luxury suites offer access to an infinity pool, outdoor hot tub and spa. Guests enjoy free access to the beach club. Suites at El Taj Oceanfront Condo Hotel offer a large terrace. El Taj property is composed by two buildings. Oceanfront suites offer sea views and direct beach access, while Beachside suites overlook the pool, fish pond and gardens. Each spacious suite has elegant Bali-inspired décor and a typical palapa thatched roof. A Smart TV and modern kitchen are included. Gourmet cuisine is served in El Taj Condo’s ASI restaurant, while pizzas, snacks and drinks are available in the beach bar. You can also request a private chef to prepare meals in your suite. El Taj is situated in central Playa del Carmen, just 2 blocks from Fifth Avenue. This popular boulevard is home to boutiques, pavement cafés, bars and restaurants.

name: Palmaia, The House of AiA
address: Paseo Xaman Ha, Lt.1, Playacar, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Strategically situated at the tail end of the most beautiful beach in the Riviera Maya, The House of AïA brings us Palmaïa, an exclusive beach enclave focused on connecting us to nature, ourselves, and the sanctity of life. Every effort was taken to ensure the original landscape remains untouched to feel the healing authenticity of old-growth trees and naturally occurring, cool-water cenotes. All guests reside in ocean-front suites: some with swim-out access to the infinity pools, others with sweeping views of the sea, and a few nestled among the ocean-side mangroves. Guests also enjoy high-end amenities without sacrificing environmentally friendly practices, while the restaurants offer the best cuisine in the region, extensive plant-based options, and impeccable style. But even still, the real jewels are the Architects of Life personal growth program and the Rituals of Sound series. The Hotel is Pet Friendly, for more information contact the hotel.FarePortal

name: Aldea Thai Penthouses By Smart
address: Calle 28 Norte Entre, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Situated 100 metres from Playa del Carmen Beach and 1.8 km from Playacar Beach in the centre of Playa del Carmen, Aldea Thai Penthouses By SMART features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Some accommodation includes a terrace with sea views, a fully equipped kitchen and a shared bathroom with bath. At the aparthotel guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub, spa facilities and a fitness room. In addition to a year-round outdoor pool, Aldea Thai Penthouses By SMART also offers a an indoor play area. ADO International Bus Station is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International, 36 km from Aldea Thai Penthouses By SMART, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Grand Hyatt Playa Del Carmen Resort
address: 1a Avenida Esquina Calle 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering 3 ocean-front outdoor pools and a spa and wellness centre with spectacular architecture resembling a Cenote, Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort is located in Mamita’s Beach. The design concept has crafted natural elements, artwork, textures and light. The rooms will provide you with a TV, air conditioning, iPod dock and seating area. Complete with a coffee machine, the dining area also has a dining table. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. Extras include free WiFi in all rooms and floor-to-ceiling windows featuring amazing views. At Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort you will find 2 restaurants serving steak specialties and international cuisine, 3 bars and a fitness centre. Unique food and beverage concepts and signature offerings from our restaurants and bars, such as Sushi "n" Raw Seafood Bar and La Cocina, will set the stage for you to enjoy the local flavors of Grand Hyatt Playa del Carmen Resort. Room Service available 24 hours. Other facilities offered at the property include water sports facilities, meeting facilities, Beauty Salon and a games room. There is also a multi-purpose ballroom plus fifteen meeting rooms and various indoor and outdoor pre-function areas for events. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out the famous shopping, gastronomic and party scenes at La Quinta Avenida. This resort is 55.5 km from Cancún International Airporttional Airport.
