name: Unico 20°n 87°w - Riviera Maya - Adults Only
address: Manzana 22 Carretera Chetumal-Pto Juare, 77710 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Akumal, a few steps from Kantenah Beach, Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. 30 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 30 km from ADO International Bus Station, the property provides a range of water sports facilities, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort, the rooms include a wardrobe. All rooms have air conditioning, and some units at Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only have a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and vegetarian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Indonesian and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. You can play billiards at this 5-star resort, and the area is popular for snorkelling. Tulum Archeological Site is 33 km from Unico Hotel Riviera Maya Adults Only, while Xel Ha is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 45 km from the resort.

name: Hotel Colibri Beach
address: 1 Avenida Norte Bis Entre 10 y 12, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring Mexican-style décor, Hotel Colibri Beach is a sea-front boutique hotel located in the heart of Playa del Carmen. The city's famous 5th avenue, world-known for its restaurants, bars, discotheques and shopping areas are only one block away. Featuring 33 picturesque rooms, Colibri Beach Hotel has everything you need for a delightful stay in this Caribbean destination. Most rooms face the tropical garden and some of them have gorgeous ocean views. All rooms offer complimentary wifi, fan, air conditioning and some rooms include a balcony with hammocks and views of the garden or street. All bathrooms are private and full equiped. It also has available bathroom accessories you may need at a minimum cost, such as toothbrush and paste, hair brush, shaver, etc. All breakfasts are included and served with your feet in the sand at Lido Beach Club which offers a palapa thatched roof and some of the best Playa's food with an international inspiration with a Mexican touch cuisine. A wide variety of cocktails at the Palapa Swing Bar and live bands are also a big attraction to all guests. Sunbeds may be available based on beach lenght and sea tide. It features 14 linear parking spaces, and it is necessary to leave the keys at the reception when parking. The hotel also has available several tours upon request at the front-desk, from Chitchen-Itza to cenotes, the Tulum beach front, Xcaret entertaining parks, water sports, and many others. Cancún International Airport is 50 minutes drive away from the hotel and another 50 minutes away from Tulum.

name: Ocean Maya Royale - Adults Only
address: Carretera Federal Chetumal, km. 299, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Offering endless activities, international on-site dining and full-service spa treatments, Ocean Maya Royale provides oceanfront accommodations. Guests can enjoy direct beach access in the heart of the Mayan Riviera, near Cozumel and Cancun. With an on-site scuba diving center and daily organized activities, there is something for everyone at the Ocean Maya Royale. Take advantage of the resort's nightly live entertainment or relax in one of the 2 oceanfront swimming pools. Sample a large variety of dining options while staying at the Ocean Maya Royale, including authentic Japanese cuisine and traditional Mexican dishes. The resort also features several on-site bars. In the area surrounding the Ocean Maya Royale, discover a large variety of recreational activities, including jet skiing and guided jungle tours. The area is also home to one of the world's largest coral reefs, and is ideal for scuba diving or snorkeling.

name: Be Playa
address: Avenida 10, Esquina calle 26, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This upscale Playa del Carmen hotel features a gourmet restaurant and rooftop lounge with infinity pool. It is situated in the center of Riviera Maya and near shopping on Fifth Avenue. Each suite at Be Playa is decorated in modern designs with clean white walls, white marble and hardwood floors. A flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and an iPod docking station are all provided. Playa del Carmen Be Playa’s restaurant, Sushi Club, serves gourmet sushi and Asian cuisine. Guests can also enjoy live music at the luxury restaurant. The pool lounge offers signature cocktails. Be Playa – Playa del Carmen has a tour desk that can assist with a variety of activities. A currency exchange center and laundry facilities are on site.

name: Fairmont Mayakoba, Riviera Maya
address: Ctr. Federal Cancun - Playa Del Carmen KM. 298, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, this beachfront property is in the entertainment district, 0.3 mi (0.5 km) from El Camaleon Mayakoba Golf Course, and 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Tres Rios Ecopark. Mamitas Beach Club and Playa del Carmen Main Beach are also within 6 mi (10 km).Expedia

name: The Carmen - Beachfront, Adults Only
address: Calle 8 Norte Manzana 4 #876, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Playa del Carmen, The Carmen - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a few steps from Playa del Carmen Beach, 700 metres from Playacar Beach and 500 metres from ADO International Bus Station. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel, each room comes with a balcony. Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal is 700 metres from The Carmen - Adults Only, while Church of Guadalupe is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: La Reina Roja Hotel Boutique
address: Calle 20 Entre Av. 5 Y 10, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located right in the center of downtown Playa del Carmen just a few steps away from Fifth Avenue and its famous night life, luxury shopping and dining scene where you will experience the laid back lifestyle that the Riviera Maya has to offer. The modern and provocative Avant-Garde building design together with its Pop Art conceptual decoration of each of our deluxe rooms and junior suites and thematic suites offer a unique and unforgettable experience for your vacation trip.In addition to having high luxury amenities and services for your enjoy and pleasure live a unique experience as a couple, with friends or on your business trip while discovering the original proposal that our "adults-only" hotel has to offer. Live the Reina Roja full experience with our Resort (Lifestyle) Fee,which will give you exclusive access to our luxury amenities and services for a complete vacation experience. Includes: • American Breakfast (served from 8am to 11pm) • 2x1 on all Barista drinks • Luxury amenities in the room, Wi-Fi • Environmental tax included.

name: La Pasion Hotel Boutique by Bunik
address: Calle 10 Norte Entre 15 Y 20, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Property Location With a stay at La Pasion Hotel Boutique, you'll be centrally located in Playa del Carmen, steps from Central Square and Nuestra Senora del Carmen Catholic Church. This hotel is within close proximity of Yucatek Divers and Quinta Alegria.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 28 air-conditioned rooms featuring plasma televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and ceiling fans.Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities Treat yourself with massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.Dining Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.WebBeds

name: Sandos Caracol Eco Experience Resort
address: Carretera Cancún Chetumal Km. 295, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This property is located on the beachfront. Featuring a spa, 9 restaurants and 2 outdoor pools and an water park with 29 water slides for kids and adults, Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is set on Playa del Carmen Beach, overlooking Cozumel Island. Some of the rooms have balconies overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is in beautiful gardens and features bright accommodations. All rooms have flat-screen TVs, air conditioning and a minibar. Wi-Fi is available for free in public areas. Sandos Caracol Eco Resort features lessons, including yoga and scuba diving. There is also a water sports center, evening entertainment, and children's and teen's activities. Spa facilities include a sauna, hot tub and gym. There are 3 buffetes including international and itialian, plus 6 a la carte restaurants (Oriental, Mexican Brazilian, Italian, Mediterranean and stake house), we also have a 24 hour snack bar available. There are ecological activities for the whole family. The Sandos Caracol Eco Resort is 3.2 km from the Church of Guadalupe and a 45-minute drive from Cancún Airport. The Gran Coral Golf Riviera Maya is located within the same estate as the Sandos.

name: La Casa de la Playa by Xcaret- All Fun Adults Only
address: Carr. Chetumal-Puerto Juarez KM 282, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel La Casa de la Playa is located in the vicinity of a sandy/rocky beach. The town Playa del Carmen is around 8 km away (Tulum around 50 km, Cancún around 60 km). The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: Xplor (approx. 1 km away) and Xenses (approx. 1 km away). For mobility there is a taxi rank and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 55 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a free shuttle. There is also a shuttle to Parks Group Xcaret (for free). Amenities: The 3-storey beach hotel has 63 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, a lift, an air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop as well as a parking area (for free). For the meals, there are 4 restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. Room service and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 3 fresh water pools. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast a la carte. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness and aerobics. Bicycle rental. Spa area, sauna, whirlpool and massages available for a fee. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa, American Express and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Riu Lupita
address: Lote Hotelero 1, Manzana 20, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Hacienda Paradise By Xperience Hotels
address: Ave 10 Entre Calle 20 Y 22 Norte, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Just 2 blocks from the beach and near a variety of activities, this boutique hotel in Playa del Carmen has comfortable guest rooms and relaxing facilities, such as an outdoor pool. Hotel Hacienda Paradise features spacious guest rooms with attractive wood furnishings, plush linens and organic toiletries. Guests can also enjoy free wireless internet access and low-cost calls worldwide. The concierge desk at the Hacienda Paradise can arrange restaurant reservations, transportation and more. Visitors can walk to the vibrant Fifth Avenue, a pedestrian walkway with restaurants, bars and boutiques. Activities such as diving and archaeological tours are available near the hotel.

name: Illusion Boutique Hotel by Xperience Hotels - Adults Only
address: 8th St North, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located a 2 minutes’ walk from the beach and 2 minutes from the 5th Avenue. Illusion Boutique Hotel By BFH features a rooftop terrace with a plunge pool, massage room. Free WiFi access is available at all areas. The hotels offers air-conditioned rooms & ventilator, flat-screen cable TV and interior garden patio, street, roof top or sea views rooms. Guests can visit nearby attractions with help from the tour desk. llusion Boutique Hotel by By BFH is just a 15-minute drive from Xcaret Eco Theme Park. The bus station is only 10 minutes' way walking and Cancun International Airport is 40 minutes’ drive away.

name: Dreams Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa
address: Km 269.5 Carretera Chetumal, 77750 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Set on Quintana Beach and featuring a spa and outdoor pool, Dreams Aventuras Riviera Maya Resort has luxurious rooms overlooking its gardens, or the sea. It has 6 restaurants and a diving centre. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Puerto Aventuras Resort & Spa come with a balcony. Each has subtle, Mexican-style décor with tiled floors. All feature a flat-screen TV and minibar. A range of cuisine including Italian, Mexican and grilled seafood, is on offer in the Aventuras’ restaurants. There is also an international buffet and a beach bar. Guests can relax on the charming terrace, which features thatched palapa shelters. The on-site spa has a range of hot tubs, plunge pools and steam baths. Treatments on offer include reflexology, aromatherapy and wraps. The resort is a 20-minute drive from the Mayan ruins at Tulum. The popular resort of Playa del Carmen is less than 20 km away. Family friendly hotel, please see fine print for additional information.

name: Wyndham Garden Playa del Carmen
address: Lote 5 Manzana 29, Fraccionami, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham Playa del Carmen hotel. Hotel is designed with both contemporary style and traditional Chinese architectural influence. An extensive array of restaurants and lounges, exclusive meeting spaces covering 1,785sqm, indoor swimming pool, fitness center, concierge service with in-depth knowledge and business center operated around the clock, the Hotel caters to the most discerning travelers whether on business or for leisure.Wyndham

name: The Reef Playacar Beach Resort
address: Ave. Xaman-Ha, Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: 概述 4 星級住宿 一應俱全的度假村 度蜜月 理想的旅行度假住宿地點 Ideal romantic destination for couples! Breath taking views and exceptional service! 位置 地處美麗的 Playa del Carmen,位置絕佳. 當地名勝 Cozumel Ferry - 1 哩. Downtown Playa del Carmen - 1 miles. Xcaret (ecological park) - 3 miles. 休閒娛樂 戶外游泳池 水上運動 設備齊全的健身中心 鄰近優美的高爾夫球場 全套放鬆身心的水療服務 Massage services. Shopping 兒童 提供兒童俱樂部 兒童游泳池 餐廳與休息室 Chula Vista 於飯店內提供國際美食. BotticelliBotticelli 於飯店內提供義式美食. Terraza Grill serving gourmet dishes on property 一應俱全的酒吧/休息室 服務 托兒服務，僅象徵性收費 代客乾洗和洗衣服務 禮賓服務 服務周全的沙龍/水療 有出租汽車服务 會議設施 提供婚禮場地 住宿 202 間客房. Carribean style roomsWebBeds

name: Soho Playa Hotel
address: Calle 24 Esq. Av. 10 Col. Centro, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: The stylish SOHO PLAYA is located 400 metres from Mamitas Beach and 900 metres from Playa del Carmen Main Square, on the Riviera Maya. It offers a swimming pool and sun terrace, yoga classes and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms have urban-style décor and offer a desk, safe, fridge and flat-screen cable TV. The balconies overlook the city, and the private bathrooms include shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. This property offers special prices on passes to the famous Mamitas Beach Club and also to Kool Beach and Martina. It is 10 minutes’ walk from the ADO Bus Station and from the ferry to Cozumel Island. The Playacar Mayan Ruins are 3 km away and Cancun International Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Hacienda Maria Bonita
address: 10 Avenida Norte No. 215, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: In the centre of Playa del Carmen, just two block away from the beach, this hotel offers air-conditioned rooms decorated with a Mexican style. Also available is an on-site restaurant. The Hacienda Maria Bonita is located minutes from the popular Fifth Avenue. This location allows guests to easily discover shopping centres, restaurants and a vibrant nightlife. A large variety of water sports are also nearby. Guests at the Maria Bonita can enjoy a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool after a long day. The hotel's on-site tour desk can also help guests plan the next day's activities, tours and adventures.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Riviera Maya
address: Km 72, Carretera Cancun-Chetumal, 77701 Puerto Aventuras, Quintana Roo
description: Bordered by a private white sand beach and lush tropical landscapes, this decadent luxury resort pulls out all the stops for an unreal holiday for families and couples alike. The resort is situated near Playa del Carmen on the Mayan Riviera, less than 50 kilometres from the pre-Colombian Mayan ruins of Tulum. Visitors will have many opportunities to explore the area with excursions to Tulum and Chichen-Itza archaeological sites, and can swim with dolphins or even tour the Hard Rock sister hotel in Cancun. Each room offers generous proportions, a hydro spa bathtub, private balcony, and a range of state-of-the-art amenities, all decorated with vibrant colours and textures. Guests will delight in the private beach, children's pool and family pool, and the resort also offers a sophisticated and opulent adults-only hotel with four pools, nine imaginative restaurants and six lavish bars exclusively for adults. generalViajes Exito Hotels

name: Eurostars Hacienda Vista Real
address: Paseo Chichen Itza Retorno 3 Playacar, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Eurostars Hacienda Vista Real is an elegant property located in Playa del Carmen. The facility offers tropical gardens, lakes and a golf course within the Playacar gated community. The passengers ferry to Cozumel is located 12 minutes' drive away. The accommodation resembles an old Mexican hacienda boasting a typical Yucatan style. Guests will enjoy of an outdoor pool, and of a restaurant set by the pool area which specializes in typical Mexican dishes like fajitas, guacamole and chilaquiles. There is also a spa-treatment facility that guests can enjoy. Guests will be able to explore the popular touristic spots located near Eurostars Hacienda Vista real, like Xcaret Eco-Theme Park located 15 minutes' drive away, or stroll around vibrant 5th Avenue, which offers shopping malls, restaurants, bars and local art crafts shops. Cancun can be reached in a 45-minute drive.

name: Hotelito del Mar Playa del Carmen
address: 20 Avenida Norte con Calle 42, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Hotelito del Mar Playa del Carmen is located 1 km from the beach and 400 m from 5th Avenue. All apartments have a living room, kitchen, bedroom and bathroom with free toiletries. It offers a rooftop pool, free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms at Hotelito del Mar Playa del Carmen come with a flat-screen cable TV, fridge, electric oven and air conditioning. Other services are offered, such as a tour desk, luggage storage and boarding passes can be printed for free. There is public outdoor parking near the hotel.

name: Casa Kaoba Hotel & Suites
address: Carretera Federal Playa Tulum, Mza 329, Lote 9, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Playa del Carmen, 2.4 km from Playacar Beach, Casa Kaoba Hotel & Suites offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. The property is around 7.1 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal, 7.2 km from ADO International Bus Station and 10 km from Church of Guadalupe. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony. All guest rooms feature a safety deposit box. Guests at Casa Kaoba Hotel & Suites can enjoy a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub. Xel Ha is 42 km from Casa Kaoba Hotel & Suites, while Cenote Dos Ojos is 48 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Km. 298.8 Carretera #307, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: "Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique has 4 Diamond Award Resort, is set in tropical gardens in the Riviera Maya. It offers attractive Suites, a spa, 3 outdoor pools, golf course nearby. Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique suites have a terrace or garden, some with private pool, and include views of the Caribbean Sea, cenotes or lagoons. All have a plasma TV, CD and DVD player and a rain shower. The hotel offers a wide variety of food options. There are 3 restaurants and a tapas bar, as well as a lounge bar, cafeteria and poolside snack bar. Also room service is available with extra charge. The resort has a gym, while the spa provides beauty therapies. Other activities include yoga, pilates and watsu. There is also a boutique and a beauty salon. Cancun International Airport is 35 minutes’ drive from the Blue Diamond Luxury Boutique."

name: Lote4 - Lgbtq Studios
address: 171 Circuito 26, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Set 200 metres from the centre of Playa del Carmen, less than 1 km from Playa del Carmen Beach, LOTE4 - LGBTQ Studios offers air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries, while the kitchen has a fridge, an oven and a stovetop. The aparthotel provides a barbecue. Popular points of interest near LOTE4 - LGBTQ Studios include Playacar Beach, ADO International Bus Station and Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from the accommodation.

name: Paseo del Sol Condohotel by Bric
address: Avenida Xaman-Ha Mz. 12 LT.4 y 5, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: This luxury apartment complex is situated in a private gated community in the heart of Playa del Carmen, Mexico. This property provides exceptional accommodation in an unforgettable location. Guests can enjoy a variety of water activities as well as top-rated golfing at the nearby golf course. The city centre, filled with shops, restaurants and entertainment is also nearby. Every guest can feel at home when at the Paseo del Sol Condominios. Each private apartment is uniquely decorated and furnished with a fully-equipped kitchen. Guests can also enjoy a variety of facilities, including a barbecue area and a swimming pool.

name: Hotel Castillo Del Mar
address: Calle 26 Norte Esquina 5ta Avenida, 77710 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Well located in Playa del Carmen, Hotel Castillo Del Mar - 5 Th Ave features 5-star accommodation close to Playa del Carmen Beach and Playacar Beach. The property is located 1.2 km from ADO International Bus Station, 1.5 km from Playa del Carmen Maritime Terminal and 2.3 km from Church of Guadalupe. The hotel provides a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Xel Ha is 48 km from the hotel, while Kantenah Bay is 34 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 35 km from Hotel Castillo Del Mar - 5 Th Ave.

name: Torre 42 Playa del Carmen by Lockey
address: Calle 42 Norte Entre Calle 10 y Calle 15, 77720 Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Playa del Carmen, less than 1 km from Playa del Carmen Beach and 900 metres from the centre, Torre 42 Playa del Carmen by Lockey provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a rooftop pool. Featuring a kitchenette with a microwave and a toaster, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There is a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. The aparthotel offers a terrace. Playacar Beach is 2.3 km from Torre 42 Playa del Carmen by Lockey, while ADO International Bus Station is 2.3 km away. The nearest airport is Cozumel International Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: Barceló Maya Beach
address: Carr Chetumal Puerto Juarez Km 266.3, 77750 Xpu Há, Quintana Roo
description: No description found

name: Riu Santa Fe Hotel
address: Camino Viejo a San Jose, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Pueblo Bonito Los Cabos
address: Playa El Medano Apdo. Postal 460, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, this resort is situated on El Mendano Beach. It features on-site dining and guest suites offer a private balcony or terrace with view. The suites at Pueblo Bonito Los Cabos include fully equipped kitchenettes and panoramic views of Land’s End. Each spacious suite provides a private safe and the kitchenettes contain a hob. Cilantro’s restaurant, located at Blanco Pueblo Bonito Los Cabos, serves fresh seafood and international cuisine. Las Palomas offers Mexican cuisine. Pueblo Bonito Los Cabos Blanco is 6 blocks from downtown Cabo San Lucas. Guests have access to the facilities located at the partner resorts with free shuttle services available. Golfing is nearby.

name: Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos
address: Corredor Turístico Sjc-Csl, KM. 10 Lote D, Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the beauty and charm of Hacienda del Mar Los Cabos Resort, a stunning architectural masterpiece with a classic Mexican Hacienda flair. Elegant guest villas with balconies are scattered across lush, tropical gardens overlooking a private beach on the Emerald Sea of Cortez. Enjoy a seamless blend of traditional Mexican charm and contemporary style with exceptional service unlike anywhere else. Situated in the prestigious Cabo del Sol development, the resort features 270 guest rooms and suites, the restorative Cactus SPA™, a fitness center with a steam room and sauna, a variety of restaurants to choose from, evening entertainment, and sparkling pools that create an atmosphere of pure indulgence. For timeless celebrations, our planners can assist in an unforgettable beach wedding or ballroom gathering, curated in every way.Marriott

name: 1 Homes Preview Cabo
address: Paseo de La Marina 4732, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, a few steps from Medano Beach, 1 Homes Preview Cabo provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation features a kids' club, room service and currency exchange for guests. Selected rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. The hotel offers a barbecue. You can play billiards at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for snorkelling. There is an on-site bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Spanish. Marina Cabo San Lucas is 1.2 km from 1 Homes Preview Cabo, while El Arco is 3.8 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal
address: Camino Del Mar 1, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Waldorf Astoria Los Cabos Pedregal, where desert beauty meets the deep blue sea. Boasting a cliffside location along 24 acres of dramatic mountains and pristine beaches, enter paradise through the private Dos Mares tunnel and begin your exclusive experience in unprecedented luxury. Every resort guest room is spacious and refined, stocked with the soothing amenities our guests expect, and includes a private plunge pool to calm and center you. Opt for a suite to enjoy butler service. Other luxuries for your stay: - Award-winning Forbes five-star signature spa offering 10 private treatment rooms - 3 pools, including infinity pool overlooking the Pacific, saltwater pool, and kids pool - Culinary offerings including signature restaurant Don Manuel's and cliffside El Farallon - Curated, luxury experience highlighting the Baja Peninsula's land, wildlife, and people - Traditional indoor and unique outdoor oceanfront event space Our Waldorf Astoria resort is close to Los Cabos International Airport, and shuttle service is provided.Hilton

name: Riu Palace Baja California
address: Camino Viejo a San José, Km 3.5, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, this beachfront property is next to a golf course and within 1 mi (2 km) of Islands and Protected Areas of the Gulf of California, Medano Beach, and San Lucas Bay. Marina Cabo San Lucas and Cabo Dolphins are also within 3 mi (5 km).Expedia

name: Esperanza, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on the coast of the Pacific Ocean, this luxury resort is 19 km from downtown Los Cabos. It features a beachfront infinity pool, spa boutique, and free yoga sessions. Each spacious cabana-style room at the Cabo San Lucas Esperanza Resort is furnished with high ceilings and a large, private terrace. Guests can watch the flat-screen TV, use the free Wi-Fi, or charge their iPod with the iPod docking station. This resort boasts a private beach with concierge services. There is a large state-of-the-art gym and an on-site art gallery. Cocina del Mar, part of the resort, is carved into the cliffs overlooking the ocean and serves Baja-inspired cuisine. La Terraza Americana is open for lunch and offers American dishes in a casual outdoor atmosphere. The infinity pool has a swim-up bar. Cabo San Lucas International Airport is 14.2 km from Esperanza Resort Cabo San Lucas. Downtown San José del Cabo is a 25-minute drive from the property.

name: Villa La Estancia Beach Resort & Spa
address: Camino Viejo A San Jose Km 0.5, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This Baja California resort is within a 10-minute drive of Cabo San Lucas, which features shopping and dining. The resort offers a spa services and villas with a private balcony. Villa la Estanica Cabo San Lucas features villas that include satellite TV and a seating area on the spacious balcony. Some villas have a fully equipped kitchen and dining area. Guests at the Villa la Estancia can relax in the hot tub or swim in the outdoor pool. La Casona restaurant is located next to the pool and serves drinks. The Cabo San Lucas Villa guests can shop for groceries and other necessities on-site in the store. The resort also offers a billiards table.

name: Hacienda Beach Club & Residences
address: El Medano Ejidal, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in a private, gated community in the centre of Cabo San Lucas, this resort features an outdoor swimming pool, spa and concierge service. There is free on-site parking and free Wi-Fi is available throughout. All air-conditioned villas feature an elegant décor with natural stone floors, granite countertops and ceramic tiles. All bedrooms include a flat-screen TV and en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom includes a spa bath and walk-in shower. Each villa has a furnished balcony with sea views and is equipped with a dishwasher, washing machine, dryer and wine storage cabinet. The spacious living room is equipped with a recessed sound system and satellite TV. Guests can enjoy local and international meals and drinks at Hacienda Cocina y Cantina restaurant. There is also a poolside bar. Hacienda Beach offers a concierge service, 24-hour security and a tour desk. A shuttle service is also available at an additional cost.

name: The Bungalows Hotel
address: Camino Charros, Lienzo Charro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Only 3 minutes’ drive from Cabo San Lucas Marina, The Bungalows Hotel has gardens, an outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi connection throughout to offer to its guests. The rustic-style suites have equipped kitchenettes with fridge and microwave, French coffee makers and DVD players. Ironing appliances and safety boxes are also available. The bathrooms come with a shower and feature a hairdryer and free toiletries. The Bungalows offer an included gourmet breakfast on-site, plus guests will be able to find varied options of restaurants and bars within 1 km from the property. Medano Beach is 5 minutes’ drive away, and Cabo San Lucas downtown can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Los Cabos International Airport is 40 minutes’ drive away.

name: Cabo La Estancia
address: Km 0.5, Camino Viejo a San José, El Medano Ejidal, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, 1.6 km from Medano Beach, Cabo La Estancia provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has sea views, and guests can enjoy access to a bar and to a tennis court. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Cabo La Estancia each room comes with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a barbecue. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Cabo La Estancia. The property has an on-site hot tub, hairdresser's and business centre. Marina Cabo San Lucas is 1.9 km from the hotel, while El Arco is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 41 km from Cabo La Estancia.

name: Montage Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 12.5 Int, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 2.6 km from Medano Beach, Montage Los Cabos features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The accommodation offers a range of water sports facilities and a private beach area, as well as a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Certain rooms have a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mexican cuisine. Dairy-free, kosher and vegan options can also be requested. Montage Los Cabos offers a hot tub. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for hiking and snorkelling. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Marina Cabo San Lucas is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from Montage Los Cabos.

name: El Encanto Resort at Hacienda Encantada
address: Carr Transpeninsular KM 7.3 Suite A3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Dreams Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Transpenisular 18.5 Cls-Sjc, 23400 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located 2.6-miles from Chileno Beach, this Los Cabos resort features a full-service spa. Three sparkling pools and yoga on the beach are offered along with ocean views from every suite. This all-suite Dream Los Cabos Suites Golf Resort & Spa features suites with a private terrace overlooking the ocean. Each suite includes a stocked minibar and iPod docking station. The marble bathrooms boast separate bathtubs and showers with slippers and bathrobes provided. On-site dining includes steaks, seafood, Pan Asian and more. Guests at Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort can also choose from a la carte items and buffets. Room service is available as well. Dream Los Cabos Suites Resort & Spa offers tennis clinics, cooking classes and cocktail lessons. A seasonal turtle release event allows guests to participate in helping the Caray Green Sea Turtles.

name: City Express Plus by Marriott Cabo San Lucas
address: Lote 10, Fracción Del Predio El Tezal, 23454 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: City Express Plus by Marriott Cabo San Lucas is located just 1.8 miles from the Cabo San Lucas Marina, as well as from the most famous swimmable beach of the destination called "El Medano" where you will also find the famous "Land's End Arch". We are also located just forty minutes away from the San Jose del Cabo International Airport (SJD). Cabo San Lucas is a true paradise, where the desert and the sea come together, when you visit Los Cabos, you will be able to enjoy endless natural attractions such as the famous Land's End Arch, a rock formation that crowns the tip of the Baja California peninsula, when the Sea of Cortes meets the Pacific Ocean. In the comfort of our hotel, our staff will provide you with more information regarding tours and the best attractions you will find in the destination. Thirty minutes north of City Express Plus by Marriott Cabo San Lucas, is San Jos del Cabo, a colonial city characterized by its artistic touch, art galleries and a wonderful culinary offer.Marriott

name: Hotel Santa Fe Los Cabos by Villa Group
address: Av. Ignacio Zaragoza Esq. Obregon, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel Santa Fe Cabo San Lucas is set in the centre of Cabo and 2 km from the beach. It offers bright studios and an on-site supermarket. All accommodation at Hotel Santa Fe Cabo San Lucas offers views of the pool. There is free Wi-Fi, a TV, and a kitchenette with a microwave, fridge and an electric hob. Guests can enjoy a variety of dishes at Deli Santa Fe. The centre of Cabo is within 5 minutes’ walk of the Santa Fe, while the marina is 1 km away. Los Cabos International Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Live Aqua Private Residences Los Cabos
address: Carr. Transpeninsular Km 10.3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Discover a luxurious paradise nestled within the exclusive oceanfront community of Cabo del Sol. Overlooking the marvelous deep blue waters of the Sea of Corts, the fifth fairway of The Ocean Golf Course designed by Jack Nicklaus and the magnificent beauty of the Baja California Desert, these 35 stunning vacation residences are custom designed with high-end interior and exterior finishes to offer an experience that will likely instill a yearning to return year after year. Live Aqua Private Residence Los Cabos unveiled its multimillion-dollar concept in Fall 2017 to overindulge the senses. Fine dining, a relaxing pool atmosphere, premier beach access, exceptional personalized service and world-class golf just 5 minutes away will surely become the new standard for your family getaways.Please be advised that from now on, an official Sanitation tax of 36.31 MXN per night will be charged in our hotels located in Los Cabos, Baja California Sur.iHotelier/iStay

name: Corazón Cabo, a Noble House Resort
address: Callejon Pescador South N, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This Cabo San Lucas hotel is located along Cabo Bay on Medano Beach. The hotel offers a full-service spa, on-site dining options and guest suites with ocean views, subject to availability. Corazón Cabo, a Noble House Resort features 2 outdoor pools, including one that is for adults only. A modern fitness centre free of charge is also available on-site. The property features a state of the art wireless connection system that allows to have high-speed WiFi and unlimited services like messages, phone calls and a virtual phone number connection. Guest rooms at the Cabo Villas Beach are equipped with flat-screen TVs and coffee makers. Microwaves and mini-refrigerators are also included. Guests can dine at the Baja Brewing Rooftop Restaurant, Aleta Seafood Bar & Grillt or at the Beach Club.

name: One&Only Palmilla
address: Km 7.5 Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: This oceanfront hotel features spa treatments in 13 private villas. A 27-hole golf course and rooms with views of the Pacific Ocean or the Sea of Cortez are available. Guest rooms and suites at the One&Only Palmilla boast Mexican designs. Each includes a patio or a balcony. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV and iPod docking station. This hotel ranked among the top 100 Hotels & Resorts in the World. Dining options at Palmilla One&Only include ‘Mexiterranean’ and Euro Asian cuisines along with fresh sushi. Tequila tastings are also available at Agua and the resort features over 1,500 international wines. Guests can relax in the 2 outdoor pools or play a game of tennis. One&Only Palmilla in San Jose Del Cabo offers private beach access and a state-of-the-art gym. Scuba diving, deep-sea fishing and shopping are minutes from the One&Only Palmilla. Cabo San Lucas is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hilton Grand Vacations Club La Pacifica Los Cabos
address: Mexico 1 Tourist Corridor, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: We are on the shore of Los Cabos between the towns of San Jose del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas. Cabo Real and El Dorado golf clubs are under 10 minutes away. Take a dip in our infinity pool or our Dolphin Terrace pool overlooking the Sea of Cortes. Indulge in massage, salon or beauty treatments at our spa.Hilton

name: Vidasoul
address: 1000 Camino Cabo Este, 23440 La Fortuna, Baja California Sur
description: Vidasoul is a luxurious, modern resort located along the beautiful shores of the Gulf of California in Boca de las Vinorama. It features a private beach area, pool and beach club area with poolside service and swim up bar. Each tastefully decorated room at this property comes with sea views, a premium mattress, free wi-fi a flat-screen TV and a small seating area. The bathrooms feature a rain-forest shower, while the deluxe rooms boast a bath tub. Gourmet international and national cuisine is served at Vidasoul’s restaurant, and guests can order food and drinks while relaxing at the beach. The resort offers a range of on-site activities, including water sports, mountain biking, horse riding and kayak rental. San Jose del Cabo, where guests will find shopping and nightlife, is a 1-hour drive away. Cabo Pulmo Reef is 30 km from the property, while Los Cabos International Airport can be reached within an 1 hour drive of Vidasoul.

name: Grand Velas Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Grand Velas Boutique Los Cabos is the third property of Velas Resorts on the prestigious Touristic Corridor of Los Cabos. A seventy-nine-suite adults-only luxury boutique hotel with exclusive facilities and amenities that takes the best of the Grand Velas brand and elevates it to a level never seen before.Enjoy casual and fine dining restaurants, indoor and outdoor event spaces, a wellness center, an infinity pool overlooking the Sea of Cortez, and a hyper-personalized service that will leave even the most experienced travelers speechless.iHotelier/iStay

name: Zadun-A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Welcome to Zadún, the first Ritz-Carlton Reserve in Mexico where an authentic and magical experience awaits you. Our resort in San José del Cabo offers an untouched sanctum where desert and ocean collide — in your very own luxurious haven. Allow yourself to be seduced by Puerto Los Cabos, its breathtaking coastline, and a rich culture that will enchant you at every breath. Discover and explore a town with a historical charm and submerged in Spanish colonial flare. A very modern design Mexico has to offer, coupled with the handcrafted work of local artisans, will lay a magical and compelling experience at your feet. With every step you take inside Zadún, you’ll be surrounded by a natural allure and elegance unlike anything you’ve ever seen. Give in to the intimacy of our San José del Cabo hotel hideaway that you can claim as your own, reserved just for you at the end of the Earth.Marriott

name: Viceroy Los Cabos
address: Paseo Malecón Sjc, Lote 8, Zona Hotelera, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Cabo Surf Hotel & Spa
address: Transpeninsular Highway km 28, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Only 10 minutes’ drive from central San Jose del Cabo, this hotel is located in one of the most popular surfing beaches of the region. It also has spa facilities, outdoor pool and hot tub. The accommodations at Cabo Surf Hotel feature light décor and wooden furniture, plus they include amenities like iPod dockings, flat-screen cable TVs and bathrobes. The bathroom offers luxury brand toiletries and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi connection is also available throughout. The 7 Seas Restaurant serves Mexican and Mediterranean dishes and operates from 07:00 until 22:00 hours. Within 2 km from Cabo Surf, guests will be able to find other food options, which include an Asian-style and salad restaurants. Popular activities that can be performed at Cabo Surf are diving, windsurfing and surfing. The front desk staff may also help the guests with popular sightseeing options. In Cabo San Lucas guests will find several golf courses and is 25 minutes’ drive from the property. Los Cabos International Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hyatt Ziva Los Cabos
address: Paseo Del Malecón L-5 D, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: General description: The hotel Hyatt Ziva Los Cabos is situated in the vicinity of a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun umbrellas for a fee as well as sun loungers free of charge available. The nearest town is San Jose del Cabo. The nearest shopping facilities are located approx. 550 m from the hotel, a supermarket can be reached after around 500 m. In the evening, you can go dancing in a nightclub in the hotel’s surroundings. The following attractions can be reached from the hotel: The Arch, Cabo Pulmo and Marina in Cabo San Lucas. For mobility during your holiday, there are a taxi rank, a bus stop (approx. 550 m away) and a car rental company. The airport (SJD) is approx. 12 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: Recently renovated in 2013, the 7-storey beach hotel has 591 rooms, and spread over one main building and 2 adjoining buildings. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), kiosk, various other shops, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 7 restaurants (air-conditioned) and a snack bar. In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. For guests with physical disabilities the accommodation provides a barrier-free access. Room cleaning, room service and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find 5 fresh water pools with a children´s pool. Here, there are sun loungers for free available. A bar at the pool offers guests refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Billiards (where applicable, for a fee), table tennis (where applicable, for a fee), fitness and aerobics. A golf course is located in the vicinity of the hotel. Spa area, sauna, whirlpool, steam bath and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Child supervision: mini club for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Gaming Room. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: American Express, Euro / MasterCard and Visa. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas - Baja Point
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 22.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Get away to The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas – Baja Point. Our oceanfront vacation ownership resort places you along the bustling resort corridor where you can immerse in the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. While here, plan to scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at nearby Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve or tee off at nearby golf courses. Take a day trip to the famous Los Cabos Arch and after your day of exploring, schedule a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomí or take a swim at our outdoor infinity pool. For our littlest visitors to Mexico, the Westin Kids Club sparks a true vacation adventure. Feel recharged after a brisk run or strength training session in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. Dine on-site at any of our six restaurants and bars, offering international cuisines and a sports bar. Enjoy relaxing in your spacious villa or guest room rental with complimentary Wi-Fi. Catch spectacular sunsets over Los Cabos at our scenic resort every day of your stay.Marriott

name: The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas
address: Carretera Transpenninsular Km 22.5, 23440 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the ultimate wellness retreat in Los Cabos at The Westin Los Cabos Resort Villas. Situated by the Pacific Ocean and the Sea of Cortez, our family-friendly vacation ownership resort places you steps from the picturesque beaches and seaside cliffs of Los Cabos, Mexico. Scuba dive amid underwater coral reefs at the Cabo Pulmo Marine Preserve and tee off on the rolling greens of nearby golf courses. After sightseeing at the famous Los Cabos Arch, return for a revitalizing treatment at our resort’s Spa Otomi. Our outdoor infinity pool, a 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, tennis courts and a Westin Kids Club activate your vacation in Mexico. Fuel up at our six on-site restaurants and bars that serve a variety of international cuisine or join friends for the big game and a craft brew at our sports bar. As the sun sets on Los Cabos, settle into your comfortable studio or spacious villa accommodations with complimentary Wi-Fi. Escape to our relaxing seaside resort.Marriott

name: Riu Palace Cabo San Lucas
address: Camino Viejo a San Jose Del Cabo Km 4.5, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This luxurious hotel complex is located in Cabo San Lucas. The complex is nestled amidst the southern side of the Baja Peninsula of Mexico. The complex is set in front of a sprawling, golden beach. The centre of Cabo San Lucas is just 4.5 km away. This is the perfect tropical retreat in which to relax, unwind, enjoy exciting activities, or experience the culture of Mexico. This hotel enjoys a sublime setting, combined with the stylish luxury of an upscale resort. The guest rooms are beautifully designed, featuring refreshing tones and luxurious fabrics, for the ultimate comfort. A number of excellent facilities and services are available at this complex, offering guests a truly enjoyable experience, rich in comfort and convenience.FarePortal

name: La Marina Inn
address: Calle Los Pescadores, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in San José del Cabo, 200 metres from La Playita, La Marina Inn offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and dry cleaning services. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel all rooms include air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. La Playita Beach is 2.5 km from La Marina Inn, while Puerto Los Cabos is 1.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Seven Crown Express & Suites by Kavia
address: Blvd Lazaro Cardenas esq. 16 de Sept., 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This hotel is within a 5-minute walk of Cabo San Lucas and one mile from Playa de Amor Beach. The hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Seven Crown Express & Suites by Kavia rooms are cozy and offer a private bathroom. The rooms are equipped with a work desk and cable TV. Guests at the Seven Crown Express & Suites by Kavia can swim in the outdoor pool or receive information on exploring the area from the tour desk. The Seven Crown is within a 5-minute walk of downtown Cabo San Lucas, which features shopping and dining.

name: Paradisus Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 19.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located in San Jose del Cabo (Cabo Real), Paradisus Los Cabos is situated just 4 km away from a golf club, 13 km from San Jose Del Cabo city center, and 31 km away from Los Cabos International Airport. Facilities and services include a 24-hour reception, air conditioning, babysitting services (extra charge), bar, ATM machine on-site, children's playground, concierge, conference/ banquet facilities, currency exchange, dry cleaning (extra charge), elevator, garden, gym, ironing facilities (extra charge), laundry facilities (extra charge), massage, outdoor pools, safe, restaurant, sauna, and spa facilities, and free Wi-Fi. Rooms feature air conditioning, balcony or terrace, bath and shower, hairdryer, towels, TV with cable/ satellite channels, coffee/ tea facilities, mini bar, safe, and telephone. Address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 19.5, 23400, San Jose Del Cabo, BCS, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort and Spa
address: Cabo Pacifica, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated on a 2.5-mile stretch of pristine Cabo San Lucas, Mexico beach, the upscale all-inclusive Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort & Spa beckons visitors with the promise of tranquil seclusion on the Pacific coast. Adults only Situated on the garden level of the resort, Deluxe Rooms feature sliding glass doors that open an exterior patio appointed with comfortable teak furnishings and direct access to the garden. Tranquil views of the extensive cactus garden complement the added convenience of direct garden, access just steps out the door. Deluxe rooms maintain the motif of luxury without indulgence featuring the finest natural materials and Zen-inspired amenities. Accents of onyx inlaid in the guestroom entry doors allow sunlight to enter and fill the room with warm, relaxing hues, and add drama and a glow to the stylish bathroom. A cedar armoire houses On Command video and television and high-speed Internet access is also available. The bedroom is furnished with one king bed or two queen feather top beds and a pillow menu to accommodate each guest. A modern yet elegant approach to design and architecture presents luxury without limitations for a memorable vacation of relaxation and self renewal. Nestled on a secluded beach is the Cabo San Lucas luxury all-inclusive resort hideaway of Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort & Spa. Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Resort & Spa, a tranquil retreat for adults, is an award-winning resort and spa destination that offers full-service amenities and facilities, including five restaurants, a wellness-inspired spa, oceanview accommodations, meetings and event space, and private beach privileges.WebBeds

name: Solaz, A Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos
address: Km 18 5 Carretera Transpeninsular Csl-sj, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Covet is our prime location on the beach at Solaz, a Luxury Collection Resort, Los Cabos. Enjoy easy access from our luxury hotel to the Baja peninsula, downtown San Jose del Cabo and Marina Cabo San Lucas. Our contemporary luxury hotel in San Jose, Los Cabos features rooms and suites with an ideal respite and exquisite designs, luxury beds, marble floors and custom furnishings. Our resort's custom floor plans blur the line between indoor and outdoor spaces. Many rooms boast private entrances with secluded, furnished patios, outdoor showers, private plunge pools and unobstructed views of the beach and Sea of Cortez. Pamper yourself in San Jose del Cabo at our hotel spa after you sample our resort's diverse dining options. Stay fit in our 24-hour fitness center with help from a personal trainer. Then relax in one of two heated infinity pools while the kids enjoy our two heated children's pools. A truly blissful experience awaits you at Solaz.Marriott

name: Hard Rock Hotel Los Cabos
address: Poligono 1. Fraccion D. Fraccionamiento Diamante, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 11 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas, Hard Rock Hotel Los Cabos features accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The resort has an outdoor swimming pool, sauna, evening entertainment and a kids' club. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes American, vegetarian and vegan options. The resort offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub and terrace. Guests can enjoy playing billiards, or take advantage of the business centre. El Arco is 12 km from Hard Rock Hotel Los Cabos, while Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International, 57 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Boutique Plaza Doradas
address: Mauricio Castro Chulavista, Baja California Sur, 23406 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in San José del Cabo and with San Jose Estuary reachable within 2.4 km, Hotel Boutique Plaza Doradas features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. The property is located 4 km from Puerto Los Cabos, 5.7 km from Club Campestre and 7.7 km from Palmilla Golf Club. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a private bathroom, a shower and free toiletries, and some units at Hotel Boutique Plaza Doradas have a safety deposit box. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help. El Dorado Golf is 10 km from the accommodation, while Querencia Golf Course is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 9 km from Hotel Boutique Plaza Doradas.

name: Hotel Posada Señor Mañana
address: Alvaro Obregon No. 1, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located just 50 metres from the San José del Cabo art district and the city’s Main Square, Hotel Posada Señor Mañana has a tropical garden with hammocks and a cafeteria that serves Mexican dishes. The comfortable rooms have fans and a private bathroom with shower. Hotel Posada Señor Mañana also offers BBQ facilities, laundry services, and has a library. Wi-fi access is available and the property features a shared lounge area with a TV and an equipped kitchen. Guests can rent bicycles, kayaks, surfboards and snorkels. Playa Bocona beach is 15 minutes’ walk from the property, and Los Cabos International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Le Blanc Spa Resort Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Km 18.4 Carretera Transpeninsular Lomas, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Los Cabos is beloved for being where the desert meets the sea. Le Blanc Spa Resort Los Cabos harnesses the breathtaking beauty of this tropical treasure while adding an air of luxurious transcendence to the experience. This stunning 373-room resort exudes elegance, escape, and intimacy. Savor an international palate of artfully prepared cuisine with 7 world-class restaurants, or toast the night in any of the 5 bars. Replenish your body in the state-of-the-art Awe Spa. Laze poolside sipping masterfully crafted cocktails. Do it all, or do nothing at all—stay in your room, watch a movie, enjoy top-shelf spirits, and order 24-hour room service. Luxury is all around you, and forever memories happen minute by minute at Le Blanc Spa Resort Los Cabos.FarePortal

name: Hyatt Place Los Cabos
address: Paseo Malecon San Jose No. 128, 23406 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a fitness centre, Hyatt Place Los Cabos is located just 300 metres from the beach. The air-conditioned rooms at this modern hotel feature an entertainment centre with a flat-screen TV. They also have a small seating area and a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. At Hyatt Place Los Cabos you will find a terrace and a bar, and wide range of restaurants can be found within a 5-minute drive. Other facilities offered include a tour desk, luggage storage and dry cleaning services. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Club Campestre San Jose Golf Course is located just 50 metres from the hotel, while guests can reach Los Cabos International Airport in a 20-minute drive.

name: Grand Velas Boutique Hotel
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17.3, Corredor Turístico, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in San José del Cabo, 100 metres from Boca del Tule Beach, Grand Velas Boutique Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the property also has a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms include air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at Grand Velas Boutique Hotel have a sea view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, American and vegetarian options. Cabo Real Golf Course is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while El Dorado Golf is 5.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 25 km from Grand Velas Boutique Hotel.

name: El Encanto Inn & Suites
address: Calle Morelos No 133, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in 2 separate buildings in San José del Cabo's charming Artistic District, El Encanto’s rooms feature Mexican hacienda style architecture. It also offers a spa. All rooms feature cable TV, as well as a bathroom. Some include a kitchenette and dining area. Some rooms overlook the outdoor pool or the garden with private chapel. Encanto’s spa facility with massage rooms offers relaxing body treatments. Guests can spend a lazy afternoon by the garden pool surrounded with sun loungers and umbrellas. Both hotel buildings are separated by a quiet street. Pacific beaches are just a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Scuba diving, fishing, golf and surfing are all popular activities on the surrounding coastline.

name: Hotel Palmas De Cortez
address: Calle 20 de Noviembre # 2, 23330 Los Barriles, Baja California Sur
description: Offering spa service, a gym, swimming pool, on-site windsurfing and tennis courts, Hotel Palmas de Cortez is located right on Los Barriles Beach. Buena Vista Beach is less than 4 km away. The accommodation offers contemporary décor, air conditioning, ceiling fan, telephone and TV. The private bathrooms feature shower and include free toiletries. This complex features a restaurant serving international food and Mexican-style cuisine. There are also a swim-up bar, a pool-side bar and a lounge bar on site. Guests at Hotel Palmas de Cortez can arrange activities as eco-tours, fishing, kayaking, paddle boards and ATV rentals. There is also a playground area, children’s pool and tennis court. Events facilities as conference rooms, meeting rooms, exhibit spaces and banquets facilities are also available as well shuttle services with an extra charge. This property is 500 metres from the ExotiKite Kiteboarding School. Santiago Zoo is 23 km away and Los Cabos International Airport is a 50-minute drive away.

name: Barcelo Gran Faro Los Cabos
address: Blvd. San Jose, Sección Hotelera 1 Zona Fonatur | | San Jose Del Cabo, B.C.S. México || México, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: The Barceló Gran Faro Los Cabos (5-star) hotel is a Premium-level resort complex located overlooking the impressive waters of the Gulf of California. It's a perfect hotel for enjoying tranquility, thanks to its exclusive location 1.6 miles from San José, a colonial town famous for its cultural atmosphere and restaurants. The hotel has 350 luxurious rooms and suites, all of which have a private balcony with views of the Sea of Cortez and are fully equipped with first class conveniences to guarantee a memorable stay.FarePortal

name: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 24.8, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Hampton Inn & Suites by Hilton Los Cabos is conveniently located between San Jose Del Cabo and Cabo San Lucas, offering easy access to all of the area attractions. This intimate hotel is a great choice for being close to scenic beaches, award-winning golf courses, fishing, surfing plus great shopping and nightlife. Located near the new tollway, our Los Cabos hotel also offers easy access to the airport. Settle into your spacious guest room or suite and enjoy free hot breakfast buffet daily from 6:00am to 10:00am. Each room includes a clean and fresh Hampton bed™, free WiFi and refrigerator. Many rooms feature kitchenettes and sofa sleepers, perfect for families. Pamper yourself in the bathroom with a Waterpik® showerhead and Purity Basics® bath products. Enjoy extra space and amenities in our deluxe rooms with great views and authentic décor. Our Los Cabos hotel is part of the Koral Center that features new ABC hospital, restaurants, shops and more all within one roof for your convenience. Inside the hotel visit our Wellness Center and Spa, unwind in the rooftop pool or whirlpool, and try some intricate cocktail creations in the rooftop Palapa Bar while admiring views of the ocean and mountains. Hampton by Hilton Las Cabos offers a pristine location for banquets and weddings with 1,500 sq. ft. of meeting space accommodating up to 60 guests. Our friendly staff looks forward to welcoming you with all of the world class service and hospitality.Hilton

name: Fairfield by Marriott Los Cabos
address: Avenida Lazaro Cardenas 2709, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located along Lazaro Cardenas, the pulse of Cabo San Lucas, Fairfield Inn Los Cabos is a charming retreat situated moments from destinations such as Medano Beach, Puerto Paraíso Entertainment Plaza and the Arch of Cabo San Lucas. Modern amenities and comfortable rooms offer an unrivaled stay at our Los Cabos hotel. Before spurring fun in the sun, get a good night's rest in our well-appointed hotel rooms. With free high-speed Wi-Fi, ergonomic workstations and plush bedding, you have everything you need to feel at home. In the morning, fuel up with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet featuring a variety of hearty favorites. Before turning into a beach bum, head to our fitness center and work up a sweat with cardio machines and free weights. Our outdoor pool is the perfect place to unwind while soaking up the bright Mexico sunshine. At Fairfield Inn Los Cabos, you're our #1 priority. Ask us about the Fairfield 100% Guarantee™, where we promise you'll be satisfied or we'll make it right.Marriott

name: Drift San Jose del Cabo
address: Hidalgo (Between Obregon and Comonfort), 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Drift San Jose del Cabo has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in San José del Cabo. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 2.1 km of Hotelera Beach. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from San Jose Estuary. Rooms come with air conditioning and a TV, and some rooms at the hotel have pool view. An American breakfast is available each morning at Drift San Jose del Cabo. You can play table tennis at the accommodation. Puerto Los Cabos is 3.2 km from Drift San Jose del Cabo, while Club Campestre is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: The Club at Solaz
address: Corredor Turístico Csl-Sjc Km. 18.5, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Magnificent beach front resort located on the Tourist Corridor between the golden of the Baja California desert and the turquoise waters of the Sea of Cortez. Designed by Sordo Madaleno Architects to create a sculpture integrated to the landscape with ocean views from all areas of the resort.A nature-inspired refuge that is meant to bring balance, harmony and freedom to those who step inside and combines Mexican contemporary style with modern sophistication and exclusivity, that provides luxury and comfort of modernity merging in perfect tune with nature.Quarry stone, granite, marble, wood, and textures harmonize to establish an intimate bond between the complex and its location.Landscaped by Jernimo Gabayet; the selection consists of a mixture of trees, bushes and flowers of endemic and exotic origin. Together paint a grandiose atmosphere full of life and color, providing the surroundings with the natural beauty that can only come from the earth and keep our guests in touch with the Baja California Surs unique wonders.Immaculate and refined art from the renowned Mexican artist Csar Lpez Negrete, whos challenge was to make our guests to be able to remember Solaz Los Cabos through its art collection that consists of 772 pieces displayed throughout the property and longing to return time after time.iHotelier/iStay

name: Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas
address: Calle Hacienda Eureka, 23570 La Ribera, Baja California Sur
description: Set within the thousand-acre private resort community of Costa Palmas along the secluded East Cape of Mexico’s Baja Sur, the Four Seasons Resort Los Cabos at Costa Palmas™ is a haven of exquisite beauty and serenity. From its two-mile stretch of pristine beach and swimmable waters, to its sublime location—just 45 minutes from Los Cabos International Airport, yet far from the crowded Cabo resorts—this idyllic retreat makes for an ideal tropical luxury getaway. The Resort offers many open-air public spaces including the lobby and nearly all dining venues; its low-lying architectural footprint precludes the need for shared elevators or hallways. Natural light permeates the guest rooms and suites, which are designed by Todd-Avery Lenahan of TAL Studio. All accommodations showcase striking views of the Sea of Cortez as well as spacious private terraces; first-floor guest rooms and suites also boast private plunge pools. Choose from several exceptional dining options: Estiatorio Milos, Chef Costas Spiliadis’s famed Mediterranean seafood restaurant featuring a market-style menu of impeccable seafood; Casa de Brasa, a Baja-inspired brasserie; El Puesto, serving sea-to-table ceviche, tiraditos, and crudo; Limón, an all fresco bar and grill; and Ginger’s, an all-day eclectic café. Indulge in the Resort’s array of refined on-site amenities, including Costa Palmas Golf Club, a Robert Trent Jones II eighteen-hole golf course, a leading-edge sports and fitness facility designed by world-renowned fitness expert Harley Pasternak, six refreshing swimming pools, and a blissful Oasis spa, and wellness center featuring ten free-standing treatment sanctuaries. Let the Resort’s Adventure Concierge help you unlock the East Cape—Mexico’s best-kept secret—by arranging any number of exhilarating land and sea activities: hiking to hidden waterfalls, swimming alongside the majestic whale shark, surfing in legendary waters, snorkeling in the nearby UNESCO World Heritage site of Cabo Pulmo, sport fishing in the Sea of Cortez, off-roading through desert dunes, sailing from the Resort’s marina, horseback riding amid vibrant natural beauty, and more.

name: Hotel Aeropuerto Los Cabos
address: Acceso al Aeropuerto M-14C L-05, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Hotel Aeropuerto Los Cabos offers easy access to diferent transportation services to get downtown or Cabo San Lucas, With 139 rooms, We invite you to enjoy our personalyzed service, Restaurant, Bar, Gym, Business Center, Pool and everything to make your stay very comfortable and relaxed. Located right in front of San Jose del Cabo International Airport, with a Free Shuttle Service.iHotelier/iStay

name: Siesta Suites Boutique Hotel
address: E. Zapata Downtown Cabo San Lucas, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 20 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and separate sitting areas, as well as phones with free local calls. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. This hotel also features concierge services, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and a picnic area. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Property Location A stay at Siesta Suites Hotel places you in the heart of Cabo San Lucas, within a 5-minute drive of Marina Cabo San Lucas and The Arch. This hotel is 1 mi (1.5 km) from Lover's Beach and 1 mi (1.5 km) from Land's End. Dining Enjoy a meal at Salvatores or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/café. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. name: Mar del Cabo By Velas Resorts
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 18, 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Fresh ocean breezes and the infinite azure tones of the Sea of Cortez welcome guests to Mar del Cabo. Unassuming and pleasing minimalist with touches of color and design, this boutique hotel is a place to enjoy the magical simplicity of sky, sea and soul. We invite visitors to enjoy the dramatic surroundings on a different level, with a soothing white canvas to calm the mind, and the perfect dose of culture and interest. Clean flavors, cold drinks, tranquil spaces nothing extra. Just you, in your element, surrounded by beauty.iHotelier/iStay

name: Suites Lomboy & Plaza
address: Av. Encino Mza. 45 Lt. 8 Esq. Jacarandas, 23436 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in San José del Cabo in the Baja California Sur region, SUITES LOMBOY & PLAZA offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. Some units also have a kitchen equipped with a fridge and a microwave. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the aparthotel. San Jose Estuary is 12 km from SUITES LOMBOY & PLAZA, while Puerto Los Cabos is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 1 km from the accommodation.

name: Park Royal Homestay Los Cabos
address: Retorno Playa Añuiti No. 27, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool a furnished terrace, Park Royal Homestay Los Cabos is located 700 metres from Gulf of California Beach and 3 km from Plaza Italia Square. The modern rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The bathroom is private and has a shower and free toiletries. Rooms also have garden views. The Park Royal Homestay Los Cabos has a restaurant with regional food and a bar with Mexican beverage. Room service is available. The guests can sunbathe on the furnished terrace and enjoy activities like cycling, diving, fishing and snorkelling. This Park Royal is 5 minutes’ drive from San Jose Main Square and 700 metres from Las Palmas Park. The Hotels Zone is 3 minutes' drive away and Los Cabos International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Las Ventanas al Paraiso, A Rosewood Resort
address: KM 19.5 Ctra. Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 71 guestrooms, featuring fireplaces and plasma televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Satellite programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature jetted bathtubs and designer toiletries. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Las Ventanas al Paraiso, A Rosewood Resort in San José del Cabo, you'll be on the beach, just a 1-minute walk from Baja California Peninsula and 6 minutes by foot from Cuadra San Francisco. This 5-star resort is 6.5 mi (10.5 km) from Santa Maria Beach and 11.6 mi (18.7 km) from Medano Beach. Dining Grab a bite at The Sea Grill, one of the resort's 5 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar.
