name: Hotel Posada Terranova
address: Degollado 13, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Just a 5-minute walk from central San Jose del Cabo, Hotel Posada Terranova offers air-conditioned rooms and studios with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV. Playa Hotelera Beach is 3 km away. Rooms at the Posada Terranova feature contemporary décor and dark wood furniture. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Studios also offer a dining area and kitchenette. The Posada Terranova’s bar-restaurant bar serves Mexican cuisine and fresh local seafood. Room service is available, and you can also find a range of restaurants in the surrounding streets. The hotel offers free parking and staff can help arrange activities such as snorkelling, kayaking, diving and fishing. The famous Costa Azul surfing spot is 6 km away, while Los Cabos International Airport is 13 km away.

name: Los Cabos Golf Resort, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
address: Via de Carlos Lote #601, 23406 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Los Cabos Golf Resort, Trademark Collection by Wyndham is a 76 room resort located inside of the Cabo San Lucas Country Club golf course. Enjoying a warm welcome. Los Cabos Golf Resort offers putting green on property, fishing and scuba diving activities. Guests will also enjoy an outdoor pool, fitness center, onsite restaurant and bar. Included in the stay guests will enjoy complimentary parking, rooms for up to 10 guests, ideal for family or groups vacations. All rooms include a minibar, kitchen, safety box, balcony, and free WiFi.Wyndham

name: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa Cabo San Lucas
address: Camino Viejo A San Jose Km 0.5, Col. Playa El Meda, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa, located on the Gulf of California, features suites with balconies and fully equipped kitchens. It offers two pools, a waterslide and three restaurants. Suites provide dining areas, minibars and seating areas with sofa beds. They also include satellite TV and safety deposit boxes. Wi-Fi is available. Villa del Palmar Beach Resort and Spa features a private beach area along with tennis, a gym and business center are available to guests. The on-site Las Tortugas Restaurant Cabo features musical shows and theatrical productions. The resort provides babysitting and car rentals and has a convenience store and tour desk. Villa del Palmar Beach Resort & Spa, located in Baja California Sur, Mexico, is within 3 miles of Cabo Sailing and Cabo San Lucas Country Club. It is 20 miles from Casa Dahlia Art Gallery.

name: Comfort Inn & Suites Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular km 4.1, 23454 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Comfort Inn & Suites Los Cabos has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a shared lounge and terrace in Cabo San Lucas. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.8 km from Cabo San Lucas Country Club. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Comfort Inn & Suites Los Cabos the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. There is an in-house bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Marina Cabo San Lucas is 4.2 km from Comfort Inn & Suites Los Cabos, while El Arco is 5.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 40 km from the hotel.

name: Los Milagros Hotel
address: Mariano Matamoros 3738 Centro, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Los Milagros Hotel is located in central Cabo, just 5 minutes’ walk from the marina. It has extensive terraces and gardens, one of which has an outdoor pool. The air-conditioned rooms at the Los Milagros feature terra cotta floors and colonial-style décor. Each one comes with cable TV, free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. There are many restaurants, bars and shops within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Cabo is a popular destination for whale watching and sport fishing. Los Cabos Airport is 45 minutes’ drive from Los Milagros Hotel. You can drive to San José del Cabo in around 30 minutes.

name: Mayan Monkey Hotel & Hostel Los Cabos
address: Los Cabos Blvd. Paseo de la Marina 869, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Well situated in the centre of Cabo San Lucas, Mayan Monkey Los Cabos offers air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features also an ATM. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain units at the hotel also have a sea view. At Mayan Monkey Los Cabos all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or American breakfast. At Mayan Monkey Los Cabos you will find a restaurant serving Mexican, Pizza and Texmex cuisine. Vegetarian and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at this 3-star hotel, and bike hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Solmar Beach, La Empacadora Beach and Medano Beach. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International, 43 km from Mayan Monkey Los Cabos, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tesoro Los Cabos
address: Blvd. Marina Lote 9 y 10, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The hotel offers a spacious outdoor swimming pool with 2 hot tubs and a pool bar, a full-service spa and on-site restaurant. This 4-star Cabo San Lucas hotel overlooks the marina. Guest rooms at the Hotel Tesoro Los Cabos Resort feature satellite TV and a minibar. Air conditioning and a safety deposit box are also included. Guests can enjoy the gym offering marina views and activities desk at the Hotel Tesoro Los Cabos Resort. Shuttle service to the airport can be arranged at the reception. Besides the breakfast buffet, Hotel Tesoro Los Cabos also offers a wide variety of menus and cuisine specialties, like Italian, Mexican, fusion, seafood, and snack. Cabo San Lucas International Airport is 9 km away. The main pool will be temporarily closed for maintenance and renovation starting on September18, 2023, we anticipate that the project will be completed by September 23, 2023.

name: The Paraiso Residences at Marina Cabo
address: 1501 Boulevard Lázaro Cárdenas Marina, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The Paraiso Residences at Marina Cabo is located in the heart of Cabo San Lucas, Mexico. The residences offer beautiful oceanfront living, with exceptional amenities, including a concierge and beautifully appointed rooms with spectacular views of the Marina. The residence offers 2-to-4-bedrooms and 2-to-3-bathrooms, as well as an expansive living room, full kitchen and dining area, ideal for relaxing on the weekends or entertaining friends and family.Each residence comes with the warm and inviting elegance, charm of a luxurious destination such as Cabo San Lucas. The refined and sophisticated lifestyle for a place to call home.iHotelier/iStay

name: Quivira Los Cabos Condos & Homes - Vacation Rentals
address: Quivira Los Cabos 1, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Just a short distance from scuba diving, this smoke-free villa lets you experience it all. Jump into your car and make short work of the 4-minute drive to Quivira Golf Club or the 6-minute drive to Puerto Paraiso Mall (and enjoy the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime). Spend a day at the nearby private beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink at the poolside bar of this villa, which also features a garden. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This vacation rental features a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, a microwave, and cookware. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Buena Vista Oceanfront & Hot Springs Resort
address: Carr. Federal #1 km 105, 23580 Buenavista, Baja California Sur
description: Nestled on Mexico's Baja Peninsula, facing the Sea of Cortez, this hotel in Buena Vista offers access to a variety of activities, relaxing guestrooms and enjoyable facilities. Hotel Buena Vista Beach Resort features Mediterranean-style guestrooms with private patios furnished with hammocks. Guests can go for a swim in the outdoor pool, then relax with a massage or pedicure. El Navegante restaurant at the Buena Vista Resort serves traditional Mexican cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Guests can order nachos while soaking up the sun beside the pool, or sip a refreshing drink from the pool's swim-up bar. After dinner, guests can relax with a drink in El Pescador Bar. Activities such as fishing, scuba diving and horseback riding are available just minutes from the Buena Vista Beach Hotel. Guests can also explore the 30 miles of beach, or play a game of tennis.

name: Casa del Mar Condos
address: Km 19.5 Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 180 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. LCD televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and coffee/tea makers, as well as phones with free local calls. Amenities Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, laundry facilities, and ATM/banking services. Property Location Located in San José del Cabo, Casa del Mar Condos is by the ocean, a 5-minute drive from San Jose del Cabo Art District and 7 minutes from Puerto Los Cabos. This beach condominium resort is 4.6 mi (7.4 km) from Costa Azul Beach and 6.6 mi (10.6 km) from Palmilla Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the condo resort's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. name: Hotel Sol De Cabo
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 23, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located in San José del Cabo, 1.2 km from Westin Beach, Gamma Los Cabos provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 1.6 km from Punta Bella Beach and around 1.5 km from El Dorado Golf. The accommodation features a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also offer a sea view. Guest rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at Gamma Los Cabos. Palmilla Golf Club is 4 km from the accommodation, while Cabo Real Golf Course is 5.1 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 17 km from Gamma Los Cabos.

name: Krystal Grand Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 29, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in San Jose Del Cabo. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, BEL AIR COLLECTION RESORT AND SPA LOS CABOS - ALL caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Mariamar Suites
address: Calle Marea Alta N.1 Col Costa Azul, 23406 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located among the Club Campestre San José and Querencia Golf Club in San José del Cabo, this property features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi access. Complimentary breakfast is included. The suite at MariaMar Suites has a balcony overlooking the Gulf of California, a dining area and cable TV. It also features a minibar, a coffee maker and a microwave oven. The bathroom has a shower and is private. Guests will receive free breakfast included. La Roca Beach, and Acapulquito Beach, both well known as ideal surfing sites, are 15 minutes’ walk from MariaMar Suites, and Costazul gazebo is only 10 minutes’ walk away. Costa Azul Beach is located right across from the hotel. Los Cabos International Airport is 9.6 km from the suites. San José del Cabo town centre is 5 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Santa Maria del Cabo
address: Paseo de Los Cabos 148, 23407 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located 500 metres from Las Mañanitas Beach, this modern hotel offers an outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms feature free Wi-Fi and balconies with views of San José Golf Course and the beach. All rooms at Hotel Santa Maria del Cabo have flat-screen cable TV and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. There is a kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The hotel has 24-hour reception and offers a laundry service and massage. You can hire a car and free parking is available.

name: Pueblo Bonito Pacifica Golf & Spa Resort
address: Previo Paraiso Escondido, Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This impressive spa hotel has its own private beach and is located on the Pacific side, 5 minutes’ drive from Cabo San Lucas. Boasting fantastic views of the Pacific Ocean, it offers an award-winning spa and avant-garde design. The adults-only Pueblo Bonito Pacífica Resort & Spa has 5 restaurants, including one serving Mediterranean food and a Japanese restaurant serving fresh sushi. There are also 5 bars, one of which features a fire pit. The resort offers Balinese beds on the beach which you can hire for a day. From December to April the hotel arranges whale watching trips. The air-conditioned rooms at the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica feature tiled floors and soft tones. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV, a kitchenette and a private terrace. Cabo San Lucas Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away, and the hotel offers a shuttle service on request. The pretty coastal town of San José del Cabo is 35 minutes’ drive from the Pueblo Bonito Pacífica.

name: Hilton Vacation Club Cabo Azul Los Cabos
address: Paseo Malecon, Lote 11 Fonatur, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: With a stay at Cabo Azul Resort by Diamond Resorts in San Jose del Cabo (Zona Hotelera), you'll be a 3-minute drive from San Jose del Cabo Art District and 6 minutes from Costa Azul Beach. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and a meeting room. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Zoetry Casa del Mar Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM 19.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience our most luxurious suite—measuring 2,908 square feet and showcasing a large sea-view terrace or balcony with infinity-edge plunge pool, a full kitchen with top-rated appliances, expansive living spaces with a sofa bed and entertainment center, two full bathrooms with rain showers and walk-in closets, a dining area with seating for eight, a king bedroom, plus a bedroom with two queen beds.VRBO

name: Hilton Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Iconic yet innovative, classic yet contemporary, Hilton Los Cabos embodies the evolution of the sophisticated resort experience in Cabo San Lucas. Steps away from the Sea of Cortez in the exclusive Los Cabos corridor, along one of the only swimmable beaches in the region, Hilton Los Cabos offers lush, rich surroundings, anticipatory service, and the perfect blend of relaxation and rejuvenation. With expansive views from oceanfront rooms and suites, some featuring private plunge pools, this is a place for guests to discover authentic Mexico, where elevated dining and wellness options are all flavored with local cultural experiences and an international flair. Here, nothing is scripted: From family fun at the Enclave Beach Club to romantic respites in a seaside cabana, energetic events in our gathering spaces to the prime guestrooms and upgraded amenities of AltaMar, you are free to craft your own signature story.Hilton

name: The Cape, a Thompson Hotel
address: Carretera Tranpeninsular Km 5, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Location The Cape - A Thompson Hotel is a beachfront retreat located in Cabo San Lucas offering views over the El Arco and the Bahia San Lucas horizon. Todos Santos is about an hour drive away and Cabo San Lucas International Airport is approximately 12 km from the property. Rooms Accommodations are decorated with bespoke mid-century Latin American furnishings and features a private balcony with hanging daybed overlooking the ocean and El Arco. Each room is equipped with a craft cocktail bar and a gourmet mini bar, complimentary WiFi access, in-room safe and a state-of-the-art rain shower and luxurious cotton kimono robes. Some of the rooms have private plunge pools and butler service. Property Features The restaurant and bars on site offers al fresco and indoor dining featuring local and international dishes. For recreation, the hotel features an outdoor infinity pool and bar, salt water pool, hot tub, fitness gym and a spa with hot and cold plunge pools, steam room, sauna and couples treatment room with rain showers and a private pool. Other facilities and services include meeting rooms, free WiFi access and transportation services available upon request through the concierge desk.WebBeds

name: Garza Blanca Resort & Spa Los Cabos
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 17.5, 23405 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: For the ultimate luxury escape, Garza Blanca Resort & Spa Los Cabos is a family-friendly beach resort with a contemporary design inspired by the natural landscape. All of our suites feature elegant décor and unsurpassed comfort. The resort offers several chic spaces to unwind in including a world-class Spa, gourmet restaurants, and distinct pools all enhanced by highly attentive service and personalized pampering.VRBO

name: City Express Suites by Marriott Cabo San Lucas
address: Lote 10, Fracción Del Predio El Tezal, 23454 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: City Express Suites by Marriott Cabo San Lucas is located just 1.8 miles from the Cabo San Lucas Marina, as well as from the most famous swimmable beach of the destination called El Medano where you will also find the famous Land's End Arch. We are also located just forty minutes away from the San Jose del Cabo International Airport, SJD. Cabo San Lucas is a true paradise, where the desert and the sea come together, when you visit Los Cabos, you will be able to enjoy endless natural attractions such as the famous Land's End Arch, a rock formation that crowns the tip of the Baja California Peninsula, when the Sea of Cortes meets the Pacific Ocean. In the comfort of our hotel, our staff will provide you with more information regarding tours and the best attractions you will find in the destination. Thirty minutes north of City Express Suites by Marriott Cabo San Lucas, is San Jose del Cabo, a colonial city characterized by its artistic touch, art galleries and a wonderful culinary offer.Marriott

name: Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa
address: Predio Paraiso Escondido, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa - Luxury A is conveniently located in the popular Marina area. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa - Luxury A. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature fan, air conditioning, mini bar, balcony/terrace, telephone. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make Pueblo Bonito Sunset Beach Resort & Spa - Luxury A the perfect choice for your stay in Cabo San Lucas.Agoda

name: Breathless Cabo San Lucas Adults Only
address: Paseo de la Marina 4570, Col. Médano, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Breathless Cabos San Lucas Resort & Spa, situated on Medano beach- the safest swimmable beach in Cabo San Lucas and within close proximity of the infamous Cabo San Lucas nightlife offers the perfect mix of luxury and lively entertainment. All 169 ultra-contemporary suites offer private and scenic terraces with spectacular ocean and marina views. Perfect for singles, couples or friends, Breathless Cabo San Lucas, the ultra-chic resort has a unique social vibe that inspires mixing, mingling and an all-around good time for all guests. Guests will relish in all the benefits of the Unlimited-Luxury(R) experience including unlimited premium spirits, daily refreshed mini bar, wait service at our two pristine pools and the beach, 24-hour room service, daily and nightly entertainment, 4 dining venues matched by carefully selected wines and a variety of premium spirits served at 4 bars and lounges, all without limit, required reservations or expected gratuities. Expect around-the-clock parties and entertainment at Breathless Cabo San Lucas with unmatched daily and nightly entertainment. Live big and party all day and night with a jam packed weekly schedule of parties and entertainment and monthly themed special events including after-hours dance parties, sensuality shows, pool parties, beach parties and more. Breathe deep at the relaxing spa by Pevonia(R) where you can unwind and rejuvenate for your next adventure. Treat yourself to a Breathless Cabo San Lucas experience where the party never ends and everything you need is at your fingertips.WebBeds

name: Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 15, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, a few steps from El Chileno Beach, Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service for guests. Some rooms also boast a kitchen with a minibar. The hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and terrace. You can play table tennis at Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection. Boca del Tule Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Cabo Real Golf Course is 6.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 28 km from Chileno Bay Resort & Residences, Auberge Resorts Collection.

name: Marina Fiesta Resort & Spa
address: La Marina Lotes 37 & 38 Col. Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: This Cabo San Lucas resort offers a central downtown, waterfront location and is walking distance to Medano Beach. It features a full-service spa, outdoor pool and spacious suites with private balcony. Each suite at Marina Fiesta Resort & SPA Dine Out overlooks the pool or marina and offers traditional Mexican décor and architecture. A kitchenette with stove top and refrigerator and a seating area are included. Marina Fiesta Resort & SPA Dine Out offers a variety of European treatments as well as the fully equipped Sky Gym. Guests have access to the business centre and the concierge desk. The complex includes fine dining at the waterfront Baja Lobster Co and authentic Italian and international cuisine, sushi delights and Mexican food. There is also a swim-up bar and poolside restaurant. Marina Fiesta Resort & SPA Dine Out is located next to Puerto Paraiso and Luxury Avenue, a designer boutique mall. El Medano Beach is a 10-minutes' walk from the hotel.

name: Playa Grande Resort & Grand Spa
address: 1 Playa Solmar, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Beautiful 1 suite bedroom and 2 full bathroom and Kitchen, next to the pool and the beach, with a lot of amenities and adventures in a spectacular dream place to fall in love with. Let the Mexican ambient and culture fill you with nice memories and beautiful experiences. Also there are many different restaurants to pick within the property and other amenities as mini golf, gym, spas, etc. Thank You.VRBO

name: ME Cabo
address: Playa El Medano, 5, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: With its privileged location on the Medano Beach of Cabo San Lucas, ME Cabo features 5-star amenities in Los Cabos, one of Mexico’s fanciest destinations. Guest accommodations at ME Cabo are furnished with all the latest technologies. Private balconies along with rain showerhead and Aveda bath amenities are also provided. ME Cabo is a fashion and social hub for discerning local and international clientele, pulsating with a distinctive vibe that hints of celebrated hotspots. ME by Meliá blends design, art, music and service in a truly unconventional resort. And Aura hosts who welcome the opportunity to attend to your every wish and need. ME Cabo’s new hotspots include Confessions Skybar & Tapas, Taboo Beach Club, serving Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, Funky Geisha with beachside Asian fare and Mamazzita Mexican Soul with the best traditional cuisine. At only 10 minutes’ drive from downtown, ME Cabo hotel is just over half an hour away to the Airport.

name: Los Patios Hotel
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 4.5, 23454 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Los Patios HotelAlong with a restaurant, this smoke-free hotel has an outdoor pool and a bar/lounge. Self parking is free. Other amenities include a poolside bar, laundry facilities, and a 24-hour front desk. All 76 rooms offer free WiFi, minibars, and TVs with cable channels. Other amenities available to guests include room service, free bottled water, and hair dryers.iHotelier/iStay

name: Nobu Hotel Los Cabos
address: Polígono 1, Fracción D, Fraccionamiento Diamante, 23473 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, 11 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas, Nobu Hotel Los Cabos provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi. Each room is equipped with air conditioning, and certain rooms at the resort have a balcony. À la carte and continental breakfast options are available daily at Nobu Hotel Los Cabos. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy playing table tennis, or take advantage of the business centre. El Arco is 12 km from Nobu Hotel Los Cabos, while Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 56 km from the resort.

name: Pueblo Bonito Montecristo Estates Luxury Villas
address: Predio Paraiso Escondido 1, Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Facilities The hotel comprises a total of 90 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a dining area and a business centre. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the accommodation. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning. All rooms offer a mini fridge and a safe. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. A pool is available for guests to enjoy in their free time. The hotel offers a gym (for a fee) to travellers. An entertainment programme is offered for children.Ticket Package

name: Hotel El Ganzo Adults Only
address: Blvd Tiburon, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: All 70 guestrooms overlooking the Sea of Cortez are luxuriously appointed with modern, refined dcor with rustic undertones brought in with natural materials and woods throughout. A complimentary, fully stocked minibar, custom, artisan bath amenities, and wireless internet access are among the amenities.iHotelier/iStay

name: Medano Hotel and Spa
address: Camino Real esq. Paseo del Pescador, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Cabo Tortuga Hotel Boutique
address: Miguel Hidalgo Entre Boulevar Marina y Calle Camino Del Conejo Lote 10, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: A short distance from scuba diving, snorkeling, and more, this smoke-free vacation home lets you experience it all. You're conveniently located within a 5-minute walk of Amelia Wilkes Square and Golden Cactus Gallery. This 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a dining area and air conditioning.Expedia

name: Grand Solmar Lands End Resort And Spa
address: Av Solmar No 1- A Col Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The luxurious accommodation at Land's End Resort & Spa features stunning views over the Pacific Ocean from the private terrace. The resort includes 3 infinity pools and several hot tubs. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is just 3 km away, while San Jose del Cabo International Airport is 45 minutes away by car. Free parking is available on site. This hotel ranked among the top 100 Hotels & Resorts in the World. Grand Solmar Land's End Resort & Spa features studios and suites decorated with hand-crafted furnishings. All accommodation comes with a kitchen, lounge area and flat-screen TV. The spa offers innovative health and beauty treatments, and massage services can be enjoyed on the sea front. The hotel also has tennis courts and a fitness centre. A continental breakfast can be ordered to the room each morning. The resort has a buffet and à la carte restaurant, with ocean views.

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Los Cabos Golf & Spa
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 10.3, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Exclusivity, Mexican luxury, and sophistication in every detail. An incredible destination. Unrivalled hospitality that invites you to enjoy our restaurants, spa, and elegant spaces. (03-Sep-22 to 30-Sep-23 - Please note that this hotel will have a new Environmental Sanitation tax. It will be applied for each night of lodging in our hotels in the region corresponding to the County of Los Cabos.WebBeds

name: Villa del Arco Beach Resort & Spa
address: Camino Viejo a San José Km 0.4, El Medano Ejidal, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas on El Médano Beach, this hotel features spacious suites with kitchenette facilities. A 3-level health spa is available along with a sailing facility and restaurants. Each suite at Villa del Arco Cabo San Lucas includes a living area and large bathroom. The kitchenettes are equipped with a stovetop, refrigerator, and microwave. Guests can enjoy the sauna and the swimming pool. Cabo San Lucas Villa del Arco also provides a mini-market, scuba diving facility, and tennis courts. San José del Cabo is 20 miles from Villa del Arco. Sports fishing and whale watching are nearby.

name: Bahia Hotel & Beach House
address: Av. El Pescador, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Just steps from one of the finest beaches in Cabo San Lucas, guests will find a peaceful escape with exceptional service. Free WiFi is available at the front desk and the pool bar. While relaxing in the peaceful outdoor pool, guests can swim to the bar for an ice-cold beverage. Guests will also enjoy the fine dining at the on-site restaurant. Bahia Hotel is minutes from the vibrant nightlife of Cabo San Lucas city centre. The area provides some of the best fishing and boating opportunities.

name: Sandos Finisterra Los Cabos
address: Blvd. Marina, Col. Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Boasting a prime location in Cabo San Lucas, a city at the southern tip of Baja California peninsula, in Mexico, this stunning complex is situated close to a long sandy beach. Los Cabos International Airport is some 45 kilometres away. This hotel's outstanding situation makes it the perfect base for those wishing to relax and unwind under the sun. Featuring different room types, it exudes the charm, warmth and comfort that clients expect today. All the guest rooms come with a balcony boasting impressive views of the beach, the bay or the stunning marina. It also includes a wide range of services and facilities to guarantee a truly unforgettable stay, such as a state-of-the-art spa, carved into the rock of one of Cabo's famous hills, a wonderful fitness centre featuring the latest technology as well as three beautifully designed outdoor pools with hot tubs and poolside service.FarePortal

name: San Angel Suites
address: Camino del Cerro 215 Col. Pedregal, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Within walking distance from the Harbour and main shops, San Angel Suites is located in the Pedregal area of Cabo San Lucas. It features air-conditioned suites, a large spa bath and free Wi-Fi. All suites have a well-equipped kitchen with a stove, microwave, fridge and coffee maker. They also have HD flat-screen TVs, a living-dining area, private terrace and bathroom. Beds have euro top mattresses and toiletries are offered. The accommodation features a large central courtyard with chairs and loungers. It has a roofed hot tub with a capacity of 12 people. Staff are happy to arrange activities like fishing, diving or any other water activities. San Angel Suites can be reached through the Paseo De La Marina Avenue, which is 100 metres away. Los Cabos International Airport is 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Grand Solmar Pacific Dunes Resort Golf & Spa
address: Carretera Todos Santos Km 120 #1, 23473 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas and with Marina Cabo San Lucas reachable within 13 km, Grand Solmar Pacific Dunes Resort, Golf & Spa provides concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. Providing a bar, the property is located within 14 km of El Arco. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a dishwasher, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All units will provide guests with a microwave. An American breakfast is available daily at Grand Solmar Pacific Dunes Resort, Golf & Spa. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Japanese, Mexican and international cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and kosher options can also be requested. Grand Solmar Pacific Dunes Resort, Golf & Spa offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire and car hire are available at the resort. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 14 km from Grand Solmar Pacific Dunes Resort, Golf & Spa, while Cabo del Sol Golf is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International, 55 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Towers At Pueblo Bonito Pacifica
address: Predio Paraiso Escondido, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences
address: Kilometro 7.3 Carretera Transpeninsular, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Cabo San Lucas. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with whirlpool bathtub, air conditioning, wake-up service, mini bar, balcony/terrace. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Hacienda Encantada Resort & Residences combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Cabo San Lucas unforgettable.Agoda

name: Pueblo Bonito Rose Resort And Spa
address: Playa El Medano, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, this beachfront resort is located on El Medano Beach. It features Fellini’s Restaurant, a European-style spa, a large pool and all suites include a private terrace or balcony. Every suite at the Pueblo Bonito Rose has a fully equipped kitchenette. The suites also include a safety deposit box. On-site dining options include Mare Nostrum, which serves international cuisine and a Mexican buffet on Monday nights. Also at Pueblo Bonito Rose Resort & Spa is Fellini’s Ristorante which offers Italian dishes. The Spa at Rose offers a full selection of massages and beauty treatments. Also available is a beauty salon and a gym with yoga and personal training. Pueblo Bonito Rose Resort puts guests nearby golfing, which includes The “Ocean Course” at Cabo Del Sol. Sport fishing, water sports and eco tours are also located near the resort.

name: Marquis Los Cabos, Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Carretera Transpeninsular KM. 21.5, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of San Jose Del Cabo, Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Salon, executive floor, restaurant, bar, meeting facilities are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature executive lounge access, non smoking rooms, mini bar, inhouse movies, shower. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, hot tub, golf course (within 3 km), steamroom, spa. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that San Jose Del Cabo has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Secrets Marquis Los Cabos Hotel - Unlimited Luxury.Agoda

name: Hotel Casa Ceci Inn
address: Calle Ignacio Zaragoza 22, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in San José del Cabo and within 2.1 km of Hotelera Beach, Hotel Casa Ceci Inn has a terrace, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi throughout the property. The property is set 1.5 km from San Jose Estuary, 3.2 km from Puerto Los Cabos and 6.2 km from Club Campestre. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. Certain rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge and a microwave. Palmilla Golf Club is 8.2 km from the inn, while El Dorado Golf is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 10 km from Hotel Casa Ceci Inn.

name: Bungalows Cabo Pulmo
address: Acceso Principal a la Playa, Centro, 23570 Cabo Pulmo, Baja California Sur
description: Bungalows Cabo Pulmo features garden views, free WiFi and free private parking, located in Cabo Pulmo, 70 metres from Cabo Pulmo Beach. Some units include a terrace and/or a balcony with quiet street views. The campground offers a picnic area. Guests at Bungalows Cabo Pulmo can enjoy hiking nearby, or make the most of the garden. Cabo Pulmo National Park is 8.2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 89 km from Bungalows Cabo Pulmo.

name: Sunrock Hotel & Suites
address: Km 5.5 Carretera Transpeninsular Acceso, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Sunrock Hotel has an extraordinary overlook to El Medano bay and the famous Arch of Cabo San Lucas, the Hotel has 80 Suites of 2 bedrooms along 8 buildings with a dimension of 400 sqft, offers a feeling of comfort and privacy ideal for family or friends travelers. The master bedroom has 1 King size bed, secondary bedroom 2 double beds, fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator and cooking utensils, dining room, 7 swimming pools, gym and restaurantiHotelier/iStay

name: Solmar Resort
address: Avenida Solmar #1, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The Solmar Resort of Cabo San Lucas is located on the Pacific Ocean, hidden behind granite cliffs. This resort features a spa located in cabins, an outdoor pool and suites with a private balcony. The suites at the Resort Solmar are furnished with cable TV, air conditioning and a coffee maker. There is also a fridge in every suite. There are 3 restaurants serving international food, sushi and local dishes. They also offer themed nights and a range of social activities. Guests can organize sportsfishing adventures with the resort. Cabo San Lucas is a popular destination for whale watching. You can walk to Cabo San Lucas' shops, bars and restaurants in just 5 minutes from the hotel. The Solmar Resort in Cabo San Lucas is less than one mile from Land’s End and Plaza Bonita. Cabo Dolphins and The Point are also within one mile of the resort.

name: Casa Dorada Los Cabos Resort & Spa
address: Av. Del Pescador SN, Col. El Medano, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Two Bedroom Suite Ocean view master suite with a king size bed, hot tub, bathroom with shower, living and dining areas (fridge, microwave and coffee maker), sofa bed in living area, air conditioning. Connecting room with two double beds, bathroom with bathtub, living and dining areas, kitchenette (minibar fridge, microwave and coffee maker), air conditioning. Three fully equipped terraces. ROOM DETAILS 6 People 2 Double Bed 1 King Bed 1 Sofa Bed 1539 ft2 / 143 m2VRBO

name: Royal Solaris Los Cabos & Spa
address: Blvd San Jose Lote 10, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Hotel amenities includes:*400 deluxe accommodations*Unlimited food and selected beverages*2 freshwater swimming pools*1 Diving Pool*Mini water park with slides for children*NEW Climbing Wall*NEW BABY PARK*Fitness center and SPA *5 restaurants*3 bars *1 snack bar. *1 Pizzera*Nightly theme parties and entertainment *Daily activities prepared by the hotel's sports and entertainment for both adults and children.*Activity Center Playground for Kids*Childcare for children under 4 years old (additional charge)*Junior's Club*Meeting facilities*Wi fi( additional charge)** ENJOY OUR NEW ORIENTAL RESTAURANT ZAI **$500 USD RESORT CREDITBook minimum 3 day of stay between December 18th, 2017 to December 21st, 2018 for travel until December 21st, 2018 and receive $500 USD Resort Credit. Guests will receive coupon booklets and all details upon arrival. Restrictions apply.iHotelier/iStay

name: Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Adults Only
address: Puerto Los Cabos, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Set in the exclusive community of Puerto Los Cabos, Secrets Puerto Los Cabos Golf & Spa Resort offers adults a stunning Unlimited-Luxury® getaway in Mexico's Baja California Peninsula. The secure community around Secrets Puerto Los Cabos provides striking views of native flora and fauna and miles of unspoiled beachfront of the Sea of Cortez. The resort boasts 500 spacious non-smoking suites each with a private balcony or terrace, 24-hour room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, a Secrets Box for private in-suite dining and more. For added luxury, 150 ocean view suites are reserved for Preferred Club with access to additional privileges including a private lounge, upgraded amenities and mini-bar service, pillow menu, outdoor whirlpool and other extras. Unlimited-Luxury® continues throughout the resort where guests are treated to limitless gourmet fare and top-shelf spirits at elegant restaurants, bars and lounges. 24-hour dining options allow guests to enjoy late night bites at Coco Café. Or stay in and order room service. It's all available at any hour day or night. Indulge in the over 12,000 sq. ft. Secrets Spa by Pevonia and be treated to spa options in 21 treatment rooms, a full-service beauty salon or an extensive hydrotherapy circuit. Follow up this rejuvenation at the fully equipped fitness center or by taking part in one of many daily and nightly activities. Choose from a variety of beach, land and water activities, take a dip in one of two main heated pools, go on a leisurely walk along the 3 mile stretch of unspoiled Pacific Coast beach or catch the live nightly entertainment. Plus, the Puerto Los Cabos community provides, just steps away, a full service Marina with world-class sport fishing and artisan walkway, and the only composite 18-hole golf course in the area designed by Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman.FarePortal

name: Casa Natalia Boutique Hotel Adults Only
address: Boulevard Mijares 4, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Come and enjoy the beauty, luxury and romance in one of the top 10 hotels in Mexico, as voted by Cond Nast Traveller readers. Casa Natalia is a charming boutique hotel which features 18 luxury suites decorated with unique local Mexican art, private outdoor terraces and hammocks.Located in the heart of San Jose del Cabo's Centro Historico, Casa Natalia is surrounded by quaint cobblestone streets, charming Spanish-inspired colonial buildings, family-owned jewelry shops, inviting restaurants and, of course, the natural beauty of Baja.Casa Natalia is home to the delicious internationally-inspired Mi Cocina Restaurant and Baja Oyster Bar.iHotelier/iStay

name: JW Marriott Los Cabos Beach Resort & Spa
address: Fraccion Hotelera FH5-C1, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Experience the essence of tropical luxury at JW Marriott Los Cabos Beach Resort & Spa. Positioned along the picturesque beachfront of San Jose del Cabo, where the Sea of Cortez meets the Pacific Ocean, our luxury hotel offers an ideal setting to bask in the sun with a touch of sophistication. Whether you're beachcombing, lounging by our pristine pools or perfecting your golf game on our 27-hole course, unwinding from daily life is effortless. Seeking respite from the Los Cabos sun? Indulge in the tropical serenity of our luxurious Jasha Spa & Salon. Our resort is also home to six distinctive dining venues and bars, perfect for savoring moments from dawn till dusk. When it's time to retreat for the night, find solace in our chic hotel rooms and suites. Adorned with luxury furnishings and inspiring ocean vistas, our accommodations elevate your vacation experience. Whether you're seeking solitude, joining us for a family trip or rekindling romance, create lasting memories at our Los Cabos resort.Marriott

name: OYO Posada Del Pescador
address: Alikan num 2125 esq Ocampo col. matamoros, 23468 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: OYO Posada Del Pescador provides comfortable 3-star accommodation in Los Cabos. It is a short drive from Cabo San Lucas Bay and has free private parking on site. The hotel provides luggage storage, 24-hour security and a 24-hour reception. A Wi-Fi connection is also available. This hotel features rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They feature an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a sofa bed. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. OYO Posada Del Pescador is within walking distance of Flea Market at the Marina, El Squid Roe and Legends Live Music and Bar. Marina Cabo San Lucas is a brief walk away.Revato

name: Alegranza Luxury Resort - All Master Suite
address: Paseo De Las Misiones, 927, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Alegranza Luxury Resort All Master Suite gated community is located in the San Jose del Cabo's Golf Course. Features include a sauna, golf practice facility, and 3 shared heated pools with 2 hot tubs. Each suite and apartment has a fully equipped kitchen, balcony, and flat-screen television. Select apartments have a hot tub on a rooftop terrace. Restaurant Raices and Restaurant Miraiis are available on site with one of the best chefs in town for breakfast, lunch or dinner. This San José del Cabo Alegranza Luxury Resort also offers the Palapa Bar with outdoor barbecue facilities. A tennis court and underground parking are available. Tour information is offered as well. Guests are a 15 minutes' drive from the Los Cabos International Airport. The property is 1.4 km from San Jose Estuary, 2.1 km from Club Campestre, and 44.8 km from Cabo Pulmo National Park.

name: Sirena del Mar by Vacation Club Rentals
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km. 4.5, Cabo Bello, Cabo San Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located over a cliff, Hyatt Vacation Club at Sirena del Mar offers its guests a private beach area, terraces to soak in the sun and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available throughout. The rooms at Hyatt Vacation Club at Sirena del Mar are air conditioned and feature terraces with sea or garden views. Some of the amenities they offer are flat-screen cable TV, DVD players and a washing machine and dryer. The private bathrooms are tiled and have a shower/bath tub combo, some have spa bath and free toiletries. This property is just a ten-minute drive to the heart of Cabo San Lucas including shopping and night-life. Guests can experience planned resort activities such as snorkeling, cooking class, ping pong tournaments, spanish lessons and guitar hero challenges. The resort has Estrella Restaurante, offers poolside and indoor air conditioned dining, opened daily for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Central Cabo San Lucas is 15 minutes’ drive from Hyatt Vacation Club at Sirena del Mar, and the famous Cabo San Lucas Arch is 8 km away.

name: The Ridge at Playa Grande
address: Av Playa Grande No 1 A, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Set between impressive rock formations, Ridge in Cabo San Lucas offers views of the Sea of Cortez and access to the private Solmar Beach. Close to the marina and Land’s End, it features a spa and 4 restaurants. The Ridge at Playa Grande provides suites with a microwave and a fridge. Each suite includes flat-screen cable TV with pay-per-view movies and an in-room safe. A bathrobe and slippers are provided. The Ridge at Playa Grande features 3 infinity swimming pools, tennis courts and mini-golf. There is also a coffee shop, and staff at reception can arrange butler services and car rental.

name: Suites at PB Rose' Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas
address: Playa El Medano Apartado Postal 460, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star resort is located in Los Cabos. It also has a gym, a beauty centre and a sauna. Suites at Rose Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas's room features a dishwasher, a refrigerator and a microwave. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at the resort, and there are numerous restaurants and cafés nearby. Packed lunches are available on request for those with day trips planned. Suites at Rose Resort and Spa Cabo San Lucas is situated in the popular tourist destination of El Medano. Playa Las Viudas is just an easy car ride from the resort.HotelsCombined

name: Cabo Vista Hotel - Adults only
address: Av. Cabo San Lucas / Revolucion 1910, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Cabo Vista Hotel is located in Cabo San Lucas, a 5-minute drive from the city centre. Less than 2 km from the beach, it features beautiful gardens and a 24-hour front desk. Each air-conditioned studio here includes a kitchenette with an electric hob, fridge and microwave. There is also a small dining and seating area. Free WiFi is available throughout. At Cabo Vista Hotel you will find restaurants and bars within 500 metres, while Cabo San Lucas Country Club can be reached in 10 minutes by car. Los Cabos International Airport is a 1-hour drive away.

name: Suites at VDP Cabo San Lucas Beach Resort and Spa
address: Camino Viejo a San Jose, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: The beachfront Suites at Villa Del Palmar Beach Resort and Spa features an outdoor lagoon-style pool with a waterfall, a whale slide, and a full-service spa. Cabo San Lucas city center is 1.5 mi away. In addition to a sea view, these suite offers WiFi and a full kitchen or kitchenette. The Suites at Villa Del Palmar Beach Resort extras include a seating area, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with a bath or shower. The Market is open all day, the Taco Bar serves Mexican food during the day, Bella California serves classic Italian cuisine for dinner, and Los Tortugas offers dinner shows and a buffet each night. Packed lunches are offered at Palmita Deli & Market. Also available is an optional all inclusive program which covers all meals and drinks during your stay. When guests tire of relaxing by Bahia San Lucas, shopping is only 6 minutes’ drive away at Puerto Paraiso Mall. The resort is also within 1.2 mi of Marina Cabo San Lucas and Cabo San Lucas Country Club.Official Hotel Information

name: Dici Coliving Housing The Friends Room
address: Álvaro Obregón Ignacio Zaragoza, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Ideally located in the centre of Cabo San Lucas, DICI Coliving Housing The Friends Room offers air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is around 1.6 km from Medano Beach, 2.2 km from Solmar Beach and 2.5 km from La Empacadora Beach. Marina Cabo San Lucas is less than 1 km away and El Arco is 2.6 km from the hostel. All rooms in the hostel are fitted with a coffee machine. All guest rooms feature a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Guests at DICI Coliving Housing The Friends Room can enjoy a continental breakfast. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 5.4 km from the accommodation, while Cabo del Sol Golf is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from DICI Coliving Housing The Friends Room.

name: Dici Co-Living Housing Cabo San Lucas
address: Álvaro Obregón, Downtown, Ildefonso Green, Álvaro Obregón, Downtown, Ildefonso Green, 23470 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 1.6 km from Medano Beach and 800 metres from the centre, DICI Co-Living Housing Cabo San Lucas features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a garden. There is a shared bathroom with a bath or shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. DICI Co-Living Housing Cabo San Lucas offers a sun terrace. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at the accommodation, while cycling can be enjoyed nearby. La Empacadora Beach is 2.4 km from DICI Co-Living Housing Cabo San Lucas, while Solmar Beach is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International, 42 km from the bed and breakfast, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Cabo del Sol Golf is 10 km from the accommodation, while Cabo Real Golf Course is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 41 km from Villa Del Palmar 1 Bedroom.

address: Carretera Transpeninsular Km 7.3 Cabo Del Sol, 23455 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: A stay at Vista Encantada Spa Resort & Residences places you in the heart of Cabo San Lucas, a 1-minute drive from Cabo del Sol Golf and 9 minutes from Santa Maria Beach. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Suites at Gr Solmar Lands End Resort and Spa
address: Av Solmar No 1A Col Centro, 23450 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Located in Cabo San Lucas, Suites at Grand Solmar Land's End Resort and Spa offers an outdoor pool and a spa and wellness centre. This self-catering accommodation features free WiFi. The property is 1 km from El Arco and 1.1 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas. Accommodation will provide you with satellite TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is a full kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a spa bath, private bathrooms also come with a shower. You can enjoy sea view and mountain view. At Suites at Grand Solmar Land's End Resort and Spa you will find a restaurant, a private beach area and a fitness centre. Dry cleaning, ironing service and laundry facilities are offered. Activities in the surrounding area include golfing, horse riding and fishing. The property offers free parking. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Cabo San Lucas Country Club (3.5 km) and Cabo del Sol Golf (7.7 km). Los Cabos International Airport is located 36 km away.

name: Royal Decameron Los Cabos
address: Boulevard, P.º Malecon San Jose, Zona Hotelera, 23406 San José Del Cabo, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: This beachfront resort is located in the south part of the Baja California peninsula, just a 15-minute drive from Los Cabos International Airport and a 5-minute one from downtown San Jose del Cabo. Overlooking the Sea of Cortés, the venue is ideal for a sun-soaked holiday where one can escape from everything and recharge hers/his batteries. It boasts 2 outdoor swimming pools, with separate children's areas for the youngest guests, where guests can spend many afternoons afternoons just lazing around and sipping chilled beverages. There is also a spa and wellness centre for those who need little extra pampering, while the San Jose Golf Course is located only 300 metres from the property and offers everything the fans of the fairway can desire.FarePortal

name: Marina Sol
address: Calle Acuario, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Marina Sol offers accommodation within 400 metres of the centre of Cabo San Lucas, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Every unit has a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a kitchenware. At the aparthotel you will find a restaurant serving American and Mexican cuisine. At Marina Sol guests are welcome to take advantage of spa facilities, wellness packages and beauty services. Cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby, while a car rental service and water sports facilities are also available on site. Medano Beach is 300 metres from the accommodation, while La Empacadora Beach is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 41 km from Marina Sol.

name: Posada Real Los Cabos
address: Malecon San Jose, Zona Hotelera, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: The downtown is far 10 minutes by car, The International Los Cabos Airport is 20 kilometers far from the hotel, The Marina Puerto Los Cabos is far 10 minutes by car, Cabo San Lucas is located 30 kilometers from the hotel, The golf courses Puerto Los Cabos, Vidanta, Club Campestre San José and Palmilla are 15 minutes far from the hotel by car. Facilities and services include Wi-Fi connection, air conditioning, baby sitting services (extra charge), laundry facilities (Extra charge), business services, cash machine/ATM, Massage service, currency exchange, pool, childrens pool, gym/fitness facilities, bar, restaurant, concierge facilities and car parking. Rooms feature air conditioning and coffee/tea making facilities. Address: Malecon De San Jose Sn Zona Hotelera, San Jose Del Cabo, Los Cabos, 23400, Mexico.WebBeds

name: Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos
address: Km.18.5 Carretera Transpeninsular San José-San Lucas, Col. Lomas del tule, San José del Cabo, México. B.C.S., 23405 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Located in San José del Cabo, 600 metres from Boca del Tule Beach, Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and an oven. At Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Cabo Real Golf Course is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while El Dorado Golf is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 23 km from Villa La Valencia Beach Resort & Spa Los Cabos.

name: Holiday Inn Express Cabo San Lucas
address: Corredor Csl - Sjd Km. 4.5, 23454 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Holiday Inn Express Cabo San Lucas is strategically located at the entrance of the main town. From there, you can arrive to Costco and Office Max by walking. For the golf enthusiasts, Campo San Lucas Golf Course is located about 10 minutes distance from the resort with discounts for our honorable guests. Puerto Paraiso, (Cabo San Lucas most acclaimed shopping mall where you can find any type of souvenir shops, go to the movies, or go to the casino, and do other types of activities.) is located just about 15 minutes from the resort. Also, places like the main town, the “La Marina” Harbor, and the most notorious public beaches, are in the vicinity of that shopping mall. Moreover, The heart of the town welcomes those who love nightlife entertainment. Enjoy a complimentary and delicious buffet breakfast in the mornings. Use the business center available 24 hours, and stay in shape with the courtesy membership access for our guests to the best Gymnasium of Los Cabos, “Cabo Fitness Club”. Feel relaxed in our open roof swimming pool with an outstanding view to the famous rock arch formation “El Arco de Cabo San Lucas”, also know as The Arch of Lands End. Escape to one of the vast activities that the destination offers you like snorkeling, scuba diving, visits to the Arch, Water Sports and tours to the main attractions of the surrounding areas.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Marisol Hotel Boutique
address: Paseo Malecon 161 Esquina Punta Colorada, 23406 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Just 200 metres from the beach in San José del Cabo, Marisol Hotel Boutique offers 10 elegant air-conditioned rooms. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Marisol Hotel Boutique’s elegant rooms are decorated with Mexican art and has terrace for sunbathing. There are a variety of restaurants and a supermarket within a walking distance from the hotel. Guests can book activities and tours through the hotel’s tour desk. Car rental is also available. Guests can sunbathe on the terrace. The neighbouring city of Cabo San Lucas, a popular spa resort, is a 30-minute drive away. Los Cabos International Airport is 12.5 km away. Hotel offers with no extra cost beach towels, umbrellas and coolers.

name: Casa Palo Verde
address: Calle Narciso Mendoza Alikan y Av de La Juventud Mz 142 Lt 05, 23470 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, within 1.4 km of Medano Beach and 2.7 km of Solmar Beach, Casa Palo Verde features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. The accommodation provides full-day security, luggage storage space and organising tours for guests. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. La Empacadora Beach is 3 km from Casa Palo Verde, while Marina Cabo San Lucas is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: Tropicana Inn
address: Blvd. Mijares 30, 23400 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: An outdoor pool, a swim-up palapa bar and tropical gardens are offered at the Tropicana Inn, located in central San José. Rooms have views of the pool or gardens. Hotel Tropicana Inn is decorated in Mexican colonial style. Rooms include luxury linens and toiletries. Cable TV, a minibar and a coffee maker are also provided. San José’s beaches are just a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Local area information is available from the 24-hour reception. Free private parking is offered on site and free WiFi in the pool area is available. The Tropicana restaurant was designed in carved wood and stone, with hand-painted murals. It serves traditional Mexican and fusion cuisine. Breakfast includes eggs and bacon, pancakes, fruit and typical regional dishes.

name: Terrasol Elite Premium Vacation Rentals
address: Terrasol Condominiums Solmar Ave, 23453 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Terrasol Elite Premium Vacation Rentals features accommodation situated less than 1 km from the centre of Cabo San Lucas and offers a private beach area and pool with a view. Complimentary WiFi is available and private parking is available on site. Offering a terrace or balcony with views of the sea and mountain, the units feature air conditioning, a seating area, satellite flat-screen TV and kitchen. There is a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer in each unit, along with free toiletries. The restaurant at the aparthotel specialises in American and Mexican cuisine. Terrasol Elite Premium Vacation Rentals offers an outdoor fireplace. A gym and laundry facilities are available at the accommodation. A car rental service is available at Terrasol Elite Premium Vacation Rentals, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Medano Beach is 1.8 km from the aparthotel, while La Empacadora Beach is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International, 43 km from Terrasol Elite Premium Vacation Rentals, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Nobu Residences
address: Diamante Boulevard, 23473 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in Cabo San Lucas, 11 km from Marina Cabo San Lucas, Nobu Residences features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 12 km from El Arco. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nobu Residences rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Cabo San Lucas Country Club is 13 km from the accommodation, while Cabo del Sol Golf is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 53 km from Nobu Residences.

name: Residences at Zadun a Ritz-Carlton Reserve
address: Boulevard Mar de Cortez, Puerto Los Cabo, 23403 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: The new residences are perfectly positioned on the sprawling 20,000 acres within Zadún, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve. With breathtaking views of the Sea of Cortés, the residences pay homage to Mexican haciendas, showcasing works from local artisans and offering a courtyard symbolizing the gathering spaces where conversations would flow between family and friends.Paying homage to the beauty, culture and heritage of Los Cabos, each home is designed with stunning views and distinctive modern architecture. Nestled in one of the most treasured corners of the world, homeownership privileges include exclusive access to a world-class marina, Jack Nicklaus and Greg Norman signature golf courses, a private beach, a 12-acre botanical park, an Owners’ lounge, in-residence dining and a la carte services from the ultra-luxurious Zadún, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve.Marriott

name: Villa del Faro
address: 65 Km Camino Costero, 23400 La Fortuna, Baja California Sur
description: Villa del Faro offers an outdoor pool and terraces with spectacular views of the Cortez Sea. This eco-friendly property is located on the beachfront, 3 km north of Boca de la Vinorama. The solar-powered accommodations boast unique handmade furniture and a fireplace. All the accommodations have patios and terraces offering stunning views and outdoor furniture. The private bathrooms provide free toiletries. Facing the Cortez Sea, Villa del Faro’s small restaurant opens exclusively for guests and serves Mexican cuisine that varies every day. Breakfast is included daily and dinners can be arranged on request. There is also a full bar with an extensive wine list. Villa del Faro has its own secluded beach area. Guests have the opportunity to enjoy activities such as sport fishing, surfing, kayaking, hiking and horse riding on the beach. Whale-watching trips can be arranged in season. Cabo Pulmo National Park is just a 30-minute drive away, while Los Cabos International Airport can be reached in about 1 hour by car. Access is via a rough dirt road.

Marina Cabo San Lucas is 1.8 km from the apartment, while El Arco is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Los Cabos International Airport, 43 km from Morgan Residences 607.

name: Relax And Romance At A Premier Resort! 1 Bedroom/1.5 Bathrooms 2,450/Week
address: Carretera Transpeninsular Kilometro 10.3Lote A-1 Cabo Del Sol, 23410 Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur
description: IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A 2 BEDROOM, 2.5 BATHROOM UNIT, SEARCH VRBO FOR PROPERTY LISTING # 644945. $2,550.04/WEEK. THIS IS THE PERFECT PLACE FOR A ROMANTIC GETAWAY! If you are looking for a place to rediscover one another, you can not beat the FIESTA AMERICANA GRAND RESORT. Keep reading for all the details: The hot tub pictured here is located right on the ocean which makes for a very romantic atmosphere, day or night! Looking out over the ledge at the waves crashing below and beyond at the gorgeous Sea of Cortez evokes a very relaxing atmosphere. Especially once the sun goes when you think it can't get any better, if the moon is shining you will be in for a MOST ROMANTIC TREAT! With the moon shining on the ocean, a swath of romantic light shines right to the hot tub, illuminating the waves crashing on the rocks is a very special setting, perfect for creating lasting memories! During the day, the BEACH at THE FIESTA AMERICANA GRAND is one of the few beaches where YOU CAN ACTUALLY SWIM in the ocean. There are NO rip currents here! As beautiful as all the beaches on the Sea of Cortez and the Pacific Ocean are, it is not safe to swim and snorkel at many of the resort beaches. Here at the Fiesta Americana resort there are beautiful tide pools where it is totally safe to snorkel and view undersea life! The only exception would be if there is a storm out at sea generating large swells. Then, if the waves are too large, it is not safe to swim or snorkel. But, then you can easily go to two beautiful beaches that are in sheltered bays where you can still swim and snorkel. They are both only minutes away by car in the same direction, along Highway 1, (the main highway). There are signs on the highway making it easy to find them, PLAYA SANTA MARIA and CHILENO BAY. 'Playa' is the Spanish word for 'beach'. If the waves at Fiesta Americana are large be sure to go to the hot tub (pictured in the photo gallery) and hang over the ledge looking out over the ocean. Watching the waves crashing on the rocks below is a wonderous sight to behold! The spray can go as high as ten feet in the air and you can witness the power of the ocean, at a safe distance, of course! All of the units at FIESTA AMERICANA GRAND have spectacular ocean views. Some of the units are in a building called Phase 1. Phase 1 is so close to the ocean that when you are inside your unit you can hear the waves crashing on the rocks right below your balcony! I always request a unit in Phase 1 because I love being as close to the ocean as possible. And if you request a unit in Phase 1 you could possibly experience sitting on your balcony being mesmerized by the waves crashing onto the rocks right below your balcony! Explore the beautifully landscaped resort grounds to see the many delightful settings inviting you to indulge your desires. Swim in one of three large swimming pools or in the Sea of Cortez. Lounge under a palapa on the beach. Relax in a swinging hammock. Eat and drink in a variety of restaurants and bars. All are just a few minutes stroll within the luscious tropical resort grounds. The beds and bedding are very comfortable. And everything is very clean! Housekeeping cleans the unit every day. The towels and linens are laundered every day. If you need anything just ask, they want you to be happy and have a good vacation, they will do their best to accomodate your every need, within reason. If you don't want to rent a car, you CAN spend your entire vacation at the resort and eat breakfast, lunch and dinner at the resort's restaraunts every day. The resort has several restaurants and bars, all of them serve excellent food and drinks. Be sure to eat dinner at the enchanting Peninsula Restaurant, right on the beach, at least once! There are servers that will be happy to bring refreshments and meals to you on the beach and poolside. Room service is also available 24/7. Based on my personal experience in the last ten years, the staff are super friendly and eager to please! They have a desire to make sure your vacation is enjoyable and they will bend over backwards to make sure you are happy! The resort is located on a beach that is not accessible to vendors, which means that it feels like you are on a 'private' beach. You can swim and snorkel most of the time. The only time it is not safe to swim at the resort's beach is when there is a storm out at sea creating large swells which come crashing onto the beach as large waves. Then it is not safe to swim, but it IS the perfect time to witness the awesome power of the ocean from a safe distance, as in from the ledge in the hot tub (pictured in the photo gallery) or from your private balcony if your unit is in Phase 1, the building built right on the rocks. Watching the waves crashing on the rocks below is a wonderous sight to behold! The spray can go as high as ten feet in the air! If you do rent a car, there is ample free parking for your rental car in a covered garage.VRBO

As beautiful as all the beaches on the Sea of Cortez and the Pacific Ocean are, it is not safe to swim and snorkel at many of the resort beaches. Here at the Fiesta Americana resort there are beautiful tide pools where it is totally safe to snorkel and view undersea life! The ounly exception would be if there is a storm out at sea generating large swells. Then, if the waves are too large, it is not safe to swim or snorkel. But, then you can easily go to two beautiful beaches that are in sheltered bays where you can still swim and snorkel. They are both only minutes away by car in the same direction, along Highway 1, (the main highway). There are signs on the highway making it easy to find them, PLAYA SANTA MARIA and CHILENO BAY. 'Playa' is the Spanish word for 'beach'. If the waves at Fiesta Americana are large be sure to go to the hot tub (pictured in the photo gallery) and hang over the ledge looking out over the ocean. Watching the waves crashing on the rocks below is a wonderous sight to behold! The spray can go as high as ten feet in the air and you can witness the power of the ocean, at a safe distance, of course! All of the units at FIESTA AMERICANA GRAND have spectacular ocean views. Some of the units are in a building called Phase 1. Phase 1 is so close to the ocean that when you are inside your unit you can hear the waves crashing on the rocks right below your balcony! I always request a unit in Phase 1 because I love being as close to the ocean as possible. And if you request a unit in Phase 1 you could possibly experience sitting on your balcony being mesmerized by the waves crashing onto the rocks right below your balcony! Explore the beautifully landscaped resort grounds to see the many delightful settings inviting you to indulge your desires. Swim in one of three large swimming pools or in the Sea of Cortez. Lounge under a palapa on the beach. Relax in a swinging hammock. Eat and drink in a variety of restaurants and bars. All are just a few minutes stroll within the luscious tropical resort grounds. The unit at this resort is perfect for two couples traveling together who still want to maintain a certain level of independence, or for a family of four. Everyone will have their own bed and plenty of room for all their belongings. With two full bathrooms and an additional half bath there is plenty of privacy for everyone, too! The beds and bedding are very comfortable. And everything is very clean! Housekeeping cleans the unit every day. The towels and linens are laundered every day. If you need anything just ask, they want you to be happy and have a good vacation, they will do their best to accomodate your every need, within reason. If you don't want to rent a car, you CAN spend your entire vacation at the resort and eat breakfast, lunch and dinner at the resort's restaraunts every day. The resort has several restaurants and bars, all of them serve excellent food and drinks. Be sure to eat dinner at the enchanting Peninsula Restaurant, right on the beach, at least once! There are servers that will be happy to bring refreshments and meals to you on the beach and poolside. Room service is also available 24/7. Based on my personal experience in the last ten years, the staff are super friendly and eager to please! They have a desire to make sure your vacation is enjoyable and they will bend over backwards to make sure you are happy! The resort is located on a beach that is not accessible to vendors, which means that it feels like you are on a 'private' beach. You can swim and snorkel most of the time. The only time it is not safe to swim at the resort's beach is when there is a storm out at sea creating large swells which come crashing onto the beach as large waves. Then it is not safe to swim, but it IS the perfect time to witness the awesome power of the ocean from a safe distance, as in from the ledge in the hot tub (pictured in the photo gallery) or from your private balcony if your unit is in Phase 1, the building built right on the rocks. Watching the waves crashing on the rocks below is a wonderous sight to behold! The spray can go as high as ten feet in the air! If you do rent a car, there is ample free parking for your rental car in a covered garage.VRBO
