name: Puerta Cortez Residenses
address: KM 7.5 Carretera a Pichilingue, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Our Marina Village hosts restaurants offering room-service, mini-mart, health center, tour operators, and a coffee shop. The Blue Cortes Beach Club has its infinity pool and top restaurant and bar. El Cortes Golf Club, Mexico’s only 18 hole Gary Player Signature Golf Club, Tennis Courts, Fitness Center, and Spa. This 5-star resort includes free WiFi, exclusive access to all Puerta Cortes amenities. A concierge is available for booking private or public tours to the activities within and around the resort. Breakfast and lunch are served at Blue Cortes Beach Club, Cardon at El Cortes Golf Club or DoceCuarenta Coffee Shop in the Marina Village. For Lunch and dinner Puerta Cortes also has 3 restaurants in the Marina Village, Japanese food Odayaka, International Cuisine at Azul Marino, or Italian at la Barcaccia. Manuel Marquez de Leon International Airport is 17.7 km from the property and San Jose del Cabo Airport is 170 km. Check-in is to be made in the Marina Towns Official Puerta Cortes Reception

name: Hotel Hacienda Bugambilias
address: Aquiles Serdán And Vicente Guerrero 520, La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Only 5 minutes’ drive from central La Paz, Hotel Hacienda Bugambilias features outdoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and garden views. La Paz walking pier is just 200 metres from the hotel. The simply decorated rooms have wooden furniture and hand-painted tiles in the bathroom. The rooms also feature a working desk, satellite TV and wake-up service. The bathrooms are private and offer free toiletries. The on-site restaurant serves traditional local dishes and seafood. And within a 1.2 km radius, guests will be able to find restaurants and other food options. The Historic Centre and the cathedral are 5 minutes’ walk from Hacienda Bugambilias, and La Paz International Airport is 13 km away. The hotel may help guests with the organization of different tours, such as whalewatching and city tours.

name: Hostel Casa Esterito
address: Revolución de 1910, 335 /colegio militar y heroes del 47, 23020 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Hostel Casa Esterito offers private apartment accommodation in La Paz. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a fridge.Casa Esterito features free WiFi throughout the property. Bicycles are available at the property upon request. Manuel Márquez de León International Airport is 12 km away. Street-parking is available.

name: Hotel Allende
address: Allende 36, 23000 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Hotel Allende is located in center of La Paz, close to the Malecon and has a bay view sun terrace. Free high speed WiFi in all areas. The rooms are built around a private garden and will provide you with a cable TV, air conditioning. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Other facilities offered at the property include a tour desk, luggage storage and laundry facilities. Boat excursions start a few paces from the hotel. The property is within steps of the city's sea promenade, Malecon.

name: Leo's Baja Oasis
address: Ignacio Allende 440, 23000 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Boasting pool with a view, garden and views of mountain, Leo's Baja Oasis is located in La Paz, 1.5 km from La Paz Malecon Beach. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with a water park. Guests can make use of the sun terrace or the outdoor fireplace, or enjoy views of the pool and garden. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Each room has a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and some have sea views. At the guest house the rooms include bed linen and towels. Leo's Baja Oasis offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Laundry facilities, free private parking and a business centre are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Barco Hundido Beach is 2.5 km from Leo's Baja Oasis, while La Posada Beach is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International, 9 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach
address: Manzana F Lote 1 Puerto Comercial de Pichilingue, La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Set close to Pichilingue beach, 10 miles north of La Paz, Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Club Hotel Cantamar by the Beach offers a sun terrace. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Pekin
address: Alvaro Obregon #875, 23020 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Located in La Paz, 2.1 km from La Paz Malecon Beach, Hotel Pekin features rooms with city views and free WiFi. There is a restaurant serving Cantonese cuisine, and free private parking is available. At the motel, each room comes with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, guest rooms at Hotel Pekin have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms include a terrace. At the accommodation each room has a seating area. Staff speak English, Spanish and Chinese at the reception. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 10 km from Hotel Pekin.

name: Casabuena La Paz Bed and Breakfast
address: 3065 Belisario Dominguez, 23060 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Located in La Paz in the Baja California Sur region and Barco Hundido Beach reachable within 800 metres, Casabuena B&B provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, a garden and free private parking. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with garden views. A continental breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Casabuena B&B offers an outdoor pool. A a baby safety gate is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Popular points of interest near Casabuena B&B include La Paz Malecon Beach, La Posada Beach and Conchalito Beach. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 8 km from the bed and breakfast.

name: Sunset Hostel
address: 1630 Ignacio Ramírez, 23000 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Sunset Hostel has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in La Paz. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a barbecue. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. You can play darts at the guest house, and bike hire and car hire are available. La Paz Malecon Beach is less than 1 km from Sunset Hostel. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Go Baja Villas 2 Bedroom (King)
address: 145 De Las Almejas, 23094 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: Nómadas Hostel
address: 1010 Puebla, 23060 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Situated in La Paz and with Barco Hundido Beach reachable within 2 km, Nómadas Hostel features a tour desk, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFithroughout the property and a terrace. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, bicycle parking and currency exchange for guests. All rooms have bed linen. The guest house offers a picnic area. La Paz Malecon Beach is 2.5 km from Nómadas Hostel, while La Posada Beach is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International, 7 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tiempo Precioso Casita
address: Aquiles Serdán 2255, 23006 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Located in La Paz, less than 1 km from La Paz Malecon Beach, Tiempo Precioso Casita provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.2 km from Barco Hundido Beach. At the guest house, every room is fitted with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a fridge. La Posada Beach is 2.7 km from Tiempo Precioso Casita. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Unique Luxury Home in The Sea Of Cortez for 6 peop
address: Escénica, 23010 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: No description found

name: El Duque Adventures In The Sea Of Cortez And Beyond
description: El Duque is the perfect platform for fun and adventure in the Sea of Cortez; a 53 ft converted trawler, she has 2 air conditioned cabins with 6 bunks and a bathroom in each - we can take a maximum of 12 but limit our trips to 10 for comfort. She is full of character, the original boat builder knew John 'The Duke' Wayne hence the name of the boat and some of her history. The bunk style accommodation will build camaraderie and lead to adventures on the high seas. There is a fully stocked galley and living area where you will enjoy a variety of home cooked meals and snacks throughout the day. We pride ourselves on catering to all of your dietary needs and requirements with a fabulous selection of Mexican and International fare. The living area also provides space to relax out of the sun and play a game of cards or perhaps watch a movie on the boat TV. She also comes equipped with fishing rods and kayaks for you to use in your spare time. We have a spacious sun deck which is great for relaxing with a book or perhaps having a BBQ and cocktail in the evening. You may even decide to bring your bedding up here to enjoy sleeping under the stars! The dive platform allows easy access in and out of the water and there is some space for your camera and electronics too. She carries all safety equipment as required under Mexican Law, including oxygen, life vests, and fire suppressants and we also have all permits necessary for the Natural Protected Areas that we visit. Setting us apart from most charter boats is our tender - no ore squeezing into a little dingy but rather we bring our panga on every trip to make shore excursions and activities quicker and easier; she has cushioned seats and protection from the sun. We organise charters out into the Sea of Cortez, mainly using the boat as our platform to explore Isla Espiritu Santo but also go further afield depending upon your timeframe. We can organise activities such as scuba diving, snorkelling, kayaking, beach exploration, hiking etc all from our boat - no need to hire outside dive companies with whom to rendezvous - do it from the comfort of our vessel. Your hosts, Norm and Cat are both PADI Scuba Instructors and can assist you with courses or try dive experiences if this is of interest to you. We personalise our charters depending on each group and what you would like to do. Please contact us for more information or to discuss your dream trip.VRBO

name: Real de Minas San Miguel de Allende
address: Ancha de San Antonio No. 1, Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in the beautiful city of San Miguel Allende, this hotel features fitness centre and massage service. A spa and wellness centre is available. Hotel Real de Minas features many on-site recreational activities and facilities. Guests can enjoy billiards, tennis court and a spacious outdoor swimming pool. The hotel also features a special children's play area. The historic city of Virreinato is located only a short distance from the Hotel de Minas. Guests can discover beautiful architecture, stunning temples and churches as well as Baroque-style streets. The hotel is 850 metres from the San Miguel Arcángel Church and the History Museum. You can drive to León Airport in 1 hour and 40 minutes, and Querétaro Airport is 1.5 hours' drive away.

name: Mirador del Frayle
address: Callejón De Arias No. 4, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Mirador del Frayle offers beautiful rooms around an outdoor pool and an attractive terrace. The property is located just over 10 minutes’ walk from central San Miguel de Allende. The spacious rooms are decorated in traditional colonial style. They have tiled floors and satellite TV, and many offer wonderful town views. The Frayle Mirador is set in beautiful gardens, and offers free Wi-Fi. There is free on-site parking. The hotel’s restaurant offers international food, and there are 2 bars, one by the pool.

name: Hacienda de las Flores
address: Hospicio 16, Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located on the heart of San Miguel De Allende, this hotel features Colonial architecture with Mexican décor. Hacienda De Las Flores offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and large gardens. Rooms in Hacienda De Las Flores have tiled floors, local craftwork and typical furnishings. They come with Cable TV, a minibar, a microwave, and private bathroom with shower. De Las Flores has a central terrace where the swimming pool is located, as well as a roof-top terrace with views of the city. Staff at the hotel can arrange outdoor activities like horse-riding, art lessons, biking or city tours. Hacienda De Las Flores is 350 metres from the Historic Museum, 1 minute walk from San Miguel Archangel Parish and 3 km from the Train Station.

name: Imperio de Angeles
address: Carr. San Miguel - Celaya Km. 2, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Minutes by car from Juarez Park, this San Miguel de Allende hotel is also minutes from Parroquia de San Miguel Arcangel church. It offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi. Guest rooms at Imperio de Angeles feature cable TV and a telephone. Some rooms have a balcony. Angeles Imperio is home to a restaurant that offers room service. Banquet facilities and a 24-hour front desk are available. Large gardens are available to celebrate events of up to 600 people.

name: Villa Mirasol
address: Pila Seca No. 35, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This colonial house is in central San Miguel, 350 metres from the Instituto Allende Visual Arts School. It has a charming terrace and offers elegant rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms at Villa Mirasol feature relaxing, soft colours. Each one comes with a coffee-maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel serves continental breakfast and lunch on the terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about San Miguel. They can arrange trips to sites such as nearby World Heritage Monuments and archaeological sites. Cooking classes can also be arranged. You can drive to the golf course at Ventanas de San Miguel in 5 minutes. The can help arrange a shuttle service to the airports of Mexico City, León and Querétaro for an extra fee.

name: Casa Maricela B&B
address: 41 Jesús Zona Centro, 3 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Just 700 metres from the Jardín Allende Park and the San Miguel Arcángel Parrish, Casa Maricela B&B is a property that has free Wi-Fi access and is 5 minutes’ walk from San Miguel de Allende’s town centre. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a seating area and cable channels. Private bathrooms also come with a shower. Extras include a fan. The breakfast is included with the rate at Casa Maricela B&B, and the dishes served are Mexican-style. Guests will be able to explore the restaurants available in San Miguel’s town centre. At Casa Maricela B&B you will find a terrace and an open air bar where guests can prepare drinks. Please note that alcohol is not provided. Other facilities offered include a tour desk and a computer the guests can use. The bed and breakfast is 300 metres from the Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende and 10 minutes’ drive from the bus station.

name: Casa Mia Suites
address: Correo No. 61 Int 1, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Casa Mia Suites is just two blocks from the main square of San Miguel de Allende. This hotel provides many helpful services, like currency exchange. Rooms at Casa Mia Suites have seating areas, dining areas, and kitchenettes, as well as balconies. The kitchenettes are equipped with kitchenware, microwaves, and refrigerators. All rooms have free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. Sit in the gazebo or at a patio table and enjoy the courtyard garden at Casa Mia. Or, stop at the hotel’s tour desk to get information on San Miguel de Allende attractions. Car rental services are also provided. Casa Mia’s central location in San Miguel de Allende make it convenient to many of the city’s attractions. Juarez Park is 800 meters away. The historic Angela Peralta Theater is less than 5 minutes from the hotel.

name: Hotel Matilda
address: Aldama 53, Col. Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This luxurious property in central San Miguel de Allende has a swimming pool, terrace bar and spa. Its air-conditioned rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen cable TV. The rooms and suites are decorated with modern Mexican photography. The large bathrooms have double sinks. The spa offers a range of massages and treatments, and includes a Turkish bath. It also includes a fitness centre. The Matilda’s restaurant offers a range of Mexican food by the well-known chef Vicente Torres. The bar offers cocktails which can also be enjoyed on the shady terrace. San Miguel de Allende is a UNESCO World Heritage Site located in the central highlands of Mexico. The property offers free on-site parking. Airport transfers can be arranged on request. The property offers bicycle hire.

name: Rancho Hotel Atascadero
address: Prolongacion Santo Domingo, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This beautiful former silk factory dates from the 1880s and is set in attractive gardens, less than 1 km from San Miguel de Allende’s charming centre. Rancho Hotel Atascadero features an outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant. Each spacious room at Rancho Hotel Atascadero has classic, colonial-style décor, a fireplace and wooden furnishings. There is free Wi-Fi, cable TV and a private bathroom. You can enjoy Mexican cuisine in the Atascadero’s restaurant. There is also a bar and live music on Fridays and Saturdays. The hotel features a hot tub, a sauna and games room. Ignacio Allende Lake is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Mesones 49
address: 49 Mesones Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in San Miguel de Allende and with Church of St. Michael the Archangel reachable within 300 metres, Hotel Mesones 49 features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. The property is around 12 km from Sanctuary of Atotonilco, less than 1 km from Chorro´s trip and a 13-minute walk from Allende´s Institute. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, the rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hotel Mesones 49 offers a continental or American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Public library and Las Monjas Temple. The nearest airport is Querétaro International, 72 km from Hotel Mesones 49, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Suites Santo Domingo
address: Santo Domingo 16 y 18, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Free Wi-Fi, a well-equipped kitchen and cable TV are included in each spacious Santo Domingo studio. Surrounded by attractive gardens and sun terraces, they are just 600 metres from San Miguel Church. Each spacious studio is decorated with soft colours and typical tiles. They include a living-dining area with an open fireplace. Kitchens come with a hob, blender and toaster. Santo Domingo Suites are situated in the centre of San Miguel de Allende, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Free private parking is offered at the studios, and the 24-hour reception provides information about the area.

name: Hotel Posada Carmina
address: Cuna De Allende No 7, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: A stay at Hotel Carmina places you in the heart of San Miguel de Allende, steps from Santa Cruz del Chorro Chapel and San Miguel de Allende Historical Museum. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).Hotels.com

name: Hotel La Estacion
address: Calzada de la Estación 90, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Hotel La Estación offers accommodation in San Miguel de Allende. Free private parking is available on site. Each room includes a flat-screen TV. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Hotel La Estación features free WiFi. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the Café Central cafeteria featuring room service fro 08:30 to 10:30. Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende is 1.4 km from Hotel La Estación, while Church of St. Michael the Archangel is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Del Bajio International Airport, 75 km from Hotel La Estación.

name: Casa Naré Adults Only
address: 18 Calle Dr Ignacio Hernandez Macias, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Casa Naré Adults Only in San Miguel de Allende provides accommodation with a shared lounge, a garden and a terrace. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. A complete Mexican breakfast is available daily at Casa Naré Adults Only. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around San Miguel de Allende, like cycling. Popular points of interest near Casa Naré Adults Only include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Church of St. Michael the Archangel and Public library. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 88 km from the hotel.

name: Las Terrazas
address: Santo Domingo #3, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende and with Church of St. Michael the Archangel reachable within 600 metres, Las Terrazas provides a garden, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and a terrace. Popular points of interest nearby include Las Monjas Temple, Allende´s Institute and The view point. Private parking is available on site. Guest rooms at the inn are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room comes with a coffee machine, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. At Las Terrazas the rooms include bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Guests at Las Terrazas will be able to enjoy activities in and around San Miguel de Allende, like hiking and cycling. Popular points of interest near the inn include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Public library and Chorro´s trip. The nearest airport is Querétaro International, 71 km from Las Terrazas, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dos Casas Hotel & Spa
address: Quebrada 101, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: The 4-star Dos Casas Hotel & Spa offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in San Miguel De Allende. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Daily housekeeping, airport transfer, restaurant, laundry service, bar are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Dos Casas Hotel & Spa combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in San Miguel De Allende unforgettable.Agoda

Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as complimentary bottled water and ceiling fans. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This Colonial hotel also features babysitting (surcharge) and a reception hall. name: La Morada
address: Correo No 10 Col Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: La Morada hotel is just half a block from Jardín Principal, San Miguel de Allende’s Main Square. It offers offers a rooftop terrace with a hot tub and spectacular city views. Free Wi-fi is available in public areas. Surrounding an interior patio, La Morada’s rooms feature stone flooring and a Mexican décor with bright colours and regional furnishings. Most rooms have a seating area and a fireplace. All are equipped with cable TV and a safety deposit box. Some bathrooms include a hydromassage bath. Situated in the historic centre of San Miguel de Allende, guests at Hotel La Morada can easily walk to a number of sights and attractions, including the Casa de Allende Museum and the Mercado de Artesanías crafts market.

name: Krystal Grand Residences & Villas San Miguel de Allende
address: Carr. San Miguel - Celaya 41, 37790 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Set in San Miguel de Allende, 3.3 km from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Krystal Grand Residences & Villas San Miguel de Allende offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.5 km from Church of St. Michael the Archangel. Sanctuary of Atotonilco is 15 km from the hotel, while Allende´s Institute is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 74 km from Krystal Grand Residences & Villas San Miguel de Allende.

name: Hacienda El Santuario San Miguel de Allende
address: Aldama 41, Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: This hotel in San Miguel Allende offers luxurious guestrooms and exceptional staff, as well as the perfect location close to several historic sites and beautiful architecture. Each spacious guestroom at Hacienda El Santuario San Miguel de Allende features colonial Mexican style décor, a cozy sitting area, and several other amenities. After enjoying a complimentary continental breakfast, guests can relax in the internal patio and terrace. Guests at Hacienda El Santuario San Miguel de Allende can explore the fascinating area of San Miguel de Allende. The city is full of art and architecture, known for being one of the most beautiful architectural cities in Mexico, as well as several festivals and activities.

name: Hotel Apapacho Boutique
address: 11 Bjd. Del Chorro Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Situated in San Miguel de Allende, 700 metres from Church of St. Michael the Archangel, Hotel Apapacho Boutique features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Boasting a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 800 metres from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, less than 1 km from Allende´s Institute and a 0-minute walk from Chorro´s trip. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Hotel Apapacho Boutique the rooms include bed linen and towels. Continental and American breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Hotel Apapacho Boutique offers 5-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Las Monjas Temple, Public library and Benito Juarez Park. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 72 km from Hotel Apapacho Boutique.

name: OurHabitas San Miguel de Allende
address: Carretera San Miguel De Allende, A Dolores Hidalgo Km. 3.5, Col. Miguel, 37713 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende, 2.9 km from Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Habitas San Miguel de Allende provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Public library is 2.2 km away and Las Monjas Temple is 2.9 km from the hotel. At the hotel, each room comes with a terrace with a garden view. At Habitas San Miguel de Allende each room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. Speaking English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception. Church of St. Michael the Archangel is 3 km from the accommodation, while Sanctuary of Atotonilco is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 74 km from Habitas San Miguel de Allende.

name: Hotel & Spa Doña Urraca San Miguel De Allende
address: Hidalgo 69 Colonia Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel De Allende, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, 300 metres from the main square, this hotel features an outdoor pool and spa. The façade offers a Novo-Hispanic, architecture style. This property was nominated for the 2017 Conde Nast Travelers Reader's Choice Awards. The Suites & Spa Doña Urraca San Miguel De Allende offer air conditioned suites, free WiFi and bathrobes. Select suites provide a seating area with coffee facilities. description: San Miguel de Allende is recognized as one of the most important cities during the time of New Spain. Nowadays, it is one of the most idyllic destinations in Mexico and visitors from all over the world come to learn about the history and culture of the city. Explore this destination from Albor San Miguel de Allende, Tapestry Collection by Hilton. Admire the colonial architecture and the history that lives in every corner. The hotel rooms offer views of the city and valley of San Miguel de Allende the spacious suites feature terraces and a living room. A complete gym and a swimming pool complement the amenities and services. Planning an event is easy with over 1,000 square meters of space in an esplanade inspired by contemporary Mexican design and with unique views of the city. Choose from a variety of packages and let our professionals help you create a truly memorable moment for groups or social events of any size. We have a multipurpose room for 70 people in an auditorium, perfect for business meetings, conferences, and special occasions, as well as a private room for 10 people in our Albor restaurant. Our Albor Terrace provides covered outdoor space overlooking the city of San Miguel de Allende and surrounded by terraces with endemic vegetation of the region, which are organically integrated into the pool area and botanical labyrinth. Ideal for special events and meetings Enlist the help of the hotel team to assist you with room selection, configurations, and technology requirements, as well as customized catering services to create a unique and memorable event from start to finish.Hilton

name: One Beach Street Puerto Vallarta
address: Calle Malecon 1, Col. Emiliano Zapata, Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: The apartment features a 1bedroom with 1 queen size bed, a living room with a sofa bed, a dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, a marble bathroom with a shower only, and a balcony overlooking Amapas Street to complete the experience for the ideal space to for up to 4 people. One Beach Street is a uniquely charming boutique hotel in the heart of the Romantic Zone also known as Old Vallarta. The hotel has just 6 stories divided into 60 comfortable suites. It overlooks the iconic Los Muertos Beach where many of the town’s early (and sometimes famous) visitors enjoyed the tranquil beach life in an authentic Mexican fishing village. One Beach Street still continues as a venue for reviving some of the quiet but vibrant glory of Puerto Vallarta’s history and its continuing presence as one of the most beautiful beach towns in the hemisphere. One Beach Street hotel is your point of reference for Puerto Vallarta. It was one of the first hotels built in the area. Today, it welcomes back generations of Vallartans ”who return each year to enjoy the relaxed interiors and rustic colonial exteriors so admired by the town’s adopted visitors. One Beach Street maintains its quaint Mexican style and is well known for having the best location for its spacious 1 and 2-bedroom suites with kitchens and balconies, ideal for those long Puerto Vallarta Vacation “getaways”. On the second level, this Puerto Vallarta hotel features an attractive outdoor pool with lounge chairs and umbrellas surrounding the waist-high ceramic pool for a cooling afternoon dip, perhaps before a more adventurous leap into the welcoming Los Muertos waves. Guests enjoy the property in part because One Beach Street is within walking distance of an incredible variety of restaurants, bars, and shopping. Los Muertos Beach is known for beach clubs, some with pools, DJs, and others with small music groups playing old songs for young (and old) travelers. The atmosphere is lively and you are guaranteed to have a memorable experience! The Romantic Zone in Puerto Vallarta or Old Town Vallarta is a famous “people watching” location day or night. And in addition to bars and restaurants, you can also look forward to the galleries that have become a trendy stop while visiting Puerto Vallarta and your new One Beach Street South address in Mexico. We know you will have the “best of the essence” of Old Vallarta if you choose One Beach Street. Guests enjoy the surrounding One Beach Street neighborhoods. Exploring the area is fun and easy. We wish you a great stay and we know you will have a wonderful, memorable time at One Beach Street Zona Romantica Puerto Vallarta, your new address in Puerto Vallarta. Features and amenities ● Air conditioning ● Tea/coffee maker in all rooms ● Outdoor swimming pool unheated ● Terrace Shared ● Fitness Room/Gym Parking ● Private parking. No reservation is necessary. Things to know ● Traveler must be at least 21 years of age to make a reservation. ● State Identification Card or Driver's License copy will be requested upon booking. House rules ● NO SMOKING in the house as well as the balcony. Any violation of the smoking policy will incur a $200.00 fine plus the cleaning costs necessary to remove smoke odors from the house and/or linens. ● NO PETS ALLOWED. Any violation of this policy will incur a $200.00 fine plus the cleaning costs. ● Please note: We are not responsible for any accidents, injuries, as well as stolen or damaged items that occur while on the premises, its facilities, or parking lots. ● The maximum room capacity may not be exceeded. Local attractions ● Playa Los Muertos 0.1 mi ● Muelle de Playa Los Muertos 0.1 mi ● El Dorado Restaurant 0.1 mi ● 4D Museum Puerto Vallarta 0.2 mi ● Parque Lazaro Cardenas y Estacionamiento 0.1 miVRBO

Some have kitchen facilities, patios and views of the river, while all offer cable TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom. Rivera Del Rio’s reception offers information about the surrounding area. Bars and restaurants can be found within 500 metres, while central Puerto Vallarta is 2 km away and Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 10 km away.

The on-site restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. A business center and currency exchange are located on the property as well as an outdoor pool and playground. Free parking is available. The Puerto Vallarta International Airport is less than 5 minutes from Comfort Inn Puerto Vallarta. The Vallarta Botanical Gardens are only 10 minutes from the hotel.

The hotel offers cocktail-making workshops. The Villa Premiere’s spa features a hot tub, sauna and an oxygen bar. Treatments include hydrotherapy, facials and massage. There are daily yoga classes on the beach. The hotel is set next to Puerto Vallarta’s beachfront promenade. The city’s airport is a 10-minute drive away.

Each spacious suite features classic-style décor and antique Mexican furniture. All suites have a seating area, a coffee maker and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Most suites offer ocean views and many have kitchen facilities. Free breakfast is served in the palapa-covered dining area from Monday to Saturday. Sunday breakfast is available at La Playita beach restaurant, located a 5-minute walk away. Other local restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Quinta Maria Cortez can arrange excursions on request, including fishing trips and jungle tours. Staff can also organize transfers to Puerto Vallarta International Airport, located around 12 km away. Free public parking is available on site.

This affordable hotel is strategically located close to all the main attractions and offers the security and comfort you need to rest, recharge and stay productive.The hotel is located on one of the main thoroughfares of Puerto Vallarta, just 2 minutes from the International Airport, 8 minutes from the International Convention Center, and 12 minutes from the Central Bus Station. Three blocks away is the Marina del Puerto recreational marina, with more than 500 luxury yachts and boats from around the world, plus a wide range of international restaurants, golf course, tennis courts, mall, water sports center and nightlife. This electricity is enough to enjoy your stay, you can use everything as usual (including the air-conditioned), but we highly recommend you to turn the lights and air-conditioned off whenever you’re not using them. Late checkout has an extra cost. If you leave the unit after 11 a.m. without notice we will apply a penalty fee. Please send us an email or message with the following information: Your name, Number of apartment, -Name of visitors, and time of arrival. -Visits should respect the condo rules. -If you have more than two people visiting without permission, we will apply a penalty fee. GENERAL -Parties are strictly prohibited. -Volume of music should be kept at a low level. -We reserve the right to evict any guest who does not comply with the rules of the unit. We also reserve the right to fine for inappropriate behavior; this fine will be taken from the security deposit. -Obligatory use of masks in common areas of the building (lobby, hallways, elevator, etc). -It is strictly prohibited to jump in the private pool. CLEANING -Our cleaning service can be from 9am up to 1 pm (except on Sunday) and you can schedule with your concierge your room’s cleaning at any time that’s best for you. If someday you don’t want us to do the refresh, let us know and we will communicate it to the maids. -This daily cleaning refresh service includes: make the beds, sweep and mop the apartment, help you program the dishwasher (dishes should be inside), and provide you with clean towels. -If you want us to clean the kitchen, we can do it for an extra cost of $25 USD. -Any extra cleaning service that you might need during your stay can be provided for an extra fee and if you ask for it in advance. ELECTRICITY -Our hosting service includes 25kW per day. This electricity is enough to enjoy your stay, you can use everything as usual (including the air-conditioned), but we highly recommend you to turn the lights and air-conditioned off whenever you’re not using them. We will apply an extra charge per kW if you exceed this number. The cost per kW is $5.00 MXN. We do not take a commission for it. CHECK OUT -At your check-out we will ensure that everything is correct at the apartment (this means there are no damages or missing objects), that’s why we ask you to respect your check-out time, otherwise, if you leave the flat and we find anything unusual, we will keep from your security deposit the payment for irregularities. -Our check-out time is at 11 a.m. If you need to change this, you can let your concierge know, but whatever your check-out time is, you must respect it, if not we will apply a penalty fee. VISITS -Visits are allowed, but only two people at a time. -Visits cannot stay at night to sleep. -Visits should be authorized before arrival. GENERAL -Parties are strictly prohibited. -Volume of music should be kept at a low level. -It is strictly prohibited to jump in the private pool. -We reserve the right to evict any guest who does not comply with the rules of the unit. Broaden your experience and explore the nearby archeological sites of Monte Albán and Mitla; admire the Tree of Tule, which has the stoutest trunk of any tree in the world; and visit Hierve el Agua, a set of natural rocks formation that create a waterfall. After a day touring the city, relax in the outdoor guest patio and tan from the sun loungers or swim in the beautiful pool. Stay in touch with your office from the Business Center with complimentary Internet access and if needed, hold meetings at the event room. Start your mornings with the free breakfast buffet that includes the delicious traditional chocolate from Oaxaca, and end your days resting in cozy rooms. name: City Centro by Marriott Oaxaca
address: Calle Aldama No 410, Barrio de Jalatlaco, 68080 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: Oaxaca is one of the most visited places in Mexico thanks to its cultural and architectural treasures. The city, founded in 1529 will captivate you with its colonial buildings and green quarry precincts. Here you will find City Centro by Marriott Oaxaca. We offer you a new experience that stimulates the senses, reinventing the way of staying in a hotel. Famous for its religious architecture, Oaxaca is full of churches and convents that enclose the colonial history of Mexico and has more than a thousand historical monuments that reflect the evolution of the city. The most important are the Metropolitan Cathedral and the ex-Convent of Santo Domingo, that it contains inside the Museum of Cultures, the Fray Francisco de Burgoa Library and the Ethnobotanical Garden. If you like pre-Hispanic art and culture, we recommend an excursion to one of its archaeological spots, such as Monte Alban or Ocotlan or visit Hierve El Agua, a natural place whose attractions are fossilized waterfalls.Marriott

description: The newly opened NH Collection Mérida Paseo Montejo is in the heart of one of Mérida’s most iconic streets. This city center hotel is in an ideal location for shopping at one-off boutiques, as well as exploring the plentiful cocktail bars and eateries of downtown Mérida. The hotel is within walking distance of some of the city’s central attractions, including Paseo de Montejo and Palacio de Cantón, as well as the Yucatán International Convention Centre. The hotel's 120 spacious and modern rooms each have Nespresso machines and free Wi-Fi. Accommodation includes superior rooms, premium rooms, family rooms and junior suites. Guests can enjoy a refreshing night's sleep on new mattresses with a choice of pillows. Each room also has rain-effect showers and wide-screen cable TVs. Start the day with the generous buffet breakfast, featuring international favorites including breads, pastries, fruit, hot dishes and eggs cooked any style you like. A rooftop bar offering a selection of wines, beers and cocktails under the setting sun awaits – though a plethora of other choices for drinks and food is available in Mérida’s downtown, for guests who’d like to venture out and about. With four meeting rooms, the hotel is also ideal for business events, and celebrations including weddings.NH Hoteles

name: Iberostar Cozumel
address: Km 17 782 Carretera Costera Sur, 77600 Cozumel, Quintana Roo
description: This luxury family friendly beachfront resort has something to offer for everyone no matter what age. The property is located in Cozumel and just 19 kilometres from the Cozumel Airport and 17 kilometres from the city. All the rooms are bungalow styled with a bright tropical décor with private patios and hammock. Some of the room amenities include minibar service, complimentary Wi-Fi, air conditioning and plush bedding. With great attention spent every detail making your stay as comfortable and care free as possible. The property includes multiple restaurants with both a la carte and buffet options. From classical Mexican delights to international cuisine from around the world. Get a light snack along with a cool refreshing cocktail from one of the many bars and lounges spread throughout the property available day and night for your pleasure. The resort offers many activities for all ages including Star Camp for the children with organized recreation based on age range, with over 140 fun filled experiences to educate and make new friends. The hotel offers many sports and activities including snorkelling, windsurfing and kayaking. There is also a gym and tennis courts available along with nightly shows and entertainment. The spa is available with many treatment options to relax and rejuvenate your body, mind and spirit. Enjoy your magical vacation in beautiful Cozumel Mexico.FarePortal

name: Hotel Lucerna Hermosillo
address: Blvd. Paseo Rio Sonora Nte. 98, 83270 Hermosillo, Sonora
description: At Hotel Lucerna Hermosillo you will find everything you need, located approximately 10 minutes from International Airport, nearby places of interest as the Government offices and convention center, including complementary High-Speed Internet Access, enjoy our excellence in quality and service, our extraordinary swimming pool plenty of patio chairs and umbrellas, our full service restaurant with room service 24 hrs available.Official Hotel Information

name: Antaris Galerias
address: Ave Constitucion 1707 Pte Col: Mirador, 64070 Monterrey, Nuevo Leon
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Monterrey, Antaris Galerias features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and a shared lounge. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while some rooms at the hotel also feature a seating area. At Antaris Galerias you will find a restaurant serving American, Italian and Mexican cuisine. Vegetarian and vegan options can also be requested. The accommodation offers a terrace. Obispado Museum is 1.2 km from Antaris Galerias, while MARCO Museum Monterrey is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Monterrey International Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Radisson Hotel Del Rey Toluca
address: Carretera Mexico - Toluca km 63.5, 50160 Toluca, Mexico State
description: Situated in the business sector of the Tollocan neighborhood, Radisson Hotel and Convention Center Toluca offers corporate travelers a convenient stay off Highway 15 near companies like Pfizer, Chrysler, and General Motors. Explore nearby museums and the unique attraction Cosmovitral. Toluca International Airport is less than 15 kilometers away. After a busy day, take a dip in our indoor pool, work out in the well-equipped fitness center, and stroll through our indoor gardens. We offer free WiFi and parking as well as meeting facilities for up to 1,800. Our 250 rooms and suites have desks, coffeemakers, and room service. Upgrade to a one-bedroom or an extended-stay suite for a living area and kitchenette. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Gamma Rincón de Santiago

description: Gama Rincn de Santiago, is characterized for serving customers who require lodging and food services for business or pleasure meetings, a place where nature is enjoyed to the maximum, the areas that have been reforested to complement the trails and canyons, where you can do physical or recreational activities, the beautiful landscapes of the mountainous areas and the dam. Its spaces designed for social events with capacity from 10 to 300 people in its different spaces.iHotelier/iStay

name: Gran Hotel Diligencias
address: 1115 Independence Avenue Downtown, 91700 Veracruz, Veracruz-Llave
description: Located in the Historic District of Veracruz, this hotel is a 10-minute walk from the coast of the Gulf of Mexico. It offers an outdoor pool and massage center. The rooms at Gran Hotel Diligencias include cable TV and free Wi-Fi. A safety deposit box is provided. A buffet breakfast is served daily at this Veracruz hotel. A 24-hour gym and sauna are located on-site. The hotel hosts a restaurant and bar specializing in seafood. Veracruz General Heriberto Jara International Airport is 15 minutes from Gran Hotel Diligencias. The San Juan de Ulúa Museum is also 15 minutes away from the hotel.

name: Antaris Cintermex
address: Avenida Funidora 500, 64000 Monterrey, Nuevo Leon
description: Antaris Cintermex Monterrey offers air-conditioned rooms with microwaves and minibars. Antaris Cintermex is 500 meters of Papalote Museum. Hotel Antaris Cintermex modern rooms are equipped with satellite TVs, refrigerators and safety deposit boxes. Wi-Fi connection is free in all rooms. Béke Coffee and Bread at Cintermex Hotel serves international cuisine. After working out in the gym, guests can relax in the sauna or the outdoor hot tub. Guests of Hotel Antaris Cintermex are welcome to use the 24-hour business center where copy services are available. Arena Monterrey, an indoor concert and sports venue, is a 4-minute drive from Antaris Cintermex. The hotel is 15 meters from Fundidora Park, offering playground equipment and a man-made lake.

name: Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez Hotel
address: Boulevard Dr. Belisario Domínguez 1195, 29060 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Embark on a journey of comfort and intrigue during your stay at Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez Hotel in Chiapas, Mexico. Just minutes from the downtown area, our hotel makes it easy to access Zona Dorada, San Cristobal and Plaza Crystal for shopping and the picturesque Sumidero Canyon for scenic dwelling. End a day of adventures in our contemporary rooms and suites, where high-speed Wi-Fi and flat-panel TVs keep you connected. Accommodations also include plush pillowtop beds, complimentary bottled water and room service. Guests traveling together can take advantage of our spacious suites with additional rooms and pullout sofas. Find your Zen at Oriental Spa and Hairdresser Beauty Liss, and sunbathe at one of our three scenic pools. Our fitness center and tennis court are perfect for keeping to your workout routine before powering back up with a meal from one of our two restaurants. Whether you're here for the beach or for business, Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez Hotel will be the home base you need.Marriott

name: Hotel El Conquistador del Paseo de Montejo
address: Paseo De Montejo 458 X 35, 97000 Mérida, Yucatan
description: Located over the Paseo Montejo Promenade and 2.5 km from the Merida Main Square, Hotel El Conquistador del Paseo Montejo features a swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi throughout. The contemporary-décor rooms offer air conditioning, a desk, cable TV and minibar. The bathrooms have bath or shower and hairdryer. The on-site restaurant serves regional food, Mexican cuisine and international-style dishes, plus it also features buffet breakfast. Hotel El Conquistador del Paseo Montejo also has an on-site gift shop, bar and a tour desk. A business centre, meeting facilities, laundry and dry cleaning services are available as well. This hotel is a 16-minute drive from the Mundo Maya Museum and 7 minutes’ drive from the Merida’s Cathedral. Merida International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Francia Aguascalientes
address: Av. Fco. I Madero No. 113, 20000 Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes
description: Ideally set in the centre of Aguascalientes, Mexico, surrounded by popular area points of interest, this historic hotel offers comfortable accommodation, thoughtful amenities and an on-site restaurant. Hotel Francia Aguascalientes is situated only a short stroll from a number of charming shops, local restaurants and an exciting nightlife. Beautiful historic buildings as well as the legendary Cerro del Muerto, Dead Man's Hill, are also nearby. While staying at the Aguascalientes Francia Hotel, guests can enjoy in-room coffeemakers as well as free wireless internet access. The hotel also provides on-site dining at Sanborns restaurant, which offers international cuisine along with traditional Mexican dishes.

name: Mision Arcangel Puebla
address: D. Defensores de la Republica 276, 72095 Puebla City, Puebla
description: Mision Arcangel Puebla is conveniently located in the popular Cabecera area. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Mision Arcangel Puebla. Flat screen television, fan, air conditioning, telephone, satellite/cable TV can be found in selected guestrooms. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make Mision Arcangel Puebla the perfect choice for your stay in Puebla de Zaragoza.Agoda

name: City Express by Marriott Queretaro
address: Lateral Autopista Mexico Queretaro 2103, 76030 Santiago de Querétaro, Queretaro de Arteaga
description: City Express by Marriott Queretaro is ideally situated 10 minutes from the city's main convention center, Centro de Congresos. If your visit involves a conference or meeting at the center, our hotel is a convenient place for your stay.If you're a soccer fan, make time to go to Corregidora Stadium to watch the Gallos Blancos de Queretaro in action. Queretaro is a wine drinker's paradise. It has the highest wine production of any other state in Mexico, after Baja California. The summer wine festival, Fiesta de la Vendimia is a fun event for the whole family. Do some wine tasting, try grape stomping, and enjoy live performances. The events vary by winery, since each venue has its own version of the festival.For a relaxing end to your trip, take a stroll through the city's historic district. There are several noteworthy museums, including Queretaro Regional Museum, La Casa de La Zacatecana and the Art Museum.Book your stay at City Express by Marriott Queretaro and soak up everything this city has to offer.Marriott

name: Four Points by Sheraton Puebla
address: Boulevard Hermanos Serdssn No 102, 72060 Puebla City, Puebla
description: With everything you need under one roof Four Points by Sheraton Puebla blends the most current preferences of business and leisure travelers to create a modern and functional hotel. Located in Puebla City, you can easily walk or ride a bike to nearby businesses and restaurants in downtown and the offices of Finsa are just a short drive away. With excellent services in a single space, guests enjoy access to a heated outdoor pool, meeting rooms and a restaurant and bar. After staying active in the pool or fitness center, fuel up at Maria Ofelia, featuring an international menu to please all types of tastes. Return in the evening for a nightcap before heading up to your room with blackout curtains and complimentary WiFi. If you are traveling with a group and planning an event you can expect an exceptional gathering in one of our nine meeting rooms, complemented by catering services and AV equipment. Whether it is work or play that brings you to Mexico feel at home at Four Points by Sheraton Puebla.Marriott

description: Located near the Monterrey International Airport (MTY) The Crowne Plaza® Monterrey Aeropuerto Hotel is conveniently located near the industrial zone and to several important companies in the city. This Monterrey hotel offers a free shuttle every 30 minutes to and from places within 6 miles providing an easy access to the airport, the Technological Innovation Park (PIIT) and the Technology Park Apodaca. Meeting rooms, Business Center and a convenient location make us the perfect place for those who travel for business. Enjoy our most spacious and comfortable rooms in the Apodaca area, specially equipped for the business and leisure traveler. The Gym open without restrictions. Relax after a day of work in our Spa, Subject to reservation and enjoy our refreshing outdoor pool.IHG Hotels & Resorts

address: 7 Poniente 105 Centro Historico, 72000 Puebla City, Puebla
description: Quinta Real Puebla is located in central Puebla, 5 minutes’ drive from the city’s convention centre and main shopping centres. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Property also features a gym, butler service, boutique, laundry service and nanny services. The Quinta Real is a 25-minute drive from the Cholula Pyramids. Puebla International Airport is 40 km away.

address: Av. Colon 504, 97000 Mérida, Yucatan
description: Our Merida hotel is placed in one of the most important avenues of the city, just in front of the International Congress Center of Yucatan and 200 meters away from the famous Paseo Montejo Av. When you're not exploring the city, enjoy the comfort of our spacious rooms and suites boasting complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs. Start your day at our on-site restaurant, Napa, with a wide selection of delicious local and international options, as well as dinner entrées and evening cocktails. Enjoy a beautiful sunset at our roof pool. No matter the time of day or night, you'll be able to fit in an invigorating workout at our 24-hour fitness center. Whether traveling for business or leisure, Courtyard Merida Downtown offers an experience you won't forget.Marriott

Terrazas and Casa de la Cultura. This 4.5-star hotel is 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from San Luis Square and 1.1 mi (1.8 km) from La Loma Sport Center. Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a 24-hour fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 6 meeting rooms available for events. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free valet parking is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers with rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.Ticket Package

name: Villa Maria Cristina
address: Paseo de la Presa de la Olla No. 76, 36000 Guanajuato, Guanajuato
description: With spacious, luxurious suites as well as first-rate services and an elegant restaurant, this stylish hotel provides guests with an ideal escape in the interesting city of Guanajuato. Hotel Villa María Cristina Small Luxury Hotels features an outdoor terrace with a large hot tub. Guests can enjoy a cup of afternoon tea or evening cocktail on the terrace, or go for a swim in the indoor pool. After a busy day of sightseeing, visitors can relax with a massage in the hotel's spa. Hotel Villa María Cristina Small Luxury Hotels boast amenities such as high ceilings, wood floors and French furniture. Guests will appreciate the whirlpool tub in the suite's marble bathroom after a long day. Located on the first floor of the hotel, the restaurant serves international and Mexican cuisine. With dinner, guests can enjoy a fine wine from the hotel's cellar.

name: Best Western Posada Chahue
address: Mixie Mza. 3-A Sector R, 75, 70989 Santa Maria Huatulco, Oaxaca
description: Make yourself a part of the ecological space that the Best Western Posada Chahue has reserved for you at Mexico's newest tourist development of Bahias de Huatulco, located on the Mexican Pacific coast in Oaxaca state. You will discover nine beautiful bays almost unexplored, surrounded by 34,600 acres of lush vegetation and the 36 sandy, clear beaches that Huatulco offers to the visitors in a paradise secluded from the rest of the world. Huatulco has a sub-humid climate, with minimum temperatures of 57 degrees Fahrenheit during the winter. Enjoy fishing, snorkeling, diving, kayaking, rafting, sailing, touring in yachts, four-wheel motor bikes, horse back and bicycle riding, coffee plantations tours, handcraft shopping as well as one of the best golf courses of Mexico by the sea.bestwestern.com

name: Comfort Inn Monterrey Valle
address: Av Lazaro Cardenas No 1009, 66266 Monterrey, Nuevo Leon
description: Located 6 km from the Museum of Contemporary Art, Comfort Inn Monterrey Valle features an on-site restaurant and outdoor pool. Rooms at this Nuevo Leon, Mexico hotel offer free WiFi. Free private parking is available. Guest rooms are furnished with desks and safety deposit boxes. They provide cable TV along with coffee makers and hairdryers. Each room has a private bathroom. The hotel offers room service and has a business center and meeting facilities. Plaza Fiesta San Agustín is one mile from Comfort Inn. The hotel is 6 km from Planetario Alfa and the shopping district of San Pedro Garza García.

name: Panorama
address: Av. Venustiano Carranza No. 315, San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí
description: Set in San Luis Potosí’s historic centre, Panorama offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour reception. Plaza Fundadores and Plaza de Armas are within 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at Panorama has modern décor. There is a sofa, cable TV and 2 double beds. Shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the streets surrounding the hotel and in the nearby squares. Room service is also available. San Luis Potosí Cathedral is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Panorama. There is easy access to the 57 Motorway and the city’s airport is 20 km away.

name: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Queretaro
address: Paseo de la Republica, 11515, 76230 Santiago de Querétaro, Queretaro de Arteaga
description: Sleek and modern, the Ramada Encore Queretaro offers every service and amenity you need! Convenient to Queretaro International Airport, Antea LifeStyle Center shopping mall and business offices, this lodging is ideal for business travel. Keep everything on schedule, including your workouts, with the state-of-the-art fitness center and indoor pool. Take advantage of complimentary indoor parking onsite, as well as meeting and event space for up to 250 people. The business center offers computer access as well as fax and copy service; and spacious guest rooms and suites feature safe, hair dryer, coffeemaker and flat screen HDTV. For added value, enjoy complimentary continental breakfast buffet daily and complimentary wireless Internet access throughout the facility. No smoking and no pets allowed. Service animals are welcome.Wyndham

name: Hotel Gobernador
address: Avendia 20 de Noviembre 257, 34000 Durango, Durango
description: Hotel Gobernador is 800 metres from Durango’s Plaza de Armas Main Square and 5 minutes’ walk from Jardín Morelos Park. It features a free private parking and free Wi-Fi. The colonial-décor rooms include air conditioning, a desk, ceiling fan, telephone, coffee maker, flat-screen cable TV and garden views. The bathrooms are private and come with shower and free toiletries. Guests will enjoy international food at La Hacienda restaurant and drinks at the lobby bar. A variety of restaurants can be found within 900 metres. Hotel Gobernador is 1 km from Durango’s Regional Museum and 2 minutes’ drive from Durango’s Cathedral. Children Museum is 5 km away and Guadalupe Victoria International Airport is 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: City Express by Marriott Zacatecas
address: Calzada Heroes De Chapultepec 1700, 98000 Zacatecas, Zacatecas
description: City Express by Marriott Zacatecas is 10 minutes from the city's historic center and 20 minutes from the airport. Our modern and stylish hotel is ideally situated for the business traveler, and also offers all of the comfort, convenience and value that vacationers expect.The Palacio de Convenciones is located just two minutes from our hotel. This huge complex hosts hundreds of conferences, exhibitions, and expos. Zacatecas was recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1993. The main square is surrounded by a host of important buildings. We recommend you visit the Zacatecas Cathedral, built in the 18th century, and the church of St. Augustine.The local restaurant scene is a foodie's paradise?a combination of fresh, flavorful ingredients, native recipes and a dash of Spanish ingredients that were brought over by the settlers. Some dishes that we recommend: La cola de res (beef tail) enchiladas, pipin con papitas (pumpkin seeds with sauce), and pozole con maz morado (stew with rice.)Marriott

The bathroom has a hairdryer, and kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is 24-hour reception and free on-site parking. The Plaza Campestre Hotel offers an airport shuttle service for a supplement.

Rooms offer a fan, a safe and a private bathroom. Some rooms also have a balcony. The San Diego’s elegant restaurant serves authentic Italian cuisine and has a terrace with panoramic city views. You can also enjoy a drink in the cellar bar. Juarez Theatre is situated just 50 metres from the hotel, while the Mummy Museum is a 5-minute walk away.

On Saturday afternoons, visitors will enjoy barbecues and on Sundays, delicious buffets with live music. In the afternoon, Las Calandrias bar offers traditional Mexican snacks and live music.

If you feel like visiting the surroundings, you can explore Laguna Manialtepec, 5 km away, or Carrizalillo Beach which is 14 km from the property. Vivo Resorts also offers an airport shuttle service with an extra cost and free on-site parking.

Every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Múcara hotel have a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. There is also a fitness centre and library. At Iberostar Playa Mita guests can enjoy a wide variety of dishes in one of the 4 specialty restaurants as well as a buffet. name: Radisson Hotel Monterrey San Jeronimo

description: A delightful stay awaits at Radisson Hotel Monterrey San Jeronimo, located within easy reach of Galerias Monterrey, the Monterrey Museum of Contemporary Art, and the San Pedro Garza Garcia corporate zone. When you are ready to relax, you can lounge beside our rooftop pool and take in outstanding views of the city skyline. We also offer a restaurant, a fitness center, a business center, two bars, free WiFi, and meeting facilities. Our 98 rooms and suites ensure your comfort thanks to plush bedding, individual room climate control, and smart TVs. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program. Please note that we are a smoke-free property.Choice Hotels

You can also order your meals to the privacy of your room 24 hours a day. The Occidental Nuevo Vallarta offers daytime and evening activities, including waterpolo, windsurfing and kayaking. Children from 4 to 12 years old can enjoy games in the supervised kids’ club. The hotel is located just a few meters from Nuevo Vallarta’s main shopping centre. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is a 25-minute drive away, while central Puerto Vallarta is a 35-minute drive away. Staff at the 24-hour front desk are happy to organize excursions or arrange car hire. Free private parking is available on site. Butler service is available.

name: Hotel San Miguel
