Merida International Airport, Puerto Progreso and the city's historic center are also nearby. We've perfected the extended-stay experience with studio suites boasting fully equipped kitchens, large in-suite workspaces, and living rooms. Stay connected with free hotel-wide Wi-Fi. Start your day in Merida with our daily complimentary breakfast, and stay fit with a workout in the fitness center or a refreshing dip in our pool overlooking the city. Pets are allowed at our hotel too, so everyone in your family is welcome. If you're hosting a business event in Merida, Mexico, we offer two flexible on-site meeting rooms and catering.Marriott

name: Hotel Santa Fe
address: Calle Del Morro, 71980 Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca
description: Set between the beaches of Zicatela and Marinaro, this colonial-style hotel features 3 outdoor pools and a restaurant. Hotel Santa Fe is located in Puerto Escondido, on the coast of Oaxaca. Surrounded by lush tropical gardens, the Santa Fe offers beautiful rooms with Mexican décor in light colours, featuring wooden furniture and tiled floors. The bathrooms feature hand-painted tiles. Each bright room at Hotel Santa Fe comes with a satellite TV and a private balcony that offers views of the hotel’s gardens. The suites include a minibar and a fridge. The restaurant is located under a traditional Palapa roof, and offers views of the Pacific Ocean. It serves Mexican and international cuisine, as well as seafood dishes, salads and daily specials. The lively city centre of Puerto Escondido is a 5-minute drive, while the airport is 4 km away.

name: City Express by Marriott Puebla Centro
address: Calle 10 Norte No. 1406, 72000 Puebla City, Puebla
description: City Express by Marriott Puebla Centro sits in the city's historic district, less than a mile from the cathedral and a block away from the San Francisco de Asis Temple. Our hotel is also only five minutes from the Puebla O. Jenkins Convention Center.While you're here, take some time to explore the beautiful sights in Puebla. Get lost in the streets downtown, and discover some of Mexico's unique architecture that combines French and Spanish design. The historic center has been claimed a UNESCO "World Heritage Site." The city's Cathedral, the largest cathedral in Latin America, contains many artistic artifacts. Just a few blocks away visit La Capilla del Rosario, a chapel constructed in a Mexican baroque style.For those who like to eat their way through a new city, "poblana" cuisine is delicious and full of flavor. Don't miss the chance to taste the traditional dishes, like mole poblano, mole pipian or Santa Clara cookies.Marriott

name: Holbox by Xaloc
address: Calle Chacchi Esquina Playa Norte, 77310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: Offering direct access to Playa Norte Beach, on the beautiful island of Holbox, Holbox by Xaloc features luxurious rooms and bungalows with terraces. It has 2 outdoor swimming pools, and an à la carte restaurant. All air-conditioned accommodation at the Holbox by Xaloc is set in traditional Mayan huts with thatched roofs. Bungalows also come with a small seating area, and a terrace with ocean or garden views. There is also a beach bar and relaxing lounge area. Holbox Island is ideal for canoeing, bird watching and snorkelling. There are regular ferries to the mainland town of Chiquila, which take approximately 45 minutes.

name: Diverxo Hotel & Villas
address: Periférico Sur Poniente No. 2255, 29060 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Located in Tuxtla Gutiérrez, 15 km from Sumidero Canyon, Diverxo Hotel & Villas provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Diverxo Hotel & Villas each room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an American or vegetarian breakfast. La Marimba Park is 2.5 km from Diverxo Hotel & Villas, while San Marcos Cathedral is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Ángel Albino Corzo International Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Quinta Real Zacatecas
address: Segunda De Palomares, Zacatecas Centro, 98000 Zacatecas, Zacatecas
description: Built around a restored 19th century bullfighting ring in the heart of the picturesque colonial city of Zacatecas, this luxury hotel offers elegant accommodations in a warm and historic atmosphere. Quinta Real Zacatecas elegantly blends 19th century charm with all of today's modern conveniences. Guests can enjoy wireless internet access, an on-site tour desk and a state-of-the-art business center, all in a historically stunning environment. Only a short distance from the Zacatecas Quinta hotel is the charming downtown area, named a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Guests can discover breathtaking historical attractions, museums, local restaurants and more only moments from the hotel.

name: Estrella de Belem B&B and Spa
address: 2 Oriente 410, 72760 Puebla City, Puebla
description: This charming 19th-century mansion is located in central Cholula, just 200 metres from the Great Pyramid and Royal Chapel. Its rooftop terrace offers a pool, hot tub and amazing views. Set around a patio with a laurel tree, the charming, air-conditioned rooms feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. Each one comes with under-floor heating, a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Estrella de Belem B&B and Spa serves daily breakfast on the patio, and the terraces are great for relaxing with a drink. There is a fountain decorated with 18th-century mosaics. Central Puebla is around 11 km from Estrella de Belem B&B and Spa. Puebla Airport is around 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: City Express by Marriott Ciudad Juarez
address: Av. Tomas Fernandez 7810, 32424 Ciudad Juárez, Chihuahua
description: City Express by Marriott Ciudad Jurez is strategically located between two of the most important airports in the region: Ciudad Jurez International Airport and El Paso International Airport in the United States. City Express by Marriott is central to the city's commercial zone. The Intermex and Azteca industrial parks, the Cibeles Convention Center and the Campestre Golf Club are all just a few minutes from our hotel. As an important port of entry at the U.S./Mexico border, Jurez is bustling with the activity of international commerce, but it also has a lot of culture and history. In your leisure time, we recommend a visit to the Museo de la Revolucion en La Frontera. This recently renovated museum tells the story of the Mexican Revolution and its impact on the Mexican people. Make sure you book your next stay at City Express by Marriott Ciudad Juarez, for the comfort and convenience that we offer our guests.Marriott

name: City Express by Marriott Tuxtla Gutierrez
address: Libramiento Sur Poniente 2950, 29060 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Hotel City Express by Marriott Tuxtla Gutirrez, is conveniently located in the hotel zone of the city just a few minutes from Plaza Crystal and Plaza Galerias, being the most frequented of the city that when you stay with us, you will be able to transfer from one place to another, you can either walk or rent a car.With the new Teran-Suchiapa highway, our hotel is only 35 minutes away from the airport and being strategically located on one of the city's main roads, our accessibility to different points of the city is quicker and easier.It is 15 minutes from the Convention Center and Polyforum Chiapas, a multipurpose complex in this city.You can not visit Tuxtla without giving yourself a trip to the Sumidero Canyon, which is one of the most important natural beauties of Mexico and America. In its vertical walls you can see caves and the occasional waterfall, as well as monkeys, crocodiles and birds of various species that you will not see anywhere else.Marriott

name: Suites Colonial
address: 5a. Ave Sur No. 9, 77600 Cozumel, Quintana Roo
description: Suites Colonial is located in Cozumel’s main square: the Benito Juarez square. It offers its guests complimentary Continental breakfast from 7:00am to 11:30am. It also has coffee service in the lobby. The accommodations in Suites Colonial feature air conditioning, a seating area and a kitchenette. Each room has satellite TV. The private bathroom offers free toiletries. WiFi is available for free. Within 200 metres of the hotel, guests will find the option of Mexican-style cuisine or steak-type options. The property is 500 metres from the main pier. The Cozumel Airport is 5 km from Suites Colonial.

name: Casa de Olas Boutique Hotel
address: Calle Michoacán, Brisas de Zicatela, 70934 Puerto Escondido, Oaxaca
description: Casa de Olas Boutique Hotel has free bikes, fitness centre, a garden and shared lounge in Puerto Escondido. 300 metres from Zicatela Beach and 4 km from Commercial Walkway, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers evening entertainment and room service. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. All rooms have a kettle and a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, while selected rooms also offer a kitchen fitted with a fridge. At Casa de Olas Boutique Hotel, all rooms come with air conditioning and a safety deposit box. You can play darts at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. The nearest airport is Puerto Escondido International Airport, 7 km from Casa de Olas Boutique Hotel.

name: Quinta Del Rey Hotel
address: Paseo Tollocan Ote. #500, 52170 Toluca, Mexico State
description: Set in spectacular ornate gardens, this hotel is located in Toluca. There is an indoor swimming pool, a spa with hot tub and a games room. Quinta Del Rey Hotel features spacious rooms with air conditioning and heating, all with views of the gardens. Rooms include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom with free toiletries and a seating area. Featuring a beautiful Colonial design with archways and fountains, the Quinta Del Rey showcases pieces of Mexican craftwork throughout. There is an antiques museum and a typical chapel. For dining, the Carruaje Restaurant specializes in local and international cuisine, as well as in Viennese desserts. There is also a bar with a billiard table. Nevado de Toluca National Park is 30 minutes’ drive, while Mexico City is 40 km away.

name: TRYP by Wyndham San Luis Potosi Hotel & Suites
address: Av Benito Juarez 3105, 78394 San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí
description: TRYP San Luis Potosi Hotel and Suites is the ideal place to stay in the city when you are visiting for business or pleasure. Loft type rooms with breakfast buffet included, kitchenette, fridge, microwave, free high speed internet, restaurant and room service, 24 hrs fitness center, 20 km away from the airport, located near all major industrial companies and parks.Wyndham

name: NH Queretaro
address: Av. 5 de Febrero 1303, 76138 Santiago de Querétaro, Queretaro de Arteaga
description: The NH Queretaro hotel is conveniently located on the city’s main avenue, just a 10-minute drive from downtown. The Cerro de las Campanas National Park is a short drive away or guests can be at the Queretaro Convention Center in just 15 minutes. There are 140 rooms at NH Queretaro. These are comfortable and quiet spaces featuring a contemporary decor with a white and lime-green color palette and wooden floors. Each room comes with a satellite TV, minibar, and free Wi-Fi which is available throughout the hotel. For guests staying on the executive floor, we have a free ironing and shoe polish service as well as complimentary coffee. The hotel serves a fresh breakfast buffet daily which includes a varied spread of local and international options served with coffee, tea, and fresh juices. For lunch and dinner, guests can taste global and Mexican specialties including traditional flavors from Queretaro at our modern restaurant. For a quick drink and casual conversation there is the hotel bar. There is a gym on site, which is a great place to unwind. The hotel also has six meeting rooms for up to 120 people.NH Hoteles

name: Las Villas Hotel & Golf By Estrella del Mar
address: Camino Isla de la Piedra KM 10, 82267 Mazatlán, Sinaloa
description: This hotel offers access to a 3.5 mile long beach on the Pacific Ocean. Guests can relax at the full-service spa or work in their rooms with the free Wi-Fi. Estrella del Mar Resort Mazatlan features spacious rooms with views of the ocean or garden. The hotel features horse riding on the beach and a golf course. Guests can go for a swim in the outdoor pool or explore the beach. Dining options at the hotel include 4 restaurants and 3 bars. Guests can shop in the gift shop or stock their room at the convenience store. Estrella del Mar Resort Mazatlan is within a 30-minute drive of downtown Mazatlan. The Mazatlan International Airport is within a 10-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Chihuahua
address: Villa Lombardia 5702, Plaza Citadela D1, 31110 Chihuahua, Chihuahua
description: The new state-of-the-art lobby at Courtyard provides greater flexibility and choices for our guests. At the center of it all is CENTRO, your destination for a great breakfast, or drinks and dinner during the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces where you can work or relax, free Wi-Fi throughout and easy access to the latest news, free transportation 10 km around the hotel, weather and airport conditions via our GoBoard® technology. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center, outdoor pool will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard is sure to be more comfortable, more productive and more enjoyable than ever before!Marriott

name: Vista Inn Premium
address: 16 Poniente Norte 570, 29030 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Vista Inn Premium Tuxtla Gutierrez is centrally located 400 metres from Plaza Las Americas Square and the city’s Bus Station. This stylish hotel offers 24-hour reception, a free Wi-Fi zone and free parking. All air-conditioned rooms feature a cable TV and work desk. Each also comes with a modern private bathroom. The hotel's Terraza Quinta Avenida restaurant offers a breakfast in the mornings with an extra cost. Located on one of Tuxtla Gutierrez’s main avenues, Vista Inn Premium is just a 30-minute drive from Ángel Albino Corzo International Airport.

name: One Toluca Aeropuerto
address: Blvd. Miguel Alemán Manzana 1 Lote D, 50200 Toluca, Mexico State
description: With an open concept and a refreshing and lively atmosphere, one Toluca Aeropuerto is the best option for business travelers and those visiting the city of Toluca. This affordable hotel will fit your budget and has an excellent location.Located on Miguel Alemn Avenue, it's just three minutes from the Toluca International Airport, five minutes from Plaza Sendero, thirty minutes from the artisan village of Metepec, twelve minutes from San Mateo Atenco (where high-quality shoes are made) and fifteen minutes from the city's historic center.Important companies are located near the hotel, including: Chrysler, Nissan, Nestl, GM, Alpla, Femsa, Cervecera Cuauhtmoc, Bayer, Bimbo, Henkel and Pfizer, among others. We remind you that the check-in time is from 3:00 PM. Check-out is at 12:00 PM. We suggest you use our express check-out service.100% smoke free hotel.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Casa Hx - Adults Only
address: Av Pedro Joaquín Coldwell Predio 006, 77310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Casa HX - Adults Only has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Holbox Island. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk. All rooms include a safety deposit box, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Hotel Casa HX - Adults Only rooms have bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. With staff speaking English and Spanish, non-stop information is available at the reception. Punta Coco is 400 metres from Hotel Casa HX - Adults Only, while Playa Holbox is 500 metres from the property.

name: Hotel Leon
address: 107 al 121 Calle Francisco I. Madero, 37000 León, Guanajuato
description: Situated in the centre of Leon, this modern hotel is just 2-minutes’ walk from the Plaza Principal Square and its pretty gardens. It offers rooms with cable TV and free Wi-Fi. The Art-Deco style rooms at Hotel Leon are spacious and comfortable. They include a safe and tea and coffee making facilities, along with a private bathroom with hairdryer. The hotel’s restaurant serves a variety of à la carte international and Mexican cuisine, and the Escocés Bar has a Scottish theme and features live music. Hotel Leon is situated within a 2-minute walk from a number of bars, restaurants and shops. The Calzada de los Niños Heroes Monument with its bronze lion is a 12-minute walk from the hotel. Hotel Leon offers free private parking and is a 35-minute drive from Guanajuato Airport.

name: Grand Isla Navidad Resort
address: Circuito de Los Marinos, 28830 Manzanillo, Colima
description: This luxury beachfront resort, in Barra de Navidad, features a golf course, gym, spa and 2 outdoor pools, one located on the 10th floor. There are tennis courts and on-site water sports facilities. Free WiFi is included in public areas. Spacious air-conditioned rooms have a terrace with ocean, pool or mountain views. There is a living room with a sofa, cable TV and coffee maker. Rooms have a ceiling fan and private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Grand Isla Navidad Golf & Spa Resort with Marina offers several bars and restaurants. Room service is also available. There is free on-site parking and the hotel has 24-hour reception, as well as a tour desk and concierge service.

name: City Express Junior by Marriott San Luis Potosí Zona Industrial
address: Carretera 57, #157, 78394 San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí
description: City Express Junior by Marriott San Luis Potosi Zona Industrial is a hotel for business travelers with a convenient location: the most important industrial corridor in the city. It has 122 rooms with all that matters for a pleasant stay: breakfast is included, free wifi, business center and additional amenities, all included. Our location in the industrial area of San Luis Potosi will make easier your business meetings. For your convenience, the Plaza Sendero Mall is just 5 minutes away, if you need move to other cities, the central bus station is 10 minutes distance from the hotel. In San Luis Potosi downtown there are many interesting things to visit and is just 15 minutes away. Less than 10 minutes you will find the Alfonso Lastras Stadium where the Atletico de Madrid subsidiary team in Mexico: San Luis Atletico plays. We wait for you in City Express Junior by Marriott San Luis Potosi Zona Industrial, we will take care of everything that matters to make your stay unforgettable.Marriott

name: Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only
address: Calle Caguama Esquina Calle Zargo, 73310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Holbox Island. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Staff on site can arrange airport transfers. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. Each room has a safety deposit box and some rooms include pool views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Holbox Island, like cycling. Playa Holbox is 100 metres from Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only, while Punta Coco is 1.1 km from the property.

name: City Express Junior by Marriott Toluca Aeropuerto
address: Blvd. Aeropuerto Miguel Aleman # 162, 52000 Toluca, Mexico State
description: Located 4 minutes from the Toluca International Airport, the City Express Junior by Marriott Toluca Aeropuerto hotel is ideal for both business travelers and tourists who want to enjoy the wonders that the City of Toluca has to offer, either on a business trip, as getaway for a couple, or a trip with family or friends. If you visit the capital of the State of Mexico for business, we are located next to the Polaris Industrial Park, just 10 km (6 mi) within the main industrial parks such as: Exportec I, Exportec II, Automotive Industry, Toluca 2000, La Bomba, Lerma, etc. We can take you to these places! City Express Junior by Marriott Toluca Aeropuerto is one of our hotels in Mexico that is located close to important corporations such as Alpura, Lala, Grupo Bimbo, Cervecera Cuauhtemoc, General Motors, Nissan, Chrysler and Pista Pegaso. If your travel itinerary includes a meeting at the Toluca Convention and Exhibition Center (CCYET), we are located only 3 minutes away.Marriott

name: Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Leon
address: Portal Bravo N 14 Zona Centro, 37000 León, Guanajuato
description: Located in the historic heart of Leon Guanajuato Mexico, Ramada Plaza Leon offers the opportunity to enjoy a trip with your family or your partner in our comfortable and spacious rooms, some with a privileged view of the main square of the city, you can also travel with your pet, since we are pet friendly. Our rooms are ideal for business travelers equipped with desk, safe, hair dryer, coffee maker, plasma TV. During your stay you can enjoy our services such as a gym, business center, room service, parking and complimentary WI FI. With multiple attractions just a few minutes away, such as bars, restaurants, museums or churches. You can go shopping at the most exclusive malls or visit the industrial parks, our main convention center Poliforum Leon is located just ten minutes away. Six meeting rooms for your events with capacity for up to 180 people. In addition to two family restaurants with a terrace that allows you to appreciate the unique view of the city.Wyndham

name: Hotel Barroco
address: 4 Norte 404 Col. Centro, 72000 Puebla City, Puebla
description: Situated in the centre of Puebla, Hotel Barroco is located 5.6 km from Acropolis Puebla and 500 metres from Puebla Convention Centre. The property is around 5.7 km from Cuauhtemoc Stadium, 7.1 km from Estrella de Puebla and 10 km from International Museum of the Baroque. The hotel features a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Hotel Barroco provides some units with city views, and all rooms include a patio. All rooms have a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Biblioteca Palafoxiana, Amparo Museum and Ignacio Zaragoza Stadium. The nearest airport is Hermanos Serdán International Airport, 23 km from Hotel Barroco.

name: Ilo Rojo San Miguel de Allende Curamoria Collection
address: Salida Real a Queretaro 136, Zona Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Boutique Hotel in San Miguel de Allende just a few blocks from the main square, with a unique and contemporary concept that combines design, comfort and the best views of the city. Enjoy the spacious terraces located at the highest point of the city, where each sunset offers a tribute to life, the comfort offered by our facilities and the personalized service that characterizes our team.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Casino Morelia
address: Portal Hidalgo 229 Centro, 58000 Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo
description: Located opposite Morelia Cathedral in the historic city centre, Hotel Casino Morelia offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. The Lu Cocina Michoacana gourmet restaurant serves authentic regional cuisine. Hotel Casino is set in a restored 18th-century building, and rooms have traditional-style décor with modern touches. All rooms include flat-screen satellite TV. Hotel Casino Morelia is surrounded by the shops, museums and galleries of historic Morelia, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Music Conservatory and Rose Garden are 100 meters from the hotel. The elevators will be in renovations from June to September and the service will not be available.

name: City Express Junior by Marriott Puebla Finsa
address: Guerrero, 117, 72730 Puebla City, Puebla
description: City Express by Marriott Puebla FINSA is in an ideal location, situated in the industrial zone of the city, just in front of the Volkswagen plant, and close to the Finsa and Bralamex parks. Our hotel is also is close to the expositor center, a busy spot for conferences and events. City Express by Marriott Puebla FINSA is also, conveniently, just a few blocks from the most popular musical school - La Casa de Musica de Viena. The center hosts top international composers and musicians. If you've got time to walk around the historic district, visit the cathedral and the famous Capilla del Rosario, in the Santo Domingo Church. Puebla is known around the world for its traditional cuisine, and no trip to our city is complete without trying the famous mole poblano. Taste this flavorful dish at our local restaurant, La Casita Poblana, which won an award for the "best mole in the world".Marriott

name: Hotel Palace Inn
address: Boulevard Belisario Domínguez km.1081, 29020 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi, Hotel Palace Inn is situated in Tuxtla Gutiérrez, 16 km from Sumidero Canyon and 300 metres from Galerias Plaza. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is set 3.2 km from La Marimba Park. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. The private bathroom is fitted with free toiletries. The rooms at Hotel Palace Inn include air conditioning and a desk. The accommodation offers a terrace. San Marcos Cathedral is 3.9 km from Hotel Palace Inn. The nearest airport is Ángel Albino Corzo International, 23 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fiesta Inn Express Queretaro Constituyentes
address: Avenida Constituyentes Oriente 40, Col., 76046 Santiago de Querétaro, Queretaro de Arteaga
description: Fiesta Inn Express Quertaro Constituyentes has been designed with modern and customizable spaces that reduce stress and provide unparalleled comfort to business travelers, ensuring a relaxing and productive stay. The hotel is located at the Puerta La Victoria shopping center, next to the Josefa Ortiz de Domnguez Auditorium. It is conveniently located just 10 minutes from the Convention Center, 12 minutes from the Historic Downtown District, and 15 minutes from the areas most important industrial parks. This hotel is home to 117 guest rooms that offer an extraordinary view of the city as well as other amenities, including wireless Internet access, a meeting room, fitness center, and resistance swimming pool. Guests enjoy a complimentary buffet-style breakfast, and 24-hour tea and coffee service and grab-and-go food items are also available.Please note that check-in begins at 3pm, subject to availability. Check-out is at 12pm. Express check-out is recommended.iHotelier/iStay

name: Fiesta Inn Tuxtla Gutierrez
address: Avenida Prolongacion Anillo De Circunvalacion, 29060 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Located in the newly developed business and hotel area, just 5 minutes from the Galeras Boulevard business park and with easy access to the area's tourist attractions, such as the San Marcos Cathedral, the Miguel lvarez Zoo and 45 minutes from the Sumidero Canyon and Chiapa de Corzo. Situated thirty-five minutes from the airport and 10 minutes from the bus station.We remind you that the check-in time is from 3:00 PM. Check-out is at 12:00 PM. We suggest you use our express check-out service.From now on, a 1% City lodging tax is effective in our hotels located in Tuxtla Gutirrez, Chiapas. This tax is additional to the 2% State lodging tax that was already being applied.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Posada del Carmen
address: Victimas Del 25 de Junio, #165 Esq., 91700 Veracruz, Veracruz-Llave
description: Located in Veracruz, Mexico, this hotel is only 5 minutes from the bus station. It offers an outdoor terrace with a pool, free internet access and a restaurant. The air-conditioned guest rooms at Hotel Posada del Carmen feature cable TV and a telephone. Guests can use Posada del Carmen's business center or enjoy regional cuisine in the restaurant. The hotel is located 10 minutes from the Plaza Comerciales and 20 minutes from Veracruz International Airport.

name: Hotel Real Plaza
address: Av. Venustiano Carranza 890, 78250 San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí
description: Hotel Real Plaza offers an outdoor pool, free private parking and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is located in central San Luis Potosi, a 10-minute walk from Plaza de Armas Square. Rooms at the Real Plaza have classic-style décor and some offer city views. Each room includes cable TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower and toiletries. The hotel has an à la carte restaurant and an English-style bar. A range of restaurants and fast food outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk. Staff at the Real Plaza’s 24-hour reception can arrange car hire and airport transfers on request. They are also happy to provide information about the colonial city of San Luis Potosi.

name: Othelo Boutique Hotel Mexico
address: Rosas Moreno No. 109, 37000 León, Guanajuato
description: Situated in León, 800 metres from Leon´s cathedral, Othelo Boutique Hotel Mexico features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 500 metres from Main square. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms in Othelo Boutique Hotel Mexico are fitted with free toiletries and an iPod docking station. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Othelo Boutique Hotel Mexico provides a dry cleaning service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Leon Poliforum is 4 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Bajio International Airport, 25 km from Othelo Boutique Hotel Mexico.

name: One Durango
address: Blvd. Itd, N° 99 Col. Ant., 34080 Durango, Durango
description: When visiting Durango, dont miss the opportunity to stay with a hotel chain that is budget-friendly, safe, welcoming, and practical while offering a number of additional benefits. one Durango is conveniently located in the citys largest shopping center and is a mere 10 minutes away from the main industrial areas. Whether for business or pleasure, traveling doesnt have to be expensive anymore. one Hotels meet the needs of any travelers budget while at the same time ensuring a safe, reliable, comfortable stay while providing efficient service so that you can stay focused on your trip. name: Lavid Aguascalientes
address: Boulevard Jose Maria Chavez 1305, 20290 Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes
description: LaVid Aguascalientes is located in Aguascalientes, 4.6 km from Victoria Stadium. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. There is free private parking and the property provides paid airport shuttle service. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms in LaVid Aguascalientes are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. With staff speaking English, Spanish and French, around the clock guidance is available at the reception. The nearest airport is Jesús Terán Peredo International Airport, 20 km from LaVid Aguascalientes.

name: Hotel Rs Suites
address: Blvd. Presa Chicoasen No. 815, 29040 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: RS Suites Hotel is located 5 minutes’ drive from Tuxtla Gutierrez city centre. This hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. Free parking is also available. The center of the city of Tuxtla is a 15-minute drive away. The Hotel is located 5 minutes from the Chiapas tower, hospital area and government offices. All the rooms at RS offer a TV, a seating area, coffee maker and private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony. A Continental breakfast is available from 06:30 to 08:00 at RS Suites Hotel. The restaurant serves homemade food with an à la carte menu. There is also a terrace where guests can have a coffee and relax. Tuxtla Gutiérrez is a modern city but it also retains much of its tradition and history. Within 5 minutes’ drive guests can visit the San Marcos Cathedral, the Regional Museum, or the Faustino Miranda Botanical Garden. Angel Albino Corzo International Airport is only 30 km away.

name: Hampton Inn by Hilton Queretaro Tecnologico
address: Blvd. Bernardo Quintana 4100-1 Col., 76100 Santiago de Querétaro, Queretaro de Arteaga
description: If you are looking for lodging in a hotel that has: the support of an unstoppable brand with irresistible personality, a 100% satisfaction guarantee, a warm and friendly staff eager to offer consistency, value, and great service: that is situated in the middle of a fascinating, cultural, industrial, diverse city, which is also home to a World Heritage Site, then look nowhere else because you have come to the right place! At Hampton Inn by Hilton Querétaro Tecnológico, you’ll find exactly what you need. Whether you’re traveling for business or pleasure, in our spacious rooms and studio king suites you’ll enjoy all the extras our hotel has to offer. Along with earning Hilton HHonors points and miles, you will enjoy free hot breakfast everyday including waffles (now served on China) or on the run breakfast bags, free stay for children under 18 accompanied by parents, exercise facilities, outdoor pool, laundry and dry-cleaning service, a welcoming reception Tuesdays through Thursdays (please check schedule at Front Desk), meeting rooms with audio and video equipment available. You can start your weekday morning with a free local newspaper in our lobby while relaxing with a free cup of coffee or tea, offered 24 hours a day. You can end your days in our Bar (part of the new Latin American Design) talking with your “friends in town” (that is how we like to think of ourselves). Each room features mahogany furniture with a 49” flat panel LCD TV. Rooms include: 2 phones with data port access, free high speed internet access (wired and wireless), clock radios, free local and 800 telephone calls, no surcharge for using a calling card, a coffee maker, an iron and ironing board, curved shower rod, WaterPik Shower head, in-room movie channel, and the Cloud 9 bed for The Hampton Experience. If you like to think of your room as a personal office, you´ll find convenient a built in desk for a comfortable working experience, and a desk phone with voice mail. Hampton Inn By Hilton Querétaro Tecnológico is conveniently situated just 1 mile away from all major companies, 2 miles away from most important attractions, and within walking distance to great local restaurants. You will notice that Querétaro is a quite calm place, with a high standard of living. International Queretaro Airport is just 46 minutes away. Despite its small size, the State of Querétaro offers many interesting cultural and natural attractions, thanks to its diverse geography and to its crucial role in Mexican history. Three World Heritage Sites, a Pueblo Mágico (Bernal), the first vineyards in America (Tequisquiapan and surroundings), beautiful haciendas as well as lush natural scenery are only part of what visitors enjoy. The state is really accessible to any traveler: it is the crossroads of Mexico, since the highways that connect Northeastern, Western and Central Mexico join here. Highway 57 leaves Mexico City and reaches Laredo, Texas in the border with the United States, and is also called the Pan-American Highway. The municipalities located along its route are referred to as the "industrial corridor" and are the most developed ones in the state. We are located in the area with the greatest potential for the next Data Center developments. Highway 45 connects Querétaro with the state of Guanajuato. Due to its strategic importance, Federal roads in the state receive a high level of investment. You can visit Querétaro any time of the year, its great weather makes your stay a pleasant one, and its numerous activities make it unforgettable. In short, it’s a warm and friendly place, a destination that offers a good life through its festivities, history, culture, and gastronomy. Dare to re-live the passage of time and history walking along its streets full of art, tradition, and charm. We love having you here!Hilton

name: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott Aguascalientes

Delight your palate with contemporary elegant cuisine. Everything you need for an exceptional stay is here. Youll appreciate the Grands distinction with its subtle personalized service and unmatched hospitality. A memorable stay awaits you in its 180 rooms, restaurant, lounge, gym, business center and fully equipped meeting and event rooms.Check-in is 3pm. Check-out is noon. We suggest you use our express checkout service.iHotelier/iStay

name: Fiesta Inn Monterrey Valle
address: Avenida Lazaro Cardenas, 327 Oeste, 66260 Monterrey, Nuevo Leon
description: Fiesta Inn continues to evolve and transform the Business Class hotel concept with the opening of the Fiesta Inn Monterrey Valley. The hotel is designed to let visitors pass their time as they wish, with spaces that are functional and welcoming, so guests can work independently or socialize in groups. Today, the Fiesta Inn is more than just a hotel - it's a community of travelers who all thrive on hard work and success.Located in the city of San Pedro, the hotel is strategically located in the Western Valley of Monterrey, the regions financial district and a hub for many large corporations. Its just five minutes from the citys main shopping centers, including the Western Valley Galleria and the Fiesta San Augstin Mall, as well as the Cima Hospital and Zambrano Hospital. Guests also have easy access to the nearby Convex Convention Center, Cintermex and the Parque Fundidora industrial complex. The hotel check-in time is 3pm. Check-out is 1am. A convenient Express Check-Out service is available.iHotelier/iStay

name: Na Balam Hotel
address: Calle Zazil-ha No. 118, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Set in a prime location of Cancun, Na Balam puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Na Balam. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access – wireless, private pool, internet access – wireless (complimentary). Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including spa, garden, water sports (non-motorized), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Discover all Cancun has to offer by making Na Balam your base.Agoda

name: Holbox Dream Beachfront Hotel
address: Av Pedro Joaquin Codwell, Manzana 19 Lote 1, 77310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: This beachfront hotel is located on an island 25 km long and 2 km wide, without any cars. Rooms include a private terrace or balcony. All rooms at the Holbox Dream Beachfront Hotel are decorated in Caribbean style and include free WiFi, a private bathroom and 2 beds. Air conditioning and a fan are provided for added comfort. Guests of the Holbox Dream Beachfront Hotel have access to a private beach that prohibits the golf carts used for transportation around the island. Beach towels are available at the reception area. An outdoor pool is also available. Tours of the island area itself, and the many exotic fish, birds and dolphins it contains, are also available.

name: Entre Patios Hotel Boutique
address: 5 De Mayo No. 517, 37000 León, Guanajuato
description: Situated in León, within 600 metres of Leon´s cathedral and less than 1 km of Main square, Entre Patios Hotel Boutique features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk. The rooms are fitted with a patio. At the hotel rooms include air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a garden view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. Guests at Entre Patios Hotel Boutique can enjoy a continental breakfast. Leon Poliforum is 3.6 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Bajio International Airport, 25 km from Entre Patios Hotel Boutique.

name: Hotel Mateos 1215
address: Lopez Mateos 1215 Blvd., León, Guanajuato
description: Featuring a fitness center, Hotel Mateos 1215 offers complimentary Wi-Fi to guests. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV with cable channels. They are furbished with double beds and a desk. Hotel Mateos 1215 offers room service. There is also a lounge with cafeteria available. Various restaurants, bars and shops are located in the Historic Center of Leon de los Aldama which is a 10 minutes’ walk from the property. Guanajuata International Airport is a 30 minutes’ drive from Hotel Mateos 1215. Free public parking is available in the vicinity.

name: Lotel-Casa Arca
address: Relox # 22 Col. Centro, 37700 San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato
description: Located in San Miguel de Allende, 400 metres from Church of St. Michael the Archangel, LOtel-Casa Arca provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At LOtel-Casa Arca each room comes with bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. LOtel-Casa Arca offers a sun terrace. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Historic Museum of San Miguel de Allende, Public library and Las Monjas Temple. The nearest airport is Querétaro International Airport, 72 km from LOtel-Casa Arca.
